Nous sommes fiers de vous présenter SensyBEE, un concept révolutionnaire pour vous faire économiser de l'énergie sans sacrifier votre confort.
column3: >Nos prises et nos capteurs se déploient indifféremment à votre domicile ou dans votre environnement professionnel.
column5:
>SensyBEE est la dernière génération de prise connectée autonome dans la coupure des courants de veille.


REALISEZ DES ECONOMIES DE FACON SIMPLE, SANS PROGRAMMATION !


""BEE"" signifie ""Abeille"" en anglais (Beautiful Energy Economies = de Belles Economies d'Energie), et l'image associée de l'abeille est une façon de vous montrer que nous allons ""butiner"" partout ou l'énergie est consommée de façon anormale ou inutile, pour vous faire réaliser de vraies économies et contribuer à la protection de l'environnement !

   

     



                                                   

En quoi le concept SensyBEE est-il supérieur aux autres solutions ?

SensyBEE est une gamme complète sophistiquée dans son principe mais finalement très simple à déployer :

- pour réaliser des économies chaque jour de l'année (journée, nuit, vacances) sur les appareils en veille

- flexible et sans programmation, la prise apprend toute seule !

- Rapide d'installation avec un impact immédiat sur l'environnement (courant de repos inférieur à 1mW, bien meilleur que tout courant de veille classique).


Tous les produits présents sur le marché vous demandent des efforts pour programmer.

column1: Avec SensyBEE vous branchez et laissez agir !

SensyBEE n'est donc pas un Gadget de plus dans votre environnement, et il ne vous demande pas de réfléchir à comment en tirer le meilleur usage : il le fait tout seul.

SensyBEE embarque une intelligence artificielle qui vous permet de vous affranchir de votre smartphone ou votre tablette, tout est simple !

Nos prises et nos capteurs vont se connecter automatiquement entre eux, et le logiciel embarqué en mode local va réaliser un planning-expert pour moduler les allumages et extinctions des appareils qui lui sont raccordés.
column3:
/>  Le savoir est embarqué pour les meilleurs résultats en local 


SensyBEE est un concept réellement intelligent, car il planifie pour vous.

column1:
SensyBEE va chercher l'économie optimale sans sacrifier votre confort, et vous le constaterez sur votre facture !

SensyBEE coupe automatiquement toute consommation anormale (un radiateur électrique allumé alors que la fenêtre est ouverte) ou inutile (un écran en veille pendant 10 à 15 heures par jour).


SensyBEE devient le gardien de votre installation pendant les nuits, les Week-Ends ou les vacances.


                                                   

SensyBEE en fait plus pour vous !


SensyBEE est une gamme complète d'objets connectés qui répondront à un interface unique dans un réseau sécurisé et extensible :

- les modules de mesure et réduction de consommation (dont les prises)

- les modules qui vont analyser les paramètres de votre environnement (température, CO, COV, présence, luminosité, humidité, qualité de l'air et niveau sonore...)

- Les capteurs qui peuvent alerter (fumée, intrusion, chocs ou mouvements, et plus encore à venir...)



Le tout est piloté par un Logiciel de supervision qui est fourni avec chaque appareil, pour prendre le contrôle si vous le désirez.


LES ""PLUS"" DU CONCEPT


DEBALLEZ ET BRANCHEZ !

Nos prises fonctionnent sans assistance, et vous rendent la vie facile !


PAS DE ""BOX"" NI ABONNEMENT MENSUEL A SOUSCRIRE !

Vous vous équipez de l'une de nos passerelles et vous n'avez aucun autre engagement auprès de la société IDEOVITRA. Nous n'allons pas vous vendre un service sur abonnement et revenir chaque mois vous expliquer comment réaliser des économies, notre système fonctionne complètement de manière autonome,  et le logiciel bénéficiera de mises à jour gratuites à télécharger. 

Ne réglez que les modules, et déployez au gré de vos besoins !


UTILISABLE PARTOUT - GRACE AU CONNECTEUR INTERNATIONAL I.E.C.
column3:
/>


PRISE ROTATIVE - S'ADAPTE A TOUTE SITUATION


LA TECHNOLOGIE SENSYBEE


Nous sommes l'une des premières entreprises à exploiter le standard LR-WPAN au sein de modules avec des capacités d'auto-apprentissage :


- les prises et capteurs ont une intelligence embarquée en mode local et identifient la façon optimale d'allumer ou éteindre des appareils

- le logiciel fourni permet d'agréger toutes les remontées d'informations pour les exploiter de façon logique

- le réseau se déploie facilement et la maintenance est réduite au minimum


et surtout SensyBEE VOUS détecte, et non votre smartphone ni votre tablette pour prendre les meilleures décisions !


PRENEZ LE CONTRÔLE DE VOTRE ENVIRONNEMENT !


Nos passerelles pilotent les prises et les capteurs et notre logiciel de supervision en ""responsive design"" vous permet de tout contrôler depuis votre smartphone, tablette, PC et même depuis un serveur cloud de votre choix (Clouds sur abonnements que vous pouvez souscrire directement auprès du prestataire).


                                                  

SENSYBEE AIME LES DEVELOPPEURS


Nous sommes heureux d'ouvrir nos développements aux utilisateurs avertis. Durant la campagne de crowdfunding nous proposons gratuitement un kit de développement, pour permettre à chacun de réaliser sa propre application.

Après avoir passé votre commande vous pouvez laisser exprimer votre créativité ou nous consulter - une assistance technique sera ouverte.


NOS PASSERELLES PYTHON SUPPORTENT WINDOWS ET LINUX
column8:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">


NOTRE LOGICIEL VOUS AIDE A RENDRE LE MONDE PLUS VERT

column1:
Nous vous recommandons d'utiliser nos produits tels qu'ils ont été conçus : pour être utilisés simplement, en les laissant créer pour vous le meilleur scénario de gestion électrique de vos appareils. Néanmoins après une période les utilisateurs passionnés seront tentés de créer leur propre algorithme,notre logiciel est là pour eux !


Toutes les prises et capteurs remontent en temps réel des informations (température, humidité, luminosité, qualité de l'air, etc...) et vous pouvez en temps réel les analyser, en déduire vos propres règles de paramétrage.

Prenez le contrôle de votre environnement tout en maîtrisant votre confort et vos consommations !


                                                      


POURQUOI AVONS NOUS BESOIN DE VOTRE SOUTIEN FINANCIER ?

Nous pensons que SensyBEE est un produit fantastique et vous allez nous aider à le lancer.

Nos objectifs sont simples : nous devons financer les moules d'injection et l'obtention des certifications. Les coûts mentionnés dans nos objectifs sont élevés, et correspondent aux frais à venir pour les outillages et validations - soit minimum 20,000 euros qui nous permettent de garantir la livraison rapide des premiers produits.

Comme vous le supposez ce projet est déjà en partie financé mais nous envisageons de finaliser d'autres produits pour que la gamme soit réellement complète.
column3:
>Nos ambitions sont en réalité plus élevées, car nous voulons offrir une gamme complète d'objets alors nous comptons réellement sur nos ""backers"" !

VOUS SEREZ RECOMPENSES EN RETOUR

Les prix de lancement sont très agressifs lors de la campagne de crowdfunding, parce que nous voulons avant tout démontrer la qualité de nos produits et le sérieux de leur conception. Nous avons tout pour assurer la livraison des premières commandes même si nous n'atteignons pas l'objectif, mais nous comptons sur vous pour faire mieux que çà !

Rappelez vous, toute contribution même minimale est importante pour nous :

column1: • Supportez nous en achetant un T-Shirt, et portez les couleurs de SensyBEE ! Nous cherchons une audience maximale auprès des supporters qui adhèrent à notre projet ! Cela nous motive bien au delà de l'aspect financier.

• Démarrez avec le «Starter» kit, et vous nous donnez déjà l'opportunité de produire le dispositif majeur de notre concept : le module «BEE-Control », tout en rejoignant la liste de contributeurs actifs pour un monde plus écologique !

A vous, famille, amis et relations professionnelles avec qui nous partageons passionnément ce projet depuis des mois, vos soutiens et encouragements sont précieux, continuez !

Votre contribution en devenant un utilisateur de SensyBEE à l'occasion de ce lancement attestera de votre confiance. Equipez-vous et parlez en autour de vous !

Partagez cette page avec vos amis et relations !


",">> Lisez la version Française

We are proud to introduce our “SensyBEE“ range of connected and active devices, a total solution in energy management and sensors for the industry and private use.                             Our aim is to provide a valuable technological approach to allow you to harvest energy and take control of your environment without sacrificing your comfort.In the following we'd like to share with you our present development and we sincerely hope that what we've done so far will motivate you to help us finance the next steps of the project: creating more connected devices in one single networtk, helping you to supervise your entire private or business environment, in all SIMPLICITY!

WITH NO EFFORT AND NO PROGRAMMING!  Our exclusive plugs and sensors will generate                                  “Beautiful Energy Economies!”                                                          B-E-E ""These devices have no specific target population, it is useful and needed for everyone around the world to think about energy conservation!""

SensyBEE is ideal in private and professional use, and we shall welcome distributors willing to represent the company.Look at our specific bundles or contact us directly!    What makes SensyBEE different?Every product on the market is asking you to program - we don't!SensyBEE is  an extremely sophisticated but simple-to-use energy harvesting technology.- Energy savings all year long (nigths, weeks ends, vacation).- Flexibility because you don't need to program, the plug learns by itself !- Fast and low cost installation, with reduced impact on the environment.                 Immediately start to spare money in energy harvesting.

SensyBEE products are not another gadget asking you to think about how to take control of everything.SensyBEE products have the embedded intelligence to monitor energy consumption without any other programming need: just plug in and let work!Get rid of your smartphone, your tablet and PC : let SensyBEE help you to reduce energy waste  in a simple way!      We spare you the hassle of programming, you just unbox and plug! Our plugs and sensors shall automatically inter-connect to each other with no wiring, no programming : our embedded dynamic predictive software analyses automatically the need for energy, the planning, and makes local rules to kill vampire power consumption.                   Knowledge is power - get energy ON NEED ONLY!No monthly fee to pay for a service - just make economies!SensyBEE is more cost effective and easier than using conventional “smart” plugs, because we are not just metering. SensyBEE is proactively planning for you when a device can be totally switched off or not.And our optional sensors are increasing the comfort and directly controlling the activity at each strategic spot, and you can implement more modules upon your own preferences and needs!

SensyBEE means guaranteed ease-of-use with huge impact on your future energy bills!SensyBEE will help you cut standby costs dramatically : let's assume that every appliance you connect will be completely shut off about 12 to 20 hours per day, on working days, nigths, some week-ends and vacation,                         You can easily predict your own economies !SensyBEE will contribute with you to a greener world: you can easily bring your contribution to a safer environment and secure the fossil and natural resources long term,                       BEE pragmatic: stop using energy with no reason!                                                      What can SensyBEE do better for you?SensyBEE products will be a complete range of connected devices with one single interface, flexible and future-proof.   We’ve created a self-programming energy harvesting network, with the embedded intelligence at local level composed of interacting devices:• Different metering and energy harvesting intelligent plugs and more modules are envisioned.• Sensors for environmental parameters are to come: Temperature, CO, COV , Presence, Luminosity, Humidity, Noise Level...most are finished • Sensors for alerts: smokes, fire, intrusion, shocks or movements... prototypes are on the shelves but not finalized (need further design work and moulds)And a Dasboard is offered to supervise how efficiently the economies are made and to allow you to take full control.Easily get started - It's really plug-and-work!SensyBEE makes your life easier with no hassle of looking after details. Our PLUGS work as stand-alone vampire killers without external assistance. And this with unlimited flexibility!SensyBEE is easy to install and maintain:

“Out of the box and immediately ACTIVE and EFFICIENT”With SensyBEE you acquire Local Intelligence:• It acquires history automatically during the set up phase• Then it schedules all by itself the best economic scenario

Completely HANDS- and MIND-FREE solution""                                                                            Use Worldwide!We’ve created the products with the International IEC connector, which is perfect for using the plugs in connection with any electrical or electronic device, such as PCs, printers, hifi and video. In addition we shall offer connectors and adaptors to any country standard – please have a look at our website SENSYBEE - Inspired Energy- we’ve sorted out a specific selection of articles to match any plugging situation.                                                        Unique Rotating Plug FeatureWe’ve created a “rotating plug” feature, with the benefit of orienting the plug on any device, for instance if there is a ventilation on the computer, you can easily match any kind of situation and optimize placement!Harvest energy and take control of your environment and comfort

with no wiring, no programming. They will report at regular intervals the data

they have acquired, in a local mode:  Real-time electricity monitoring, but not only! Other parameters like humidity, temperature, CO, COV, etc can be monitored upon your own preferences.                                                     Keep 100% control with the dashboardOur Dashboard will allow you to routinely perform checks and fine tune adjustments upon your own preferences and life habits: on-site Real-time DASHBOARD and Cloud monitoring are included.                   Monitor everything from everywhere in your premises
Our solutions are really simple, and you don’t need to

be a programmer to make the best use of it. PC, Smartphone and tablet can be used with our gateway but these are not necessary to start! Our responsive design dashboard will automatically match your device characteristics!

fantastic product range with huge potential,                                 and you can make it happen WITH US !As you understand, our project has already been partly financed by private supporters (including ourselves!), and we are now reaching a line where further investments only can contribute to make SensyBEE a complete range of interconnected devices.  Our goals are simple: the largest costs
that SensyBEE faces are injection mold tooling (for future devices) and obtaining certifications for the whole range which is almost in place and allow us to start shipping to all countries.

The cost for these two processes are huge. Our minimum goal-amount reflects this cost. In order to guarantee delivery of the first devices in the next three months, and to meet all the technical and production challenges, we require a
minimum of  $ 20,000. But our real goal is higher like our ambitions:
If we reach $ 20,000 we can already guarantee that we
shall release the other BEE-Control (4 different plug units are envisioned) and the Sensy-BEE (notably the RF version which is in finalization)
Should we reach $ 35,000 or more we shall finalize the
additional gates and freeze design of our other sensors (air quality, humidity, movement, and a few surprises to expect!)
Should we we reach $ 50,000 we can offer the complete set
of products, including a GSM gate to be completely independant from internet connections!
Indiegogo will go directly to software improvement and manufacturing of the SensyBEE which shall be ordered.
What you get in returnWe are releasing the products at discounted prices for
early birds. Retail prices will be higher after the crowdfunding campaign.
Even if we don’t meet our goal we’ll still deliver the
perks. But we chose $80K (about 1000 units) as our goal because we think that’s
the minimum number of SensyBEE modules we need to manufacture in order to
launch the product in a timely manner and prove that our manufacturing quality
During our Crowdfunding campaign we are also offering an open-source application and the ability to upgrade the
network and plugs to other applications: your imagination will motivate us,
please share with us! We shall welcome your feedback and we shall reward you for
the additional extensions you shall make possible with our devices.
please share this page with your friends!
for your support!                                              Challenges / Risks – our RoadMap
Production already began in March, as we are
currently testing dozens of our plugs in a real industrial environment.Should SENSYBEE meet its $80,000 funding goal we have everything in
place to ship by August this year.
There will be more devices to offer in the near future and we kindly
ask our backers to watch our timeline vs. the anticipated planning.
We are keen to secure our backers the highest possible service in order to
customize the plugs and sensors they will purchase, now and in the future!
Be assured we are working hard to reward you with products which shall address all of the expectations we have raised so
For this AMBITIOUS PROJECT we have a dedicated contact and helpdesk, and
we shall be pleased to share ideas and solutions to support YOUR future wishes.
The team is made up of electronics and firmware engineers living in U.S.A. and Europe (in France and in Luxembourg). We are ideally positioned as we benefit
from the skills of unique engineers with
multicultural technical background to extract the most of each countries’
Our founder Claude LEFRANCOIS has run several computer and service
companies and he has already successfully created other startups. Our Electronics Engineer Mr.
Sami TEJ has 15 years’ experience in custom developments with communication and RF

devices. These two are the innovators, and they are already putting a strong support team together.  Claude      Sami     DavidClaude is recognized for his entrepreneurial skills and his ability to motivate the team, he likes to work hard and he challenges the team to deliver the right quality at the agreed deadline.Sami is passionate about electronics, particularly the Internet of Things and ""M2M"". With his academic background  - ""Masters in Electronics"" -  his professional background and the dynamic team around him, he is working hard to turn our vision of the future into our realizations, taking care of the hardware development and production.David will be joining the team for International Sales and Marketing. He has worked for the last 20 years in business development and custom applications for the industry.
Among our high priorities in setting up this new business we are placing CUSTOMER SATISFACTION first.
Like most innovations the SENSYBEE concept started when facing the
reality: we wanted to control our home energy spending but we were tired of
cabling and dealing with IP networking requirements. We then discovered
the first RF modules and the ability to mesh in a home network very simply, and
started thinking we could develop a complete solution which requires no
programming, no networking, no internet: something simple, reliable, with low
Also we are convinced that measuring is not enough, our solutions
PROACTIVELY play a physical role, with an active and autonomous contribution to
vampire energy harvesting: a smartgrid programmer can never take all
parameters into account, every minute, every hour or every day: so we’ve
decided to create a “self-programming energy harvesting” network, composed of
sensors to measure and detect, but also act like our active plugs, with the
We wanted something simple and flexible
In our vision, we wanted to have something which does not require any
remote control (for instance your mobile phone). Looking intensively at all the
solutions on the market, you can be assured a majority are still asking you to
perform actions via smartphone, tablet or PC: we provide a completely HANDS-
We also wanted something completely secured!
We have a secured control at all levels of interaction with the plugs,
sensors, and each extra device will automatically have a secure connection to
Other ways you can helpThank you for reading this far. We are also honored to
every contribution is VERY important to us :
us with the T-Shirt, this is already a way to prove that you are
supporting the concept as we are looking at reaching maximal
audience of supporters who believe our concept is right ! This
motivates us far beyond the financial aspect!
for the «Starter» kit, and you give us the opportunity to release
the KEY part of our project, you get the «BEE-Control » and you  already enter the world of « positive contributors » to
our family, our friends, and our professional network to whom we are
announcing the release of our first physical products after months of
development, your encouragements are great (keep doing!).
contribution in joining the community of SensyBEE users during this
crowdfunding campaign is also very important to us, as this tells
everyone you HAVE TRUST what we are doing !Help us get the word out! Let your friends and followers know what we’re

doing to move the Internet of Things and ecology forward.                                                   Technical Specifications:FAQWe shall keep you informed on questions and answer to everyone in a timely manner. You may address your questions to start@sensybee.com !SensyBEE in the PRESS We have a very ambitious communication campaign and we promised to keep you posted on every article being published. NOW THIS IS STARTING !SCOOP IT http://www.scoop.it/t/domotique-sur-internet VEOOZ  http://www.veooz.com/media/rH7MvFw/galleryDOMOTIQUE I PHONE http://www.domotique-iphone.com/sensybee-by-ideovitra-33062/UNIVERS DOMOTIQUE http://blog.univers-domotique.com/2014/04/sensybee-by-ideovitra/TECHNOLOGY INTEGRATORhttp://www.technologyintegrator.net/article/sensybee-ideovitra-launching-onto-indigogo/1#FINDEENhttp://fr.findeen.com/homeseer,2.htmlTECHCINEMAhttp://www.techcinema.com/2014/04/sensybee-reducing-electricity-bills-easily.htmlREPORTCROWDhttp://www.reportcrowd.com/technology/74389-SensyBEE---Inspired-EnergyWHOT WI http://ja.whotwi.com/LrnDub/friendships/followers_except_friends/1TOTALLY MEhttp://www.totally.me/hashtag/SensybeePAPER LIhttp://paper.li/HiddenWires/1299677384Media

Nous sommes fiers de vous présenter SensyBEE, un concept révolutionnaire pour vous faire économiser de l'énergie sans sacrifier votre confort.Nos prises et nos capteurs se déploient indifféremment à votre domicile ou dans votre environnement professionnel. SensyBEE est la dernière génération de prise connectée autonome dans la coupure des courants de veille.REALISEZ DES ECONOMIES DE FACON SIMPLE, SANS PROGRAMMATION !""BEE"" signifie ""Abeille"" en anglais (Beautiful Energy Economies = de Belles Economies d'Energie), et l'image associée de l'abeille est une façon de vous montrer que nous allons ""butiner"" partout ou l'énergie est consommée de façon anormale ou inutile, pour vous faire réaliser de vraies économies et contribuer à la protection de l'environnement !                                                           En quoi le concept SensyBEE est-il supérieur aux autres solutions ?SensyBEE est une gamme complète sophistiquée dans son principe mais finalement très simple à déployer :- pour réaliser des économies chaque jour de l'année (journée, nuit, vacances) sur les appareils en veille- flexible et sans programmation, la prise apprend toute seule !- Rapide d'installation avec un impact immédiat sur l'environnement (courant de repos inférieur à 1mW, bien meilleur que tout courant de veille classique).Tous les produits présents sur le marché vous demandent des efforts pour programmer.
Avec SensyBEE vous branchez et laissez agir !

SensyBEE n'est donc pas un Gadget de plus dans votre environnement, et il ne vous demande pas de réfléchir à comment en tirer le meilleur usage : il le fait tout seul.SensyBEE embarque une intelligence artificielle qui vous permet de vous affranchir de votre smartphone ou votre tablette, tout est simple !Nos prises et nos capteurs vont se connecter automatiquement entre eux, et le logiciel embarqué en mode local va réaliser un planning-expert pour moduler les allumages et extinctions des appareils qui lui sont raccordés.           Le savoir est embarqué pour les meilleurs résultats en local SensyBEE est un concept réellement intelligent, car il planifie pour vous.

SensyBEE va chercher l'économie optimale sans sacrifier votre confort, et vous le constaterez sur votre facture !SensyBEE coupe automatiquement toute consommation anormale (un radiateur électrique allumé alors que la fenêtre est ouverte) ou inutile (un écran en veille pendant 10 à 15 heures par jour).SensyBEE devient le gardien de votre installation pendant les nuits, les Week-Ends ou les vacances.                                                   SensyBEE en fait plus pour vous !SensyBEE est une gamme complète d'objets connectés qui répondront à un interface unique dans un réseau sécurisé et extensible :- les modules de mesure et réduction de consommation (dont les prises)- les modules qui vont analyser les paramètres de votre environnement (température, CO, COV, présence, luminosité, humidité, qualité de l'air et niveau sonore...)- Les capteurs qui peuvent alerter (fumée, intrusion, chocs ou mouvements, et plus encore à venir...)Le tout est piloté par un Logiciel de supervision qui est fourni avec chaque appareil, pour prendre le contrôle si vous le désirez.LES ""PLUS"" DU CONCEPTDEBALLEZ ET BRANCHEZ !Nos prises fonctionnent sans assistance, et vous rendent la vie facile !PAS DE ""BOX"" NI ABONNEMENT MENSUEL A SOUSCRIRE !Vous vous équipez de l'une de nos passerelles et vous n'avez aucun autre engagement auprès de la société IDEOVITRA. Nous n'allons pas vous vendre un service sur abonnement et revenir chaque mois vous expliquer comment réaliser des économies, notre système fonctionne complètement de manière autonome,  et le logiciel bénéficiera de mises à jour gratuites à télécharger. Ne réglez que les modules, et déployez au gré de vos besoins !UTILISABLE PARTOUT - GRACE AU CONNECTEUR INTERNATIONAL I.E.C.                                                          PRISE ROTATIVE - S'ADAPTE A TOUTE SITUATIONLA TECHNOLOGIE SENSYBEENous sommes l'une des premières entreprises à exploiter le standard LR-WPAN au sein de modules avec des capacités d'auto-apprentissage :- les prises et capteurs ont une intelligence embarquée en mode local et identifient la façon optimale d'allumer ou éteindre des appareils- le logiciel fourni permet d'agréger toutes les remontées d'informations pour les exploiter de façon logique- le réseau se déploie facilement et la maintenance est réduite au minimumet surtout SensyBEE VOUS détecte, et non votre smartphone ni votre tablette pour prendre les meilleures décisions !PRENEZ LE CONTRÔLE DE VOTRE ENVIRONNEMENT !Nos passerelles pilotent les prises et les capteurs et notre logiciel de supervision en ""responsive design"" vous permet de tout contrôler depuis votre smartphone, tablette, PC et même depuis un serveur cloud de votre choix (Clouds sur abonnements que vous pouvez souscrire directement auprès du prestataire).                                                  SENSYBEE AIME LES DEVELOPPEURSNous sommes heureux d'ouvrir nos développements aux utilisateurs avertis. Durant la campagne de crowdfunding nous proposons gratuitement un kit de développement, pour permettre à chacun de réaliser sa propre application.Après avoir passé votre commande vous pouvez laisser exprimer votre créativité ou nous consulter - une assistance technique sera ouverte.NOS PASSERELLES PYTHON SUPPORTENT WINDOWS ET LINUXNOTRE LOGICIEL VOUS AIDE A RENDRE LE MONDE PLUS VERT

Nous vous recommandons d'utiliser nos produits tels qu'ils ont été conçus : pour être utilisés simplement, en les laissant créer pour vous le meilleur scénario de gestion électrique de vos appareils. Néanmoins après une période les utilisateurs passionnés seront tentés de créer leur propre algorithme,notre logiciel est là pour eux !Toutes les prises et capteurs remontent en temps réel des informations (température, humidité, luminosité, qualité de l'air, etc...) et vous pouvez en temps réel les analyser, en déduire vos propres règles de paramétrage.

Prenez le contrôle de votre environnement tout en maîtrisant votre confort et vos consommations !                                                      POURQUOI AVONS NOUS BESOIN DE VOTRE SOUTIEN FINANCIER ?Nous pensons que SensyBEE est un produit fantastique et vous allez nous aider à le lancer.Nos objectifs sont simples : nous devons financer les moules d'injection et l'obtention des certifications. Les coûts mentionnés dans nos objectifs sont élevés, et correspondent aux frais à venir pour les outillages et validations - soit minimum 20,000 euros qui nous permettent de garantir la livraison rapide des premiers produits.Comme vous le supposez ce projet est déjà en partie financé mais nous envisageons de finaliser d'autres produits pour que la gamme soit réellement complète. Nos ambitions sont en réalité plus élevées, car nous voulons offrir une gamme complète d'objets alors nous comptons réellement sur nos ""backers"" !VOUS SEREZ RECOMPENSES EN RETOURLes prix de lancement sont très agressifs lors de la campagne de crowdfunding, parce que nous voulons avant tout démontrer la qualité de nos produits et le sérieux de leur conception. Nous avons tout pour assurer la livraison des premières commandes même si nous n'atteignons pas l'objectif, mais nous comptons sur vous pour faire mieux que çà !Rappelez vous, toute contribution même minimale est importante pour nous :

Supportez nous en achetant un T-Shirt, et portez les couleurs de SensyBEE ! Nous cherchons une audience maximale auprès des supporters qui adhèrent à notre projet ! Cela nous motive bien au delà de l'aspect financier.

Démarrez avec le «Starter» kit, et vous nous donnez déjà l'opportunité de produire le dispositif majeur de notre concept : le module «BEE-Control », tout en rejoignant la liste de contributeurs actifs pour un monde plus écologique !

A vous, famille, amis et relations professionnelles avec qui nous partageons passionnément ce projet depuis des mois, vos soutiens et encouragements sont précieux, continuez !Votre contribution en devenant un utilisateur de SensyBEE à l'occasion de ce lancement attestera de votre confiance. Equipez-vous et parlez en autour de vous !Partagez cette page avec vos amis et relations !",53.0,4,"2 Campaigns

The Tedford family was devastated by a house fire on October 26, 2013. Thankfully, no one in the family was hurt. However, the Tedfords did suffer the tragic loss of their family dog, Shadow. The Tedfords are a loving and giving family in our community, and it's time for us to give back to them in their time of need. Let Keith, Vicki, Bryan, and Shawn know how much you care about them by offering a donation to help support their rebuilding effort.

Wow, you guys are awesome. We raised over $1,000 in just one night! I know the website says our goal is $500, but we want to raise much more than that. No matter how much, any amount that you can give will help.
The deadline for this campaign is Monday, December 2nd. This is so we can receive the funds in time to give them to the Tedfords by Christmas.
Thank you to everyone for your support.

column3: >The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

column1: If every home in Dallas, Texas used a bFan® to conserve electricity, we could save enough energy to power 75,000 homes each year.

column2: >

column1: The body will extend from 19” tall to 37” tall. The air duct is 12” wide and ¾” deep. The base is 6.25” tall X 7” deep and 12” wide. The base can be set in any direction, either under the bed or pointing outward from the bed. It can be place anywhere around the bed from the foot to the top and anywhere along the side of the bed.
• The bFan® is for people who want to save money on their air conditioning bill and not go broke trying to sleep cooler.
• The bFan® is for people who are hot sleepers and really want to sleep cooler or have cooler sheets at night.
• The bFan® is for women who suffer from the effects of menopause including night sweats derived from hot flashes.
• The bFan® is for people who have a medical condition that causes their body to get hot at night and want to sleep cooler.
• For people wanting to take advantage of the huge health benefits obtained from sleeping cooler.

The bottom line is that almost everyone will benefit from the bFan®. Whether you are a hot sleeper just trying to get a good night’s sleep or looking to gain maximum health benefits as well as lowering your electric bill, the bFan® is for you. Many people have been able to lower their electric bill by as much as 50%

column2: >The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

column1: The bFan®’s innovative design removes the heat that is generated by your body and gets trapped inside your bed (your sheets, comforter, and mattress). This unique system enables you to sleep much cooler and deeper at night and save you money on air conditioning costs.
By utilizing convection, one of the primary cooling methods of our body, we are able to sleep cooler without having to lower our thermostat to a financially challenging level.

The bFan® will help you sleep cooler at night and will help people who are hot sleepers regardless of reason, as well as help people with heath related sleep issues like night sweats. But did you know that it can also make you healthier?
Several studies have shown the benefits of sleeping cooler. These studies show that sleeping cooler can help with:
Weight loss, lowering the risk of metabolic diseases, deeper sleep for better body restoration, reduction of insomnia, aids in the promotion of anti-aging hormones and helps combat cancer.

Research conducted by the University of South Australia suggests that sleeping cooler will result in a better night's sleep, and help cure insomnia. This is because the body's core temperature actually needs to drop in order to initiate sleep. So, if you're having trouble falling and staying asleep, the bFan® could be your savior. ( http://w3.unisa.edu.au/unisanews/2004/June/inso... )

The bFan® can help produce Melatonin by lowering your core body temperature. Releasing needed melatonin not only tells your body it's time to sleep, it's a hormone that also promotes anti-aging. The cooling effect of the bFan® actually helps your body produce melatonin when you allow it to cool you sufficiently.
Melatonin regulates our cycles, mood,reproduction, weight and may help combat Cancer (web http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/arch...).

The bFan® can help decrease your risk of metabolic illnesses. Studies have shown that sleeping in a cooler bed helps you burn calories while awake. It also helps increase ""brown"" or good fat in the body, which lowers the risk of metabolic diseases like diabetes.

The bFan® will help you get a better night’s sleep. During the night, if your bed is too hot (or alternately too cold), your body will work to regulate your temperature. Doctors have stated for years that a cooler bed is linked to deeper sleep, whereas a hot bed increases wakefulness and decreases slow wave sleep.These are just a few reasons the bFan® is a healthy product (web https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24954193).

column2: >The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

column1: About 12 years ago I invented the very first Bedfan to become available to the market (see Bedfan.com). It was highly successful and well received. We have been in many magazines, newspapers, television shows etc.The response has been awesome.

From this experience we have been able to position ourselves now to make the perfect Bedfan. By backing our project, you will be taking advantage of years of research and testing bundled into a new and well thought-out product.

When we first started making our original product we started in our garage until it just got too big. We eventually moved all production to our injection molding facility in Boerne, Texas, We are still there today and will be building the new bFan® there as well.

Over the last 10 years with have talked with many of our customers and listened to their ideas on what they would like to see in the next version of the Bedfan. We took those ideas and have implemented many of them into this new version that we call the bFan®.
These are the things that we have improved on:
Increased the stability with a balanced footing and lower center of gravity
• Made the fan much quieter and much stronger
The following video will show some of the improvements and how we have accomplished them.

The installation of the bFan® is very simple. In this next video we will show you just how simple it is.. For this installation we installed the bFan® at the foot of the bed, which is the preferred location. From the foot of the bed the air will naturally travel along your body and exit at the top of the bed around your shoulders.
The bFan® is intended to deliver the air between the top and bottom sheets of your bed so that it is in direct contact with your body.

One of the nice improvements to this new unit is that the base is extremely sturdy with a wide and deep footing as well as a lower center of gravity. This allows the user to place the fan anywhere they like and not worry about stability.See the following full video for installation instructions.

column2: >The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

column1: The bFan® is fully controllable from off to high and all points in between. When you first start using the bFan® you should start with the bFan® on low and gradually work your way up. At the same time you will raise the temperature in your room by a couple degrees each night. The objective is to bring the fan to about half of full power yet still feel cool. After a few nights of doing this you will reach a point of comfort that you have never felt before. This is equilibrium and from this point you can stop changing the thermostat and start sleeping deeper and sounder.

For the first night, set the fan on low and see if it is too cool in bed for you. If your bed is too cool, you need to raise the temperature in your room for the next night. Follow this pattern until you have reached about half power on the fan and you are no longer too cool.

The point of equilibrium is the point at which the bFan® is evacuating your body heat at about the same rate that it is being created. Above equilibrium will be too cool and below equilibrium will be too warm.

By adjusting the thermostat in your house a few degrees at a time, along with adjusting the bFan® speed, you will eventually find that you are significantly reducing the amount of electricity being consumed thus lowering your electric bill at the same time.

It's supporters like you who have played such a vital role in getting us to where we are today. The bFan® is a simple yet sophisticated product, and with your support we can make a big impact on the world around us by helping others to sleep cooler and save on their energy costs. The bFan® is the perfect improvement to how we traditionally cool our sleeping environment. Of course, making and delivering the bFan® requires substantial resources in order to meet all our needs during manufacturing and distribution. As we gear up to start production, we want to make sure that the product we deliver is beyond your expectations. That's how we designed the bFan®. Come and join us for this next exciting step and see what we can build together. Rest assured you will be happy with the results.
All about us, this project and our history
","The bFan® is available with more information on our web site
If every home in Dallas, Texas used a bFan® to conserve electricity, we could save enough energy to power 75,000 homes each year.
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

The body will extend from 19” tall to 37” tall. The air duct is 12” wide and ¾” deep. The base is 6.25” tall X 7” deep and 12” wide. The base can be set in any direction, either under the bed or pointing outward from the bed. It can be place anywhere around the bed from the foot to the top and anywhere along the side of the bed.
The bFan® is for people who want to save money on their air conditioning bill and not go broke trying to sleep cooler.
The bFan® is for people who are hot sleepers and really want to sleep cooler or have cooler sheets at night.
The bFan® is for women who suffer from the effects of menopause including night sweats derived from hot flashes.
The bFan® is for people who have a medical condition that causes their body to get hot at night and want to sleep cooler.
For people wanting to take advantage of the huge health benefits obtained from sleeping cooler.

The bottom line is that almost everyone will benefit from the bFan®. Whether you are a hot sleeper just trying to get a good night’s sleep or looking to gain maximum health benefits as well as lowering your electric bill, the bFan® is for you. Many people have been able to lower their electric bill by as much as 50%
The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

The bFan®’s innovative design removes the heat that is generated by your body and gets trapped inside your bed (your sheets, comforter, and mattress). This unique system enables you to sleep much cooler and deeper at night and save you money on air conditioning costs.
By utilizing convection, one of the primary cooling methods of our body, we are able to sleep cooler without having to lower our thermostat to a financially challenging level.

The bFan® will help you sleep cooler at night and will help people who are hot sleepers regardless of reason, as well as help people with heath related sleep issues like night sweats. But did you know that it can also make you healthier?
Several studies have shown the benefits of sleeping cooler. These studies show that sleeping cooler can help with:
Weight loss, lowering the risk of metabolic diseases, deeper sleep for better body restoration, reduction of insomnia, aids in the promotion of anti-aging hormones and helps combat cancer.

Research conducted by the University of South Australia suggests that sleeping cooler will result in a better night's sleep, and help cure insomnia. This is because the body's core temperature actually needs to drop in order to initiate sleep. So, if you're having trouble falling and staying asleep, the bFan® could be your savior. ( http://w3.unisa.edu.au/unisanews/2004/June/inso... )

The bFan® can help produce Melatonin by lowering your core body temperature. Releasing needed melatonin not only tells your body it's time to sleep, it's a hormone that also promotes anti-aging. The cooling effect of the bFan® actually helps your body produce melatonin when you allow it to cool you sufficiently.
Melatonin regulates our cycles, mood,reproduction, weight and may help combat Cancer (web http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/arch...).

The bFan® can help decrease your risk of metabolic illnesses. Studies have shown that sleeping in a cooler bed helps you burn calories while awake. It also helps increase ""brown"" or good fat in the body, which lowers the risk of metabolic diseases like diabetes.

The bFan® will help you get a better night’s sleep. During the night, if your bed is too hot (or alternately too cold), your body will work to regulate your temperature. Doctors have stated for years that a cooler bed is linked to deeper sleep, whereas a hot bed increases wakefulness and decreases slow wave sleep.These are just a few reasons the bFan® is a healthy product (web https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24954193).
The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

About 12 years ago I invented the very first Bedfan to become available to the market (see Bedfan.com). It was highly successful and well received. We have been in many magazines, newspapers, television shows etc.The response has been awesome.

From this experience we have been able to position ourselves now to make the perfect Bedfan. By backing our project, you will be taking advantage of years of research and testing bundled into a new and well thought-out product.

When we first started making our original product we started in our garage until it just got too big. We eventually moved all production to our injection molding facility in Boerne, Texas, We are still there today and will be building the new bFan® there as well.

Over the last 10 years with have talked with many of our customers and listened to their ideas on what they would like to see in the next version of the Bedfan. We took those ideas and have implemented many of them into this new version that we call the bFan®.
These are the things that we have improved on:
Increased the stability with a balanced footing and lower center of gravity
Increased the fans total static pressure
Made the fan much quieter and much stronger
The following video will show some of the improvements and how we have accomplished them.

The installation of the bFan® is very simple. In this next video we will show you just how simple it is.. For this installation we installed the bFan® at the foot of the bed, which is the preferred location. From the foot of the bed the air will naturally travel along your body and exit at the top of the bed around your shoulders.
The bFan® is intended to deliver the air between the top and bottom sheets of your bed so that it is in direct contact with your body.

One of the nice improvements to this new unit is that the base is extremely sturdy with a wide and deep footing as well as a lower center of gravity. This allows the user to place the fan anywhere they like and not worry about stability.See the following full video for installation instructions.
The bFan® is available with more information on our web site

The bFan® is fully controllable from off to high and all points in between. When you first start using the bFan® you should start with the bFan® on low and gradually work your way up. At the same time you will raise the temperature in your room by a couple degrees each night. The objective is to bring the fan to about half of full power yet still feel cool. After a few nights of doing this you will reach a point of comfort that you have never felt before. This is equilibrium and from this point you can stop changing the thermostat and start sleeping deeper and sounder.

For the first night, set the fan on low and see if it is too cool in bed for you. If your bed is too cool, you need to raise the temperature in your room for the next night. Follow this pattern until you have reached about half power on the fan and you are no longer too cool.

The point of equilibrium is the point at which the bFan® is evacuating your body heat at about the same rate that it is being created. Above equilibrium will be too cool and below equilibrium will be too warm.

By adjusting the thermostat in your house a few degrees at a time, along with adjusting the bFan® speed, you will eventually find that you are significantly reducing the amount of electricity being consumed thus lowering your electric bill at the same time.

It's supporters like you who have played such a vital role in getting us to where we are today. The bFan® is a simple yet sophisticated product, and with your support we can make a big impact on the world around us by helping others to sleep cooler and save on their energy costs. What is FUSION?

FUSION is a height-adjustable toilet stool that helps you squat to poop better and live well.
column3: >
column12: version=v2.1"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column20: version=v2.1"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column23: original_referer=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2061222615/turbo-fusion-elevate-your-bathroom-posture-and-exp?ref=nav_search"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column26:
>

How to use the FUSION?

It is simple and intuitive. Sit on the toilet as you normally do. Pull out the FUSION to a comfortable position. Adjust the toe-piece height if and as needed, and then gently load your feet and lean forward a bit. After the use store it back under the toilet bowel. Easy enough?
column28:
>

Why get a FUSION 

FUSION's patent pending design offers unique functionality and experience, for everyone. Listed below are some key points.

#1. Squatting is better, FUSION makes it easier

It's no rocket science. Sitting creates a natural kink in the colon, to maintain continence. Squatting posture straightens the colon for a clean release. This is just how we are designed. Really.
column30: science behind squatting"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://res.cloudinary.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/v1493923829/sckmh152djajy1gccvgk.png"" src="""" style=""""/><figcaption>Sit vs. squat
column31:
science behind squatting

 

Thus, sitting on the toilet is no good for constipation, hemorrhoids, pelvic floor dysfunction, urinary infections, and many other colon diseases. A simple switch to squatting can have a big impact, and FUSION makes it easier than ever. Remember the old saying, prevention is better than cure … in this case funner too!  

#2. FUSION is height adjustable, with ease

No tools required, no cumbersome mechanisms, no need of having different footstools for different-height family members, and no need to compromise on the squat!
column33: un-compromising squat"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://res.cloudinary.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/v1493923830/utbfacukpozmnyccfwwa.jpg"" src="""" style=""""/><figcaption>Easily-adjustable height
column34:
un-compromising squat

 

You can easily adjust the toe-platform height to suit your height, experience, and taste! Thus, whether you are a beginner who never squatted before, or a pro-squatter, FUSION will serve you well.  

#3. FUSION = many in one

FUSION is like four different-height footstools + a massager, all combined in one elegant design, for the price and convenience of just one!
column35:
>

 

At the lowest level it works like the original TURBO Stool™, at the highest level it works like a flat-top stool, and then you can adjust the height to everything in between!
column37:
'>   

#4. Got bum? Get a FUSION?

Isn't that a good enough reason?! On a more serious note, we all poop. So why be shy, lets admit it and get over it. With the form and functionality of FUSION, no more hiding the stool from guests, no more embarrassments, and no more excuses. It will be a conversation piece ... a bathroom masterpiece!
column38:
>

Poop with style, and who knows, you may even inspire your fellow beings!
column39:
>

Product usage, specs, and sizing 

Usage: Sit on the toilet as you normally do. Pull out the FUSION to a comfortable position. Adjust the toe-piece height if and as needed, and then gently load your feet and lean forward a bit. After the use store it back under the toilet bowel.
column40:
>

 

Specs: FUSION dimensions are approximately 21” wide, 14” deep, and 8” high. The cutout is designed to easily fit a toilet base with diameter up to 10”. It will be made up of high quality and light weight durable plastic.
column41:
>

 

Sizing: Because of the height adjustability, FUSION comes in only one size, and one size fits all -- this is one of the areas where we have excelled compared to others. It is worth mentioning here that the height can be adjusted easily and on the fly, there are no cumbersome mechanisms and no tools needed! Thus everyone in a household can enjoy optimal squatting based on individual height, experience, and taste … no compromise!
column42: >
column43:
>

Our journey and current status

Our journey started back in 2012, and after several twists and turns we launched our flagship TURBO Stool in Jan 2016. During our TURBO campaign, we had also revealed the first FUSION model. Since then we have redesigned it to make it stronger, lighter, durable, and more affordable – of course, without compromising the quality.
column46: early prototype"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://res.cloudinary.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/v1493923839/hybbv93i4mha408zrwxb.jpg"" src="""" style=""""/><figcaption>Fusion footage: concept -&gt
column50: test production"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://res.cloudinary.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/v1493923840/tqyaqrgb3uabespvclqa.jpg"" src="""" style=""""/><figcaption>Fusion footage: tooling -&gt
column51:
test production

 

What you see in our video is the real deal, the actual product, not just a prototype. We have gone through many concepts and design tweaks to get here, what we think is an optimal design. We have already done all the hard work and eliminated the risks. Tooling is also completed, and we are ready for production. But to get to this point we have spent countless hours, used up all our savings, and taken some loans. Now we need funding to purchase the raw material in volume, so that we can make it available at an affordable price to all.
column53:
>

Source: Mayo Clinic, Florida Hospital, and About IBS. We already have so many worries in life, let this not be one of those.

column2: >M2 Hive: world's most powerful Wi-Fi system
>A Wi-Fi system that has your whole house covered

column1: We’ve all experienced Wi-Fi problems whether it’s a slow connection, reboots, constant buffering or you just can’t connect in some rooms of your house. It’s really annoying, especially as our homes become smarter with voice assistants and connected thermostats, and our demand on bandwidth increases with streaming services and online gaming.

Our current Wi-Fi systems aren’t able to keep up with the demands of a connected home and today we're saying ""enough is enough""! The M2 Hive gives you the speed, connectivity, simplicity, and control that your home Wi-Fi needs and deserves. Finally, say goodbye to bad Wi-Fi. Hello to the M2 Hive.

When we say fast Wi-Fi, we mean it. M2 Hive is twice as fast as the industry average. No more waiting for your favorite program to load or dealing with lag in your gaming.   

 

Key features

Stretch goals - upgrades to the system!

We’ve decided that with the extra funding we can give everyone even more great features for the M2 - so we’ve set some stretch goals. Reaching these goals will allow us to upgrade our incredible system even further! What are the new features? We’ll be able to build a VPN straight into the system, with super advanced encryption and privacy algorithms, leveraging the same solution used by the NSA! Think passwords are a pain? No worries, your guests will be able to log into your network directly if you are Facebook friends - it’s so much easier! We have many, many upgrades planned and reaching these stretch goals will help us deliver these upgrades to you by September!
column2:
>

 

The power is in your hands

Not only does the M2 Hive provide your home with Wi-Fi connectivity like never before, it also grants you greater control on how many people are using the Wi-Fi and how much bandwidth devices are using so your network runs as you want it to. That means when you say Bedtime, you can mean it. Also, limiting speed means that your kids can access Google, but not Netflix
column3:
great for when they should be studying. And as for your new neighbors who have been hogging your bandwidth since they moved in, they will no longer be a problem.

 

Press is talking about Mercku
column4:
>""...The M2 Wi-Fi router and M2 Hive Wi-Fi system are aimed at giving those devices the speed, control, and range they need across the whole home..."" - VentureBeat

 

Testimonials

 

Break through walls with our Wi-Fi nodes

Don’t worry we’re not inviting the Hulk to smash down your walls, there’s a lot simpler way of getting Wi-Fi in every room in your house. Our Bee nodes are small devices that you can plug into any socket. They give you a range of up to 5,000 square feet and travel through walls which means you’ll have a stable connection wherever you are.
column5:
/>

 

Stay connected

We all know what it’s like when you’re in one room asking Alexa to play your favorite album, but it drops out because one of your family starts streaming a film on Netflix. No more will you have to fight over who is slowing the Wi-Fi down.  

You can connect dozens of devices in your house and supports multiple 8K streaming.

Awards and Recognition

We usually hide our Wi-Fi systems away because they are bulky and ugly. We wanted to create a product that would be happy to show in your home. We’re very pleased to say that the industry agrees with us! We’re also proud of our team for winning numerous software and hardware awards over the years.

 

Perks available

 

Referral program

We are running a referral program. Every $250 you refer generates 1 credit, which can be redeemed for free prizes, all with free shipping! Here’s how it works:
column6:
>

Use your credits to redeem prizes at the end of the campaign. We will also update the leaderboard directly on our Indiegogo page. Here are the prizes available for you:
column7:
>

Unboxes and installs in seconds!

M2 standalone unboxing:
column8:
/>

To install the system, just plug the power cable (black) into the wall socket and plug in the internet cable (red) into your home's internet access port and you're good to go!
column11:
>

Oh, and don’t worry we’re not leaving anyone out. M2 Hive is compatible with most socket variations and we will be shipping to most countries.

 

Behind the scenes
column12:
>

 

Timeline

How we got here

It all started fourteen years ago when Mercku co-founders created the modern cell phone antenna, the very same antennae that will likely be on the phone you’re using today.

As world experts in telecommunications, we were always looking for ways to better personal communications and connectivity. Mercku was founded in 2017, because we were frustrated with the bad internet connection and slow Wi-Fi speeds that plagued homes across the world, especially with the number of devices under our roofs multiplying. We believe everyone should be able to enjoy the tech in their homes smoothly and without interruption.

Mercku's products are manufactured in a world-class facility in Shenzhen, a facility which also manufactures other Wi-Fi products, with over a decade of experience in the field. We chose this facility because it had experience with high-quality goods, and also has the capacity to produce up to a million units a month - fulfilling our needs. 

We started with M1 which was our first generation router. We sold 5 million units to one of the largest telecom companies in Asia, acting as their sole Wi-Fi provider.

However, we wanted to bring great connectivity to everyone which is why we’re here with M2 Hive. We have been working on M2's core technology for the past two years to bring everyone better Wi-Fi speeds and coverage.

 

Technical Specifications

column1:
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Brand

Are there any other products planned in the near future?

Of course! We are not only into designing great Wi-Fi, but we want to leverage the nodes to add sensors, detection, security and other features. We see Wi-Fi as the highway for which all smart home products can drive
column2: thus, we wanted to create the world's best Wi-Fi system first!
column4:
'>How do you handle returns?

Just send it back to our address and we will give you a full refund, within 30 days of recieving your product!
column6:
'>I’m a journalist and have questions, who do I contact?

You can reach out to contact@mercku.tech

What color options are there?

Just black for now, but other colors coming soon!
column8:
'>What stage of production are you at?

We have already started producing the M2 and M2 Hive!

Where can I get help if there is a problem with the product?

You can email us at contact@mercku.tech
column9:
once we ship, we will also provide other options for you to directly contact!

Who should I contact if I have other questions?

contact@mercku.tech

Campaign

Can you tell me about volume pricing? I'm interested in getting these for my building.

First off, thank you! We will provide extra incentives for high volumes, please contact us at contact@mercku.tech for more information!

How can I choose multiple perks?

The system only lets you pick one perk at a time, you'll have to select multiple items when checking out.

How much will it retail for?

We currently offer 25% - 42% off on all of our items
column10:
when these items hit the shelves, the full prices will be charged

I am an international backer how can I support your campaign?

Just select your appropriate region when checking out!

I preordered an M2 product, but I didn’t get any confirmation email. How do I check the status of the order?

That's strange! Email us at contact@mercku.tech and we'll look into your order

If I back now, is the money taken out of my account today?

Yes, it's a payment, but we don't get the money until the end of the campaign when we are about to deliver

Can you tell me more about the various packages you have available?

We have four types of perks. First, we have the standalone Wi-Fi router, good for up to 3000 square feet of space. Next, we have our patented Hive system, with four bees to cover up to 5000 square feet of space, and extremely powerful and flexible. We also have a super-system, for when you want to either have extra range or perhaps gift it for a friend/family. Lastly, we have an add-on node, which will not work unless you already have an M2, but it's for those who want to add a node but doesn't want the package of four.

What is your refund policy?

Indiegogo directly allows you to get a full refund

What’s the difference between the standard perk and secret perk?

Secret perks are for special occasions and shipping locations - and are only available through a personalized link. Standard perks are always available for purchase.

Shipping

Do you ship worldwide?

We ship to most countries worldwide. If you don't see your country, just drop us a note and we'll make sure to give you a special link.

column15:
'>When will I receive my M2?

We will start shipping in July 2018, and you'll recieve your unit by late July or August, depending on the country

Technical

Are the “Bees” 5g only?

They are both 5G and 2.4G

Does this system support US/UK/EMEA/Asia plug?
column21:
>ow does the M2 connect?

It connects automatically once you connect the power cable and the ethernet cable
column23: '>How is it better than leading brands like Google WiFi
column24: >We have a complete system build, which components such as the transceiver we produce in-house, thus reducing overall system noise and improving performance. We also have designed the best antenna in the world, helping to propagate our signals better.

It is a standard router

What devices do you support?

We support most smart home devices that require a Wi-Fi network. Alexa, Sonos, etc.

What other plug types are available for the “bees”?
column32:
>We have four types of plugs for the bees, covering North America, South America, Europe, China, Japan, Australia and most parts of the world

Where in my home should I put the M2?

We recommend placing the M2 in a central location in the house. Perhaps the living room.

Why is there no dedicated 5Ghz backhaul between the nodes?

Under our tech design structure, communication between mesh node and main router is rare the bottleneck of the performance of whole system. In this case we do not employ dedicated backhaul, considering the optimization of system robustness and energy efficiency.

Why only 60 devices when most aftermarket router can handle the full 253 clients?

Great question! We can support as many devices as you want, but we can only guarantee high performance for up to 60 devices. Too many devices will sap the network of its speed.

Would M2 be suitable for my office?

M2 Hive: world's most powerful Wi-Fi system

A Wi-Fi system that has your whole house covered

We’ve all experienced Wi-Fi problems whether it’s a slow connection, reboots, constant buffering or you just can’t connect in some rooms of your house. It’s really annoying, especially as our homes become smarter with voice assistants and connected thermostats, and our demand on bandwidth increases with streaming services and online gaming.

Our current Wi-Fi systems aren’t able to keep up with the demands of a connected home and today we're saying ""enough is enough""! The M2 Hive gives you the speed, connectivity, simplicity, and control that your home Wi-Fi needs and deserves. Finally, say goodbye to bad Wi-Fi. Hello to the M2 Hive.

When we say fast Wi-Fi, we mean it. M2 Hive is twice as fast as the industry average. No more waiting for your favorite program to load or dealing with lag in your gaming.   

 

Key features

Stretch goals - upgrades to the system!

We’ve decided that with the extra funding we can give everyone even more great features for the M2 - so we’ve set some stretch goals. Reaching these goals will allow us to upgrade our incredible system even further! What are the new features? We’ll be able to build a VPN straight into the system, with super advanced encryption and privacy algorithms, leveraging the same solution used by the NSA! Think passwords are a pain? No worries, your guests will be able to log into your network directly if you are Facebook friends - it’s so much easier! We have many, many upgrades planned and reaching these stretch goals will help us deliver these upgrades to you by September!

 

The power is in your hands

Not only does the M2 Hive provide your home with Wi-Fi connectivity like never before, it also grants you greater control on how many people are using the Wi-Fi and how much bandwidth devices are using so your network runs as you want it to. That means when you say Bedtime, you can mean it. Also, limiting speed means that your kids can access Google, but not Netflix
column33:
great for when they should be studying. And as for your new neighbors who have been hogging your bandwidth since they moved in, they will no longer be a problem.

 

Press is talking about Mercku

""...The M2 Wi-Fi router and M2 Hive Wi-Fi system are aimed at giving those devices the speed, control, and range they need across the whole home..."" - VentureBeat

 

Testimonials

 

Break through walls with our Wi-Fi nodes

Don’t worry we’re not inviting the Hulk to smash down your walls, there’s a lot simpler way of getting Wi-Fi in every room in your house. Our Bee nodes are small devices that you can plug into any socket. They give you a range of up to 5,000 square feet and travel through walls which means you’ll have a stable connection wherever you are.

 

Stay connected

We all know what it’s like when you’re in one room asking Alexa to play your favorite album, but it drops out because one of your family starts streaming a film on Netflix. No more will you have to fight over who is slowing the Wi-Fi down.  

You can connect dozens of devices in your house and supports multiple 8K streaming.

Awards and Recognition

We usually hide our Wi-Fi systems away because they are bulky and ugly. We wanted to create a product that would be happy to show in your home. We’re very pleased to say that the industry agrees with us! We’re also proud of our team for winning numerous software and hardware awards over the years.

 

Perks available

 

Referral program

We are running a referral program. Every $250 you refer generates 1 credit, which can be redeemed for free prizes, all with free shipping! Here’s how it works:

Use your credits to redeem prizes at the end of the campaign. We will also update the leaderboard directly on our Indiegogo page. Here are the prizes available for you:

Unboxes and installs in seconds!

M2 standalone unboxing:

To install the system, just plug the power cable (black) into the wall socket and plug in the internet cable (red) into your home's internet access port and you're good to go!

 

Oh, and don’t worry we’re not leaving anyone out. M2 Hive is compatible with most socket variations and we will be shipping to most countries.

 

Behind the scenes

 

Timeline

How we got here

It all started fourteen years ago when Mercku co-founders created the modern cell phone antenna, the very same antennae that will likely be on the phone you’re using today.

As world experts in telecommunications, we were always looking for ways to better personal communications and connectivity. Mercku was founded in 2017, because we were frustrated with the bad internet connection and slow Wi-Fi speeds that plagued homes across the world, especially with the number of devices under our roofs multiplying. We believe everyone should be able to enjoy the tech in their homes smoothly and without interruption.

Mercku's products are manufactured in a world-class facility in Shenzhen, a facility which also manufactures other Wi-Fi products, with over a decade of experience in the field. We chose this facility because it had experience with high-quality goods, and also has the capacity to produce up to a million units a month - fulfilling our needs. 

We started with M1 which was our first generation router. We sold 5 million units to one of the largest telecom companies in Asia, acting as their sole Wi-Fi provider.

However, we wanted to bring great connectivity to everyone which is why we’re here with M2 Hive. We have been working on M2's core technology for the past two years to bring everyone better Wi-Fi speeds and coverage.

 

Technical Specifications

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Brand

Are there any other products planned in the near future?

Of course! We are not only into designing great Wi-Fi, but we want to leverage the nodes to add sensors, detection, security and other features. We see Wi-Fi as the highway for which all smart home products can drive
column34:
thus, we wanted to create the world's best Wi-Fi system first!

How do you handle returns?

Just send it back to our address and we will give you a full refund, within 30 days of recieving your product!

I’m a journalist and have questions, who do I contact?

You can reach out to contact@mercku.tech

What color options are there?

Just black for now, but other colors coming soon!

What stage of production are you at?

We have already started producing the M2 and M2 Hive!

Where can I get help if there is a problem with the product?

You can email us at contact@mercku.tech
column35:
once we ship, we will also provide other options for you to directly contact!

Who should I contact if I have other questions?

contact@mercku.tech

Campaign

Can you tell me about volume pricing? I'm interested in getting these for my building.

First off, thank you! We will provide extra incentives for high volumes, please contact us at contact@mercku.tech for more information!

How can I choose multiple perks?

The system only lets you pick one perk at a time, you'll have to select multiple items when checking out.

How much will it retail for?

We currently offer 25% - 42% off on all of our items
column36:
when these items hit the shelves, the full prices will be charged

I am an international backer how can I support your campaign?

Just select your appropriate region when checking out!

I preordered an M2 product, but I didn’t get any confirmation email. How do I check the status of the order?

That's strange! Email us at contact@mercku.tech and we'll look into your order

If I back now, is the money taken out of my account today?

Yes, it's a payment, but we don't get the money until the end of the campaign when we are about to deliver

Can you tell me more about the various packages you have available?

We have four types of perks. First, we have the standalone Wi-Fi router, good for up to 3000 square feet of space. Next, we have our patented Hive system, with four bees to cover up to 5000 square feet of space, and extremely powerful and flexible. We also have a super-system, for when you want to either have extra range or perhaps gift it for a friend/family. Lastly, we have an add-on node, which will not work unless you already have an M2, but it's for those who want to add a node but doesn't want the package of four.

What is your refund policy?

Indiegogo directly allows you to get a full refund

What’s the difference between the standard perk and secret perk?

Secret perks are for special occasions and shipping locations - and are only available through a personalized link. Standard perks are always available for purchase.

Shipping

Do you ship worldwide?

We ship to most countries worldwide. If you don't see your country, just drop us a note and we'll make sure to give you a special link.

What are the shipping costs?

It depends on where we are shipping the item and which perk you've selected

When will I receive my M2?

We will start shipping in July 2018, and you'll recieve your unit by late July or August, depending on the country

Technical

Are the “Bees” 5g only?

They are both 5G and 2.4G

Does this system support US/UK/EMEA/Asia plug?

Yes!

How does the M2 connect?

It connects automatically once you connect the power cable and the ethernet cable

How is it better than leading brands like Google WiFi

We have a complete system build, which components such as the transceiver we produce in-house, thus reducing overall system noise and improving performance. We also have designed the best antenna in the world, helping to propagate our signals better.

How long does it take to set up?

Just three easy steps
column37:
takes a few seconds

Is the app both iOS and Android?

Yes!

Is this router based on a MOCA network or just standard router?

It is a standard router

What devices do you support?

We support most smart home devices that require a Wi-Fi network. Alexa, Sonos, etc.

What other plug types are available for the “bees”?

We have four types of plugs for the bees, covering North America, South America, Europe, China, Japan, Australia and most parts of the world

Where in my home should I put the M2?

We recommend placing the M2 in a central location in the house. Perhaps the living room.

Why is there no dedicated 5Ghz backhaul between the nodes?

Under our tech design structure, communication between mesh node and main router is rare the bottleneck of the performance of whole system. In this case we do not employ dedicated backhaul, considering the optimization of system robustness and energy efficiency.

Why only 60 devices when most aftermarket router can handle the full 253 clients?

Great question! We can support as many devices as you want, but we can only guarantee high performance for up to 60 devices. Too many devices will sap the network of its speed.

Would M2 be suitable for my office?

Absolutely! Your office, the coffee shop, and most other places would be great locations!

 

Absolutely! Your office, the coffee shop, and most other places would be great locations!

column1:
0,"

 

 

AutoShades wouldn't be much help if they forced you to tap around hundreds of times inside their app just to roll down all the shades in your house. Grouping your shades turns opening or closing multiple into a one tap task. 

 Room Darkening shades are important to many people. Whether you work nights and need to sleep during the day, live in a demanding climate, or just want more privacy, automated roller shades with blackout fabric are the way to go. 

 

 

Schedule your shades to open and close at certain times of the day! It is as easy as setting the time you want your shades to open and time you want them to close, let the automation do the rest. 

Once you have secured the mounts to either side of the window (2 screws each), its as easy as pushing the roller into the mounts, and sliding in the battery pack! No professional installation needed. 

 

With an easy to use mobile application as well as integration with Google Home, Amazon Alex, and Home Assistant (to name a few), controlling your shades has never been easier.

David shows off the current prototype of the Dreamer AutoShade.

 

 

With great smart home systems already in place in many homes, we didn't want to reinvent the wheel. By integrating AutoShades with the top smart home ecosystems, we greatly increase the number of ways you control your shades.
column2:
>Sizing Guide

We worked through many iterations of our project. This is an image of the most recent prototype that brings together all of the features shown in the video. We talked with manufacturers about this design and we are ready to jump into manufacturing after the campaign is complete. We look forward to creating the first production quality AutoShade for our amazing  backers.

 

With your feedback and financial support, we can bring an innovative product to market that makes everyone's daily lives easier.  

 

How do I choose a size for my shades?

We will send a survey to all of our backers asking them what size shades they would like, as well as any other choices that are unlocked through reaching the stretch goals outlined below!

 

Meet the Dreamer Technologies team!

We have spent a lot of time thinking about what the future of AutoShades looks like, and we would be lying if we said everything will go off without a hitch. We have planned out the next several months, but even with extensive planning sometimes things can go wrong. If things go south in any way, our commitment to you, our backers, is to be 100% transparent. You are the first people to support us and we will not keep you in the dark. 

Some of the potential challenges we see are scaling up manufacturing to meet demand. We believe we can have all of the components assembled and ready for shipping in December of 2019, but should something go wrong in our supply chain, the timeline may be pushed back.
