The Fendrihan Stainless Steel Adjustable Shaving Brush and Razor Stand emerged from a simple request, but one we've received over and over again
column2: a stand for all brushes. Frustrated with ill-fitting stands for the enormous range of brushes and razors we enjoy in wet shaving, we set out to create a stand that can be used with any brush in your personal collection. Machine polished to a mirror finish, its stainless steel composition is designed for stability and durability.

column1: After testing hundreds of different-sized shaving brushes and razors from almost every brand around the world, we knew we were on to something. We knew we couldn't rest until our revolutionary stand design could hold almost any brush a wet shaver might have in his bathroom.

column2:
>Fits multiple sized shaving brushes
and safety razors
>Fast and efficient adjusting mechanism

>Adjust and position the clasps
to the desired size

>Securely fasten the top knob
to maintain the size

>Place your shaving brush
and safety razor on the stand

column1: Durable and long-lasting, the stand is made with 100% stainless steel. Machine polished for a classic look, the stand will match almost any brush and razor combination. Its wide base ensures balance and stability.
• Fully compressed, the razor stand is 12 mm (0.47"")
• Can expand or compress to fit shaving brushes with knot or handle sizes from 22 mm (0.87"") to 43 mm (1.7"")

We have designed the adjustment mechanism to fit as many brushes and double edge safety razors as possible. While the stand will fit a wide range of brushes, it is not a universal stand and will not fit extra-large brushes or those with uniquely shaped handles. Compatible with most double edge safety razors, the stand may not be able to accommodate cartridge razors, or double edge safety razors with larger bulky handles.

We are a leading shaving and grooming online retailer, offering the best of men’s shaving essentials, grooming products, and accessories for everyday life you won’t find anywhere else. 

Our mission is to offer wet shaving enthusiasts the finest shaving products from long-established brands in one convenient place and at unbeatable prices.

Choose smarter, safer, more secure access for your home with a fully autonomous garage door opener made for the modern world.
When it comes to smart homes, you want proper balance between convenience, safety, and security
column2: none of which is more important when it comes to accessing your garage. That’s why we created the innovative and one-of-a-kind  Senclo Autonomous Smart Garage Door Controller.

column1: A totally hands-free door opener that automatically detects when you’re pulling in the driveway, our premier system can be opened, closed and locked down via the included HD touchscreen controller, Google Assistant, Alexa, or even your Apple Smart Watch. In fact, you can use it to open or close when you pull in, remotely for visiting family members or friends, via your smart watch while riding your bike, and so much more.

We wanted to be sure everyone could access the ease and safety that Senclo provides, so we're compatible with all of the industry standards.

 

 

We can be set up to work will all of the following existing garage openers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Click here to find out how to make sure your referrals earn you rewards. If you don't follow these instructions, we wont be unable to provide you with your well-deserved prizes! 

 

fi Controller Set 

fi Mini Technical Specs

 

 

 

The SENCLO team discuss the company vision and their first product fi.

What is fi?

Fi is a universal garage door opener. It can be used to make your existing garage smart.

 

What is it called fi?

It was named after the mathematical term phi which is the golden ratio of 1.681 which was used  to create its aesthetically pleasing design.

 

Who created it?

Fi was created by ex-Intel and ex-AMD engineers.  Their experience in the industry gave them greater insight into what consumers were looking for, and how the current products were unsatisfactory for most customers.  After recognizing the massive inefficiency of standard automated products, they decided to create something better for home owners. Their goal was to automate everything so that homeowners don’t have to.

 

Why should we use it?

You'll be able to use fi to simplify your life by always knowing the state of your garage. Feel peace of mind knowing that is closed behind you when you leave . Feel safe knowing no one can open it without you getting instant notifications to your phone.  Use it  to help you manage deliveries, open the door for a friend and even use it for keyless entry.

 

How much does it cost?

Our Indiegogo backers will be receiving our very best deals, saving up to 40% on Fi Opener Set $399 MSRP and Fi Mini $199 MSRP

 

Where can we buy it?

Following our pre-order launch on Indiegogo, you'll be able to purchase it on Senclo.com.  We will be on Amazon.com late December once all Indiegogo's orders have been fulfilled.

 

Do I need to pay monthly service?

NO.  

 

Why are you crowdfunding?

We need help to lower the cost for mass production since the development of this product is already complete. Our earliest supporters will get the best price so the earlier you purchase the better the price.

 

What features are available?

Autonomous mode - Auto-open and auto-close the garage

Ultra sonic sensor - Proximity sensor to detect door opening up to 1 inch

Activity log - View a history of all accesses to the garage can be viewed on the app

Friends Access - Use the app to allow access to anyone

HD TouchScreen - Beautiful 5 inch resistive touch screen

Multiple Garages - Buy additional door sensors and control up to 3 garages

Post A Note - Post a message on the controller via the app

Customize themes - Change themes on the controller

Vacation Lock Down - Lock down the garage so it cannot be accessed without a pin

 

Do you have Online User Manual available yet?

Yes User Manual is available on line at: https://senclo.com/support/users_guide/

 

What colors do you offer?

The Fi Door sensor is Black and the Fi Mini is White

.

Which option is best for me?

We recommend all backers purchase the Fi controller Set and additional Door sensors if you have multiple garages.   

 

Does it have an app?

Yes, the Fi app is available for iOS and Android devices.

 

How does the device connect to the app?

The Fi device connects to the cloud via WIFI and the app connects to the device through the cloud.

 

What can we expect from the app?

Use the app to open/close, check status, check the temperature in the garage, add and remove additional sensors, autonomous mode and more.

 

Will there be updates available through the app?

Yes, both versions with send updates to the app whenever there is a newer version.

 

How do I set it up?

1.   Swap your existing controller with the fi controller

2.  Install the Door Sensor

3.  Connect the trigger wires to the garage door opener

4.  Connect to your WiFi network

5.  Download the Fi app and follow instructions on the app.

6.  Enjoy Smart features.

 

How do I turn it on and off?

Just touch the HD screen and fi will turn on. It will automatically turn on when there is access to the garage and has a timer to turn off when not in use.

 

How do I control the Garage?

Press the button on the fi controller to open/close the garage. Or you can control the garage directly from the fi app.

 

Is it safe and secure?

Your security and safety is our #1 priority. That's why we've implemented military-grade encryption and OpenSSL support into every fi.

 

What certifications do you have?

We will have a CE and FCC certification.

 

How durable is it?

It is made up of aluminum casing and polycarbonate. It can last for decades. 

 

When does shipping begin?

Nov 15th, 2017

 

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?

By Dec 15th, 2017

 

Where does it ship?

We're proud to ship fi worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.

 

How much is shipping?

Shipping is free for US and Canada.

 

I'm interested in a distribution partnership

Please contact support@senclo.com.

 

What are the risks &
column2:
challenges of getting the device today?

The risks and challenges have all been minimized.

 

Is there a warranty?

Yes, every fi comes with a one-year limited warranty.

 

What is your refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis. At some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've been shipped.

 

What is your return / exchange policy?

If you receive your product and aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping and handling fees.

 

What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?

During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis
column3: at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production &amp
column4:
shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

 

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

Login to your Indiegogo account (every backer automatically has one made for them) to check the status of your pre-order in the Indiegogo dashboard.

 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Support: support@senclo.com

column1: “Quake Escape” is a Brand new Product designed to provide two very important things, first to Confirm that a significant Earthquake has occurred and to Provide Emergency LED Lighting to help see your way to safety in the event of Darkness. In an earthquake this product could help to save lives and could help to prevent injuries.
This Design is a high tech device that intelligently detects seismic motion and then through sophisticated software called “Intellisense Technology”
column2: it allows us to determine if there is an Earthquake or just a vibration from say a door slam. After Two long years we have completed the design, characterization and CE and FCC Certifications as well as the retail packaging with instructions in four languages (English, Spanish, Italian and Japanese).

column1: “Quake Escape” is battery operated and can provide 24 to 48 hours of continuous light to help see your way to safety. “Quake Escape” is also now Patent Pending.

Today we are looking to “Indiegogo.com” for funding to launch a major Marketing and Advertisement campaign. We need to educate the public and get the word out to people that this product is now available and should be included as part of their disaster preparedness readiness.We have had fantastic and positive responses from businesses, organizations and people world wide.
Here is one quote from a Captain of the Santa Clara Fire Department
5 out of 5 Stars.  ""This could saveyour life!"" October 22, 2012, By Brent Rapport

I purchased four of these, one for each bedroom and the hallway. I want to know that in an earthquake that I can see through the debris to get to my children. These lights provide great lighting and an alert system to tell my family to take cover. I feel these are just asimportant as a smoke detector if you live in Earthquake Country.
We also have a real testimony of “Quake Escape”actually working in a 6.0 Magnitude Quake in Mexico at 3:23am on Nov. 15, 2012 which was videotaped.

We have been on radio, TV News, Internet shows and the DIY Network. Units have shipped within the USA, Peru, Mexico, Puerto Rico and Japan. We are looking for major retail stores to sell our product and are targeting a MSRP Price of $49.95

The Quake Escape design is 100% complete and ready for mass-production. We have all packaging complete as well as instructions. This product can ramp up in production with an initial lead time of 6-8 weeks and be dropped ship to our distributors.

Marketing and Advertising is where we need to invest because without it the world will not know about this great product. We have pitched this product to many people including the American Red Cross with fantastic response but we need to take this to the next level in order to be successful.
We have test marketed this product with success and have had outstanding feedback so we do not anticipate any risk
column2: the challenge is getting the news of this product out to the public and around the world. We would like to see every household have 2-4 Quake Escapes installed.

column1: If you are not able to contribute to our launch then we would appreciate you letting friends and Family know about our product as this could save lives and help prevent injuries. We Truly appreciate it!

We weren't planning on doing an IndieGoGo campaign but then thought: screw it, let's do it, let's make the doorbell + chime and our package theft Porch Protection Plan available first to all the awesome, risk-taking, intrepid, early supporters. We have been working on this $20 doorbell-camera-for-everyone and we are about to launch. We're in production and going super fast.
• 1 year+ battery life on 3 x AA batteries (yes, included)
• With Doorbell Camera, you’ll be notified when there’s motion, a ring, or both. No more squinting through the peephole.
• No hard-wiring. No tools necessary. Just pair Doorbell Camera with your WiFi, position it by your door, and peel-and-stick. Welcome to smarter home security.
• Package delivery or your neighbor with a cup of sugar? Now you know. See what Doorbell Camera sees straight from your smartphone.
• Porch piracy cost U.S. consumers over $8.2 billion in one year. Now it doesn't have to.
How Did We Make a $20 Doorbell Camera?
column2: >First, we started by obsessing over what are the essential security and notification features that you need (and what's extraneous). We took out full video and added a boomerang-style GIF showing who is at your door. Then we made the notification super fast with an indoor chime that rings in case your phone is off. Then we made an awesome app and even include a Package Theft Protection option with super easy in-app claims.

column3: >Your money makes the wheels turn faster and drive down cost through more volume. We're selling this product AT COST. We've built a number of other amazing home security products. We've put tons of TLC into them and we hope you'll use them too after you fall in love with our Doorbell Camera.

column2: >We partnered with an A- rated insurance carrier to bring you package theft protection. It's part of our Porch Protection Plan (PPP) where your packages are covered for up to $300 ($150 per claim). You can easily file a claim right from the app!  Also includes 365 days of cloud storage.

column3: >This isn't a long campaign message. We've poured the past two years building an awesome product and we hope it will make millions of lives a little bit better, including yours. Enjoy!

column2:
>Zero-Risk Refund Policy
Don't absolutely love the Doorbell Camera? Return it anytime within 90 days after you receive it and we'll refund the cost of all hardware.

Package delivery or your neighbor with a cup of sugar? Now you know. See what Doorbell Camera sees straight from your smartphone.
Porch piracy cost U.S. consumers over $8.2 billion in one year. Now it doesn't have to.

How Did We Make a $20 Doorbell Camera?First, we started by obsessing over what are the essential security and notification features that you need (and what's extraneous). We took out full video and added a boomerang-style GIF showing who is at your door. Then we made the notification super fast with an indoor chime that rings in case your phone is off. Then we made an awesome app and even include a Package Theft Protection option with super easy in-app claims.

What We Need & What You GetYour money makes the wheels turn faster and drive down cost through more volume. We're selling this product AT COST. We've built a number of other amazing home security products. We've put tons of TLC into them and we hope you'll use them too after you fall in love with our Doorbell Camera.

Porch Protection Plan (PPP)We partnered with an A- rated insurance carrier to bring you package theft protection. It's part of our Porch Protection Plan (PPP) where your packages are covered for up to $300 ($150 per claim). You can easily file a claim right from the app!  Also includes 365 days of cloud storage.
This isn't a long campaign message. We've poured the past two years building an awesome product and we hope it will make millions of lives a little bit better, including yours. Enjoy!
Zero-Risk Refund PolicyDon't absolutely love the Doorbell Camera? Return it anytime within 90 days after you receive it and we'll refund the cost of all hardware.

column3:
>A flat, multi-purpose, paper-thin light that turns on in one easy snap!
 

It’s easy to assemble:

Just snap the two magnetic ends together and your space is lit.

 

It’s lightweight &
column4:
portable:

Weighing in at 18 grams per light, Diah can also be packed flat and slipped right into any bag.

Modular form &
column5:
function:

Diah is more than just a pretty tea light. Snap many together to make wider bases.
Just like lego, you can get creative and make complex lighting structures.

Omni-directional illumination

Our unique hollow design enables light to emit in all directions. A definite step up from traditional bulb lighting, you now have the ability to wrap your lights around any object.

  48-hour battery life

Powered by 2 replaceable cell batteries, this light powers on for 2 days straight. Replace them if you need them to go on for longer. 

 

Endless applications:

Here are a couple of scenarios in which Diah can turn a bland moment into the perfect #mood. .

- Fairy Lights 
- Tea Light
- Dining Chandelier
 - Accent Light 
- Wall Sconce
 - Night Light
 - Camping/Glamping 
- Pop-Up Lighting &

column1:
Surprise yourself with Diah 

Be delighted by the endless combinations Diah offers.  Its hollow design and magnetic clasps give you the opportunity to wrap it around tree trunks, poles or even, wine bottles. You can also create larger configurations such as chandeliers and halos if you’re into DIY. 

""How can we do more with less?""
This question, in particular, inspired Diahs' design.

We started out with the goal of creating a structurally minimal product both in size &
column2:
weight that when assembled, would command a presence far greater, than the sum of its parts.

Everything from the structure, electronics and even the manufacturing processes, have been stripped and reassessed to use as little as possible. 

We believe that driving sustainability is not only defined by materials used, it goes down to the final detail of shipping, packaging and minimising waste. To stick by these principles, we've minimised weight and designed for flat packability making shipping easy.

 Specifications:

Diah Timeline:

April 2017 - The first forms of Diah were prototyped.

August 2017 - Once we were happy with the functionality of Diah, we created a small batch of 50 Diahs to observe possible lead times with our vendors. We also used them for our brand video. Our inner circle of friends and family also got a chance to see our prototype and offer feedback.

October 2017 - After a few tweaks and a lot of 3D printed mock-ups of possible multi-functional hooks, we ordered in our first batch of 500 Diahs that are currently being used as marketing samples. 

November 2017 - We launch on Kickstarter! We're waiting to hit minimum order to hit the go button with our vendors! The sooner we reach our goals, the sooner we get production going.

We're also refining Diah to have a single clasp with a multi-functional hook like the one below.

December 2017 - Shipping of Batch 1 the first batch of Diahs begins! (Kickstarter Lot closed)

February 2018 - Shipping of Batch 2 begins!

Risks and challenges:
We've spent a lot of time building strong partnerships with experienced manufacturers to mitigate as many risks as possible, but we know there will still be unexpected challenges along the way. We will always be transparent and inform our backers of potential hurdles.

Ship date:
We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates. We will always keep you informed if things take longer than planned.

Product:
We have taken the following steps to ensure that we deliver the best quality product: - Built over 15 working prototypes. We will only make design refinements to enhance the product experience. - Extensively tested prototypes for performance and durability.

Manufacturing:
We have established relationships with experienced contract manufacturers to mitigate the risk of delays by material suppliers and to ensure quality control is implemented to the highest level. We have built test prototypes with our manufacturer and they fully understand our product, specifications and production timeline.

A shout out to everyone who has supported and made Diah what it is today. It really does take a village!

A special thank you to Herbert Pradjaja, Antariksh Jain &
column3: Egan the trio behind the beautiful images and video. Thank you to Melissa Tan, Opal, Manish Melwani &amp
column4:
Natasha Singh for being our amazing talent for the videos.
We will make sure we answer any question you guys have for us. Don't hesitate to shoot us a direct message here on Kickstarter or by email at hellodiah@mana.sg

Please note: 
Diahs' utility &
column5:
design is patent pending and for the time being, is protected by a provisional patent.

International shipping:
We shop worldwide. Shipping fees and tariffs will be charged as you check out on Indiegogo.
Any unforeseen costs with VAT and tariffs will be taken care of by the backer.

Local shipping (Singapore):
Local backers will be responsible for applicable postage fees. Shipping fees and tariffs will be charged as you check out on Kickstarter.
Any unforeseen costs with VAT and tariffs will be taken care of by the backer.

JustSaying Asia

Shipping fees and tariffs will be charged as you check out on Kickstarter.Any unforeseen costs with VAT and tariffs will be taken care of by the backer.Product Reviews & Press: JustSaying AsiaHype&StuffThe Grey Alley",8.0,0,"1 Campaign
In winter 2018 we launched our first Kickstarter campaign with PAUL POTATO - the world's first professional potato tower.

It was a huge success and we were able to ship the majority of the orders ahead of schedule. We got tons of positive feedback for our products and services. And again we have the same partners onboard as during our first campaign. We are confident that we will again meet the expectations of our backers with our brand new product SISSI STRAWBERRY.
SISSI STRAWBERRY is the best ready-to-plant stackable planter that allows you to grow strawberry on your balcony, terrace or in your garden.

SISSI STRAWBERRY has an integrated water distribution system that ensures perfect irrigation conditions on each level. You don’t have to worry that your plants won’t get enough water or that they won’t grow evenly. SISSI STRAWBERRY will ensure you have perfect growth for every strawberry.
SISSI STRAWBERRY ensures easy planting and full functionality:

SISSI STRAWBERRY vs DIY

You may think SISSI STRAWBERRY looks a bit like a DIY drain pipe strawberry planter. But it’s very different. Apart from being better looking, modular, and ready-to-plant, It is specifically designed for your strawberries’ needs:
• perfect soil volume (2.5 liters) for strawberry plants
• specially designed elements for the water distribution
• keeps water in each compartment for perfect irrigation
• sturdy, safe stand, or a hanging option

ZERO PESTICIDES, 100% HEALTHY STRAWBERRIES

A third of all store-bought strawberries contain 10 or more pesticides! (according to EWG's 2018 Shopper's Guide to Pesticides in Produce"")

SISSI STRAWBERRY allows you to grow strawberries with zero pesticides.

 

NO PESTS

We built SISSI STRAWBERRY to withstand pesky pests. And for even extra protection, you can get the hanging SISSI and not worry about creepy crawlers all over your fruit.

 

 

GROWN AT YOUR OWN HOME

With SISSI STRAWBERRY you grow your strawberries at your own home, so you have full control over the whole process. This means:
• No long distance travel, so no preservatives
• You enjoy the process of planting and harvesting your own beautiful fruit
There are two options how to grow strawberries at home:

from seeds: you can take the tiny little seeds from outside of every strawberry, raise them to very small plants and move them later on into SISSI STRAWBERRY where they can expand and grow beautiful strawberries. You will enjoy the tasty fruits even more if you follow this wonderful process - just amazing how nature works!
from seedlings: you can also take the shortcut and buy small plants, called seedlings, to plant them directly into SISSI STRAWBERRY.

Plant your seedlings - home grown or bought - into SISSI STRAWBERRY in just 4 easy steps: 

 

 

 

ENDLESS CONFIGURATIONS 

SISSI STRAWBERRY is modular, so you can always upgrade or reconfigure to suit your needs. You can choose between 4 different versions, or pick several!

 

 

 

STRETCH GOAL 

YEAH YEAH YEAH!!! Our funding is over €75,000,- and the second color is available for all of you! You can choose after the campaign if you want to get your SISSI STRAWBERRY in white or anthracite. And for all family-packages-backer: You can also mix the colors :-)

 

 

 

 

 

 

AFTER THE CAMPAIGN

After a successful campaign, we will send out a survey where you have to enter your shipping details. Furthermore you will have the chance to buy various add-on products that you need for setting up your SISSI STRAWBERRY. This will include:
• fertilizer to give your strawberries all nutrients they need
• seeds to give you the possibility to grow very special sorts
• anti-freeze fleece to leave your strawberries outside during colder seasons
• (Please note, that due to legal provisions not all options might be available in your country)

BACKER FEEDBACK 

""PAUL POTATO is a very unique and awesome product. Thank you to your team that you gave me the possibility to grow my own potatoes right on my small city balcony. The purple potatoes not just looked awesome, but also tasted very delicious. I'm looking forward to planting my potatoes again next season"" - Sebastian A.

 

 

PRESS

Find all the information to our products and additional photo content in our press kit. Thanks for your media coverage.

Meet BarkBath™ - the next generation of dog bathing
The Faster, Easier, Less Messy way to bathe your dog.

For many households, bathing the family dog is one more chore that takes up valuable time, uses several towels and takes plenty of patience. Between the splatter that comes with a good post-bath shake, to the water splashed around the tub, washing Fido can often create an even bigger mess than the dirt that prompted the bath in the first place. To make bath time less of a chore, BISSELL is introducing the BarkBath™, the first portable bath system—the next generation of dog bathing.
• Portable so you can bathe your dog in any room of the house with virtually no mess
• Cleans from the skin up with specially designed nozzles that get beneath the fur
<li>Cleans an 80lb+ dog with up to 50 times less water versus traditional bathing in a tub<ul>
• BarkBath uses 48oz of water to wash an 80 lbs dog
• Bath tub method can take up to 19 gallons of water to wash an 80 lbs dog
• Dirty water is captured in a separate tank for a clean you can see
• Note – Sound/noise emitted is similar to a vacuum.  For best results, your dog should not be afraid of the sound of a vacuum.
Now in production so be one of the first to receive a BarkBath. Contents include:
• Microfiber Mat for the Portable Bath Unit
<li>16 oz. No-Rinse Shampoo<ul><li>The no rinse formula utilizes technology proven for years on humans (technology used in hospitals) and now for dogs (latest innovation in pet shampoo).  <ul>
• Leaves your dog’s coat feeling smooth and conditioned.
• Light mulberry scent smells great for pet parents but doesn’t overwhelm your dog.
Innovative Bath Tool, adjustable for long and short haired dogs
Our innovative tool helps to clean from the skin-up, not from the fur down.

The BarkBath™ Portable Dog Bath System is the newest Pet Inspired innovation from BISSELL. The BarkBath is the company’s first portable bath system that allows you to bathe your dog with virtually no mess – eliminating the inevitable clean-up that comes along with washing a four-legged family member.

“BISSELL is always on the hunt to create the next product that helps with being a pet parent. If we can make pet clean up easy, more pets will be adopted!” said Chuck Martin, General Manager of Innovation. “Bath time can be a huge pain point for both the pet and the pet parent. BarkBath helps make pet bath time faster, easier, and less messy than ever before.”

More than two years and plenty of paws-on research went into the development of the BarkBath system. Working with real pet parents (including product developers who are pet parents themselves), BISSELL set out to create a product that makes dog bath time easier. Because the product is so new to the marketplace, online resources have been created to guide pet parents through BarkBath best practices.
We're excited to launch on Indiegogo because we want this community of early adopters to be the first to get their hands / paws on BarkBath.  We value your feedback above all else.

For 140 years and counting, Michigan-based BISSELL Homecare, Inc. has developed innovative floor care solutions that make cleaning easier. As the top-selling brand in floor care appliances based on NPD unit sales, BISSELL understands that fuller lives often mean more messes, and that convenient cleaning tools help us embrace life’s messier moments. Now in its fourth generation of family leadership, the company supplies households across the globe with vacuums, sweepers, carpet-cleaning machines, hard floor cleaners and cleaning formulas. For more on the complete line of BISSELL products, visit www.bissell.com.

Size, Portable Bath Unit: 17.2""L x 12.5""W x 8.2""H
Size, Bath Tool: 4.5""L x 10.5""W x 2.5""H
Reach: More than 11 feet
Weight: 9.65 lbs 
Power: 3 Amps, 110V
Power Cord Length: 15 feet
Dirt Collection: 48 oz
Color: Titanium, Cha Cha Lime Green &
• The Portable Bath Unit and Bath Tool sprays water and no rinse shampoo onto your dog.
• Specially designed nozzles get beneath the fur and down to the skin to allow water and shampoo to wash the skin clean and remove odors.
• Soft suction pulls dirt and water away into a separate dirty water tank.
How can I learn more about how the product works?
• Learn More About the BarkBath System in the BISSELL  Youtube Channel
Do I need to rinse my dog afterwards?
• No, this special no-rinse formula utilizes technology proven for years on pets and humans.  However, if desired, the tool has a 'rinse' mode that allows you to rinse your dog.
What if my dog is afraid of the sound of a vacuum?
• The BarkBath System sounds similar to a vacuum.  For best results, your dog should not be afraid of the sound of a vacuum.
• To assure you and your dog have the best experience possible, we have partnered with a pet bathing expert to create a training video called ""BarkBath™ Bathing Anxious Dog"".
What will the campaign do with donations?
• All donations given to this campaign will be donated to the BISSELL Pet Foundation
• Applicable sales taxes are included in the perks offered.

When you add water in the tank, Quilo's evaporative cooling technology rapidly reduces the temperature of incoming warm air, creating a refreshing cool breeze.

If you want to cool your room faster and more effectively, you can easily add ice to a dedicated ice compartment.

In the winter, add water and set it to low and it becomes an effective humidifier for treating seasonal dry skin and allergies.

In Quiet mode, Quilo™ can even operate at a whisper-quiet sound level while lowering the local room area temperature by up to 10 to 15 degrees Fahrenheit *.

So how energy efficient is Quilo™ you ask? Well, how much electricity does it take to power one light bulb? There you go!

The Quilo ™ does not have a compressor or refrigerant gas, and does not release any harmful chemicals into the atmosphere.

 

Quilo™ was made to move. Constructed with durable wheels, super-light body (13.2 Lbs) Quilo™ can be rolled from room to room, house to house with ease.

Detachable Power Cord/ Universal Voltage Compatibility

 

Quilo™ goes where you go. It was built to be used internationally so you never have to worry about compatibility. 

A low-energy LED light creates a soothing, comfortable glow during the night, while also making the water level in the tank visible for easy maintenance.

 

A minimalistic yet full-function remote control allows you to operate the Quilo™ from across the room. 

 

The Active Carbon Filter helps filter out dust particles and odour-causing pollutants from the air, helping to improve air quality in your room.

Our challenge was to create a cooling device that was as energy-efficient, eco-friendly and quiet as possible without compromising on cooling effectiveness.

Inspired by portable battery powered devices such as laptops, our engineers developed their ground-breaking, patent-pending brushless DC motor technology that minimizes energy consumption while maximizing airflow. 

We worked with an award winning German design agency to design the Quilo™.  We asked the design agency to reflect the essence of the product - its size, low noise levels and performance in a design that enhances your space.

The internal construction from the grooves in the walls to the curve of the fan blades, was carefully engineered to maximize airflow travelling throughout the system.

Our Project Manager, Nishant, explaining how Quilo™ works
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

Our team has been working passionately on the Quilo™ for over two and a half years and we are so excited to finally show it to you.

Some photos from the first production run

 

Our mission is to design and manufacture holistic and sustainable products for your home.  We are passionate about creating climate friendly products that balance high performance with energy efficiency. 

The air quality in our homes is fundamental to our family’s health. This drives us to create innovative climate control products to enhance and protect the air in our homes.

We need our backers help to start mass production of the Quilo™. The first small batch of Quilo’s are already under production, so early backers can get their Quilo's delivered within 2 to 4 weeks of the campaign end date. 

It is the second batch that we need help with.  As we head towards mass production, we need your support to place a 2nd bulk order for our breakthrough new product. 

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We appreciate all the help we can get.

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and are helping us spread the word. 

We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. 

Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your contribution helped us achieve. You are part of our Quilo™ family. 

 

If you have questions during or after the campaign is closed, you can always reach us at support@QuiloHome.com. We want to hear from you! For press inquiries please contact press@QuiloHome.com.

column9: >Controlled entirely from within the Fing app (the world’s #1 network scanner for iOS and Android) Fingbox helps you to, protect your home network against threats, limit internet access, block devices, track who is online, detect intruders and malicious devices, improve network performance and so much more.

column52:
>The Fing app was first built in 2009 by three developers, Carlo, Marco, and Daniele - or as we like to call them - ""the 3 fingers.""
 
The Fing app grew wildly successful simply because of its superior device recognition, ease of use and network scanning technology. The app today has 20 million users and hundreds of thousands of positive reviews on the App Store and Google Play. Each day over 1 million network scans are performed using the Fing apps.
column54: >Fingbox is brought to you by...
column58: >Plus, our dedicated team of Developers, UX Designers, Marketing, Sales and Support across offices in London, San Francisco, and Rome.
column63:
>STRETCH GOALS


250k - Internet Security Check

When we reached 250k on Indiegogo we committed to adding an Internet Security Check feature (formerly known as Hacker Threat Check) to Fingbox which will automatically scan vulnerable opened ports to identify potential risks of being hacked! 


500k - Home Digital Fence - ADDED TO FINGBOX

When we reached 500k on Indiegogo, we committed to adding a DigitalFence™ feature to your Fingbox.  This is a first of its kind security feature which lets you know if any device with Wi-Fi enabled is in the proximity of your box, even if that device is not connected to your Wi-Fi network. Any device including mobile phones will be detected within a 50-ft. vicinity of your Fingbox. How about that for complete digital security?

Why the DigitalFence™ is a useful feature

column1: • Know if a carrier or mail person has stopped by your house to deliver something
• Find out when your dog walker came by and how long they stayed
• Know when your vacation rental guest has checked in or out

Track all the events that happen in your home in real-time by mobile app, from anywhere.

FINGBOX DELIVERY AND TIMELINE
column6:
>
Our challenge was to design sturdy yet affordable hardware to ensure that Fingbox would be strong and reliable in performing it’s home monitoring functions.
column7: >To make Fingbox as affordable as possible, we kept a simple silhouette that will sit nicely on your home network.
column8: >We added the LEDs to Fingbox which are emotive lighting and communicate the various states of your box.
column9: >WHY FINGBOX NEEDS YOUR SUPPORT?
column10: >Help us bring home users the best ever and most affordable network security toolkit that will change the Internet of Things (IoT) forever!

column2:
>
1.   What is the device's range? Same as my router? What if I have a big mansion with devices on three floors?

>Fingbox connects directly to your home router, so its range will match that of your router. There is no limit to the number of devices which can be monitored, which means that even if you have a big house and a lot of devices Fingbox will work with all of them.
>2. Is there a subscription for service?
>No! The one-off purchase of the box is all you need to use Fingbox.
>3. If someone else comes to my home with their tablet, laptop or phone and connects to my Internet, will Fingbox notify me?
>Yes, it certainly will. Fingbox will always notify you when a new device is trying to connect to your network and give you the ability to block or allow that device from accessing your network.
>You will also be able to get alerts when family or guests join your network too.
>4. If a device I don’t recognize joins my network, what will Fingbox do?
>Fingbox will alert you when an unrecognized device is trying to access your network and give a wealth of information to help you identify it. Then you can choose to block or allow the device.
>5. Is there a limit to how many devices my Fingbox can work with?
>There is no limit to the number of devices Fingbox can work with on a network. As many as your network can handle!
>6. What is the Indiegogo campaign close date?
>The deadline to support our campaign is December 23, 2016.
>7. If I live outside of the U.S., can I purchase Fingbox and reap all its benefits?
>Yes, absolutely! Fingbox ships worldwide. EU customers will be subject to VAT.
>8. How much do you charge for shipping? Why are shipping costs to Europe so high?
>Shipping to the US is now free. Shipping to EU is $25, which includes VAT, customs, and duty charges. Shipping to the rest of the world is now $15.

>For our customers in Europe, the $25 charge is about $12 for VAT, customs and import duty into the EU and the rest for sending the box from Taiwan, where it is produced, to a facility in Europe to clear customs and then onward to you.
>9. Does Fingbox work with an all-in-one Internet provider box having Modem/Switch/ Router/Wi-Fi built in?
>11. Does Fingbox support multiple Wi-Fi access points for the same network?
>12. Does Fingbox needs to be physically in the middle of internet gateway/modem and network switch?
>You can contact us at support@fing.io – we aim to respond within 24 hours.
>14. What is the lifespan of the device? Will there be updated models? If so, how often?
>We have a 1 year warranty on hardware, but the typical lifespan of a tech product like this is between 5-10 years. There are currently no plans for updated models.
>15. How do I get software updates?
>Your Fingbox will get automatically software updates that are pushed directly to your device. You will not be required to do anything to update your Fingbox.

>Our free Fing app is already the number one free network scanner in the world, helping millions of people secure and troubleshoot their home networks. Fingbox adds additional network security and troubleshooting features in the app such as: 24/7 Monitoring, Alerts, Intruder Detection, Device Block, and more.
>17. I would like more info about privacy.
>For more information on privacy please follow this link: https://app.fing.io/privacy
>18.  Where can I learn more about Fing the company?

>We’re glad you asked!
Learn more about our products
column3:
>  at: www.fing.io
Read the team bios: https://www.fing.io/the-fing-team/
Check out our blog: https://www.fing.io/blog/

column2: >If you have any questions you can also email us at hello@fing.io.
>To make Fingbox the best product it can be, we have identified the challenges we may face with this project:

>1)  We need to ensure a smooth integration of the premium Fingbox features with the existing Fing application. This is certainly a challenge, but with the success of the Fing app it is one that we have collective experience to overcome. To ensure a smooth integration, we will ensure that we provide many Fing user’s access the app beforehand to provide feedback.

>2) We rely on 3rd party suppliers to build and deliver the Fingbox hardware which is home to our proprietary Fingbox software. The software is ready and the hardware prototype is ready. Though with 3rd party contractors there is always risk of unforeseen obstacles. Given the experience our team has in delivering previous hardware, we are well equipped to handle challenges that we may face. We have both the technical expertise and previous experience to execute on this project.
>20. Does Fingbox have it’s own app?
>Fingbox is a hardware extension to Fing. Fingbox functionalities will be part of the Fing app.
>21. Who is this product intended for?
>Home users of all ages, households streaming video and audio, Family with children, and anybody with a home network!
>22. Does Fingbox come in different colors?

>Fingbox is currently only available in the Fing blue, however, the device can also be displayed without the exterior blue piece using only the white inner. Therefore you do have the choice to display Fingbox in your home in either blue or white.
>23. Can I dim down or stop the Fingbox LED lights?
>Yes, you'll be able to choose the brightness of the Fingbox LED lights and you can also disable them if you wish.
>Yes, Fingbox LED lights will react and communicate what is happening with the box.
>25. Does Fingbox support multiple VLANs and subnets?
>No. A Fingbox device is needed for each VLAN or subnet.
