column2: Cody Bear Need Some Serious Help

column1: On June 19th, I woke up around 5:30 AM to thick black smoke filling my bedroom. I thought something in my apartment was on fire, but as I looked out of my living room window, I could see there was an intense fire 5 flights below. My building was on fire! I grabbed my immediate valuables and ran out of the building.
Everybody had evacuated and thankfully there were no deaths or serious injuries to our knowledge.

However, as I hit the city sidewalk, my first image was my neighbor and his white Samoyed (dog) covered in black soot. Stan looked like a coal miner. As he stood in his sock feet, I asked him what happened. He said ""This is all I could grab. My ID, some cash, and Cody."" He also had his cell phone in hand.
Sitting against the building was his metal apartment door, bent in half and brushed with fire. It looked like it was hit by an RPG.
A fireman approached us. Stan asked him how his apartment looked. The man responded, ""Everything is completely destroyed. Nothing is recognizable.""

Then the realization began to set in. After 17 years of calling this apartment his home, he must start anew. Without a pair of shoes, without a change of clothes. 17 years of valuables, sentimental and otherwise, gone forever.
I gave him my size 13 sneakers for his size 9 feet.
Stan needs help getting a roof over his head again. He's currently bouncing around from place to place. His dog is boarding at a vet in Queens at $35/day.
As of June 24, he is in Connecticut, staying at his newphew's friend's home, but unfortunately Stan can't stay there.
Everybody in my neighborhood knows Stan Katz and Cody Bear. They are begging to help him. So, I am starting a collection to give him assistance in any way possible.
• Hotel room or some sort of living arrangement
• Care for his dog (grooming, food, boarding, etc)

ALSO - If you know of anybody who has a room for rent, let me know. Stan is not looking for anything fancy. He told me he just wants a roof over his head and a place for his dog. If anybody has extra basement space, Stan said he will gladly accept it.
Stan did not have renter's insurance.
ANY donation is appreciated. Stan Katz must start all over.

• I have known Stan for 2 and a half years. I have his cell phone number and have been in touch with him every other day since the fire. I am personally responsible for ensuring that every single penny reaches his hands.
• I have a bank account set up at TD Bank specifically for local donations. All money will go to him. This will help stabilize him as he puts his life back together.
How Can You Trust Me? A Little Info About Marshall Boprey

I live at 320 East 34th St. between 3rd and 2nd Avenue and have just signed a lease for my third year here. The management company is Citi-Urban Management.I manage a store called Walter's Pet Styles at 201-C East 33rd St
• I have a limitless number of references about who I am.
• I own a photography business-- Boprey Photography (www.boprey.com)
• I grew up in Gouverneur, New York
• You may know me in Murray Hill because of my Great Dane, Liberty
• I have volunteered for pet rescue organizations, largely Best Friends Animal Society -- Jamie Lyn Rubin is the coordinator in New York and knows me personally
** The news story below (1) focuses on some minor injuries suffered by firefighters, but unfortunately does not touch upon the complete devastation of Stan's apartment.
If you have any questions, please contact me!

marshall dot boprey @ gmail.com or call 315-287-2020

            Cost of seeds : $3           Output Weight : 10.5 oz        Output Market Price : $30 

Growing superfoods like microgreens are as simple as sprinkling some seeds and watch it grow. Herbstation makes it super easy for you to grow fresh produce. Herbs, salads, vegetables, fruits, and exotics - you name it, Herbstation covers it all.

 

Studies have proven that plants make people more productive, boosts creativity and reduces stress. They also reduce noise levels and balances humidity. Some plants purify the air, while others keep mosquitoes and other insects away.  

If growing edibles is not your thing, you may grow garden plants on Herbstation- ornamental and florals, exotics and medicinal varieties, succulents or #plantsofinstagram. Whatever you may choose, our ingenious Self-watering and LED grow lights would let your plants thrive.

          

With our patent-pending self-watering system, all you need to do is just top up the water level every weekend or so. It stores water for 7-10 days and provides for on-demand watering, using capillary action and gravity. With root aeration, your plants will grow quicker and healthier. Also, our LED grow lights gives 100% autonomy from sunlight.

No pump/motor/power connection for water circulation and no clogging/sedimentation. No pH or conductivity check and no fungus/algae or damp corners at home.

Automatic on-demand watering also helps with root oxygenation for healthier plants.
column24: >      Grow lights are included in every Herbstation order
column32: >Complete autonomy from sunlight. From seeds to harvest, all under grow lights.

column1: • 3W High-power, energy efficient OSRAM chip LEDs with custom secondary optics.
• Full spectrum White + Far Red + Deep Blue wavelengths.
• Magnetic Mounting, first time in the industry.
• Daisy Chain wiring kit + IP65 rated water-proof driver/ power supply.
By providing plants exactly the wavelengths that are required for various growth stages, we boost their growth while reducing power consumption and eliminate wasted heat energy.
column9: s=d987401d2fdaa94daa3e3c3255916a44"" src=""""/>Fill it, shut it, forget it - for a week or more!

column1: • Stores water for 7-10 days and waters on demand, automatically.
• Works with gravity/ capillary action. No electricity, water connection, or pump involved.
• No under watering or over watering, no guesswork.
• Better root oxygenation for healthier plant growth.

column20: >With so many plants to choose from, you have several possibilities to go with.

column1: • Multiple heights and positions to choose from to suit a wide range of plants.
• Ergonomic positioning and gives plants easy access to grow lights.

column9: s=4d9b1c22491244ba59d96690540685be"" src=""""/>            Always take the weather with you!

column18:
>

 

1. Soil-based: Grow like you always did -  use soil from the yard or buy from a store and use seeds , seedlings or plant cuttings. You may fortify it with manure, fertilizer or compost. Inbuilt self-watering system will water from below the soil using capillary action, and you need not worry about watering for 7-10 days.

2. Soil-less: Grow like an expert - use a sterile medium like coco-peat or rock-wool and mix hydroponic nutrients in water, for unbelievably quick plant growth. You need to check all parameters of water and nutrients thoroughly. Watering is through self-watering system as above, no pumps or circulation involved.

3. Seed Pod: Grow for fun - get growing with the least effort, using Seed-pods with pre-infused nutrients, from certain manufacturers. All you need to do is to drop the pod (which comes with seeds) into the self-watering cones in the Herbstation and add water.   

 

 

Unlike many other systems, Herbstation does not limit what you could grow. From microgreens, salads, herbs to certain varieties of root vegetables like carrots and beetroot. Even growing tall plants is possible as tub heights are easily adjustable. Only limitations might be those with very deep roots.

  

 

Microgreens are the most sought-after super foods now. Studies show that microgreens pack 40 times the nutrients than a full-grown plant. They are easy to digest, offer an intense flavor and rich nutrition, and are versatile to use.
column19: >Harvesting microgreens is one of the most fun things you would do on your Herbstation.
column21:
>

We are Altifarm Enverde,  a crowdfunded startup. We strive to offer a healthier and wholesome way of life to all. We believe in Your Right to Grow, Anywhere, Anytime.  With Herbstation, we applied the learning from our first product to make home farming more approachable and adaptable to a wider audience.     

 

 

 

Design Inspiration
column22:
>Inspiration from the symmetric organic curves of pottery and the finest textures from nature. Discreet sophistication in smaller details and a superior user experience to match.

 

A peek into the creative process
column23:
>Spun-off from a product design studio, design and innovation is at the heart of everything we do.

 

Product Development Journey

 

Herbstation is a distillation of everything we have learned with interaction with Altifarmers in 5 continents, while Altifarm itself came to life in 4 years.  We have obsessed over every little detail and fine-tuned every function to make Herbstation a complete indoor gardening solution. Barring LED chips and driver, every single  item in the box is custom manufactured to our specifications. This includes special polymer blends and coatings
column24: even the PVC/PE film for the greenhouse is made to order and then tailored by our supplier. We are probably the only manufacturer of grow systems whose grow lights are NOT made in China
column25: custom wiring kits and optical lens were developed.
column26:
>1) Ideation 2)CAD Modelling 3) Machined Prototype 4) 3D Printed Prototype 5) Growlight Development 6) Pilot Production through RTV molding

 

 

We have come a long way from the first sketch in 2014. Altifarm then and Herbstation now.
column27: >We have been working overtime to get Herbstation to backers during Autumn 2019. Like other Altifarmers, you must be able to grow this winter with your Herbstation!
column28: >Snippets of Altifarm fulfillment
column35: >tubs are identical across variants
column38:
> 

 Do you know that the loss of nutritive value of certain food items is more than 50% from farm to fork? Or that food travels for over 1500 miles on an average and has a significant carbon footprint? Also that the crop varieties in commercial farming are prioritized for shelf life and not for nutrition, while we miss out on local, organic and heirloom varieties of plant varieties.

Homegrown produce is rich in nutrients, especially in phytochemicals, anti-oxidants, vitamin C, vitamin A and folates. There’s only the joy, pride and delightful consumption with no chemicals, pesticides or GMO to worry about. Besides it’s a great way to engage the whole family- particularly children, in an enjoyable hobby, while connecting with nature.

   

 

Risks and challenges

With our previous campaign, although we were able to almost ship out in time, there was delay due to malware attack/shutdown at the sea terminal which cost us about 2 weeks. Further, the last mile delivery estimates given to us were off by a multiple of 3 which resulted in further delay and heartbreak both in N.A. and E.U. 
We are armed with these learnings and are better prepared. Compact packaging dimension is the cornerstone of Herbstation's design, which makes shipping simpler. 
Although pilot production is complete, we still have work to do in tooling and serial production. Like any other development project, there could be delays and setbacks. However, we promise transparency and truth at every step. We shall try to share photos of milestones as updates wherever possible.

 

 

","Cost of seeds : $3           Output Weight : 10.5 oz        Output Market Price : $30 Growing superfoods like microgreens are as simple as sprinkling some seeds and watch it grow. Herbstation makes it super easy for you to grow fresh produce. Herbs, salads, vegetables, fruits, and exotics - you name it, Herbstation covers it all. Studies have proven that plants make people more productive, boosts creativity and reduces stress. They also reduce noise levels and balances humidity. Some plants purify the air, while others keep mosquitoes and other insects away.  If growing edibles is not your thing, you may grow garden plants on Herbstation- ornamental and florals, exotics and medicinal varieties, succulents or #plantsofinstagram. Whatever you may choose, our ingenious Self-watering and LED grow lights would let your plants thrive.          With our patent-pending self-watering system, all you need to do is just top up the water level every weekend or so. It stores water for 7-10 days and provides for on-demand watering, using capillary action and gravity. With root aeration, your plants will grow quicker and healthier. Also, our LED grow lights gives 100% autonomy from sunlight.No pump/motor/power connection for water circulation and no clogging/sedimentation. No pH or conductivity check and no fungus/algae or damp corners at home.Automatic on-demand watering also helps with root oxygenation for healthier plants.             Grow lights are included in every Herbstation order               Complete autonomy from sunlight. From seeds to harvest, all under grow lights.

column1: 3W High-power, energy efficient OSRAM chip LEDs with custom secondary optics.
Full spectrum White + Far Red + Deep Blue wavelengths.
Magnetic Mounting, first time in the industry.
Daisy Chain wiring kit + IP65 rated water-proof driver/ power supply.

By providing plants exactly the wavelengths that are required for various growth stages, we boost their growth while reducing power consumption and eliminate wasted heat energy.    Fill it, shut it, forget it - for a week or more!
Stores water for 7-10 days and waters on demand, automatically.
Works with gravity/ capillary action. No electricity, water connection, or pump involved.
No under watering or over watering, no guesswork.
Better root oxygenation for healthier plant growth.
Easy height adjustment at the push of a button  With so many plants to choose from, you have several possibilities to go with.
One touch height adjustment with auto-locking.
Multiple heights and positions to choose from to suit a wide range of plants.
Ergonomic positioning and gives plants easy access to grow lights.
Always take the weather with you!
Roll-up doors with zipper and velcro closure.
Limited protection from pets, children and certain pests.
It's so easy, everyone will like to move it, move it!
Neat design with discrete spherical wheels.
Includes position locking and height-leveling mechanisms.

column1:
0,"

 

...a simple, low cost cutting board that keeps your kitchen workspace tidy.

We were unhappy with the products out there so we decided to design our own, making simplicity our starting point! The result is this compact yet generous chopping board which utilises two detachable trays to always keep your chopping board clear.

We hope you like this innovative design enough to back our campaign! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Chop+Swipe is an original idea which does not resemble anything currently on the market.  It is pending patent in the US. If you are interested in the Chop+Swipe and its creation process, please take a look at the designer's notes below.

 

The Chop+Swipe team is led by Graham Tulett. We are industrial designers based in London and Barcelona with over 25 years of experience helping clients transform ideas into award-winning designs.

 

The board is made from 4mm thick polypropylene (PP) plastic and is further strengthened by a hexagonal honeycomb structure underneath to give compression and torsional strength. 

The trays are made from food grade ABS which is the strong plastic that telephones are made of.  We expect Chop+Swipe to have a long life-span for happy users. 

The feet are made of silicone rubber.

 

 

We are also please to say that as of Nov 2020, tooling for Chop+Swipe has been completed!

The Rockwell Model T is shaving, perfected. All other razors pretend everyone’s face and facial hair is the same, resulting in millions of men suffering from daily shaving irritation and overpaying for razor marketing gimmicks or subscriptions they don’t need. The Rockwell Model T is an intuitive, easy to use razor, with an adjustable dial that allows everyone to easily get a close and comfortable shave. Every Rockwell Model T comes with a pack of 100 Rockwell Stainless Steel Blades - that’s two years of blades included with your pledge! Additional 100-packs of blades cost just $10 - that’s only 10 cents a blade. The world needs an alternative to cartridge razors and unnecessary shave clubs - join the revolution!
• Fully adjustable to your skin type and facial hair length - just twist the dial for your perfect shave.
• Eliminates the skin irritation and razor bumps caused by multi-blade cartridge systems.
• Easy blade-loading and intuitive shave settings make it easy to transition from cartridge razors with no nicks or cuts.
• Includes a pack of 100 Rockwell Razor Blades - that's two years of blades.
• No marketing gimmicks or subscriptions - just fantastic shaves.
• Not adjustable - cartridges are designed for some mythical ""average guy"" as if all men have the same skin type and facial hair.
• Cartridges can tug and pull on facial hair, causing many people to suffer from skin irritation, razor bumps, and razor burn.
• Typical cartridges cost $3 to $5 each, which adds up fast - that's why they keep the cartridge razors behind the counter or in a locked glass vault.
• Relies on marketing gimmicks and celebrity endorsements to fool you into overpaying.
• It's still a cartridge razor except it comes in the mail. So it's not adjustable and can still cause skin irritation and razor bumps.
• $1 to $3 per cartridge is still 10 to 30 times too much for a good razor blade!
• A funny commercial or fancy handle doesn't actually improve the quality of your shave.
• Most of that money is to pay the postal service to deliver your blades.
• You're still locked into a specific cartridge system with no options to change blade suppliers.
• No one currently manufactures an easy to use, one piece, twist to open, adjustable razor.
• Typically, these razors follow a multi-piece design or are not adjustable, so it can be more intimidating for those interested in switching to a classic razor from cartridge shaving.

The Rockwell Model T allows you to adjust fluidly between shave settings 1 through 6, so you can customize the shave to your skin type and facial hair length by slightly adjusting the angle at which the blade cuts your hair.
• Lower Rockwell Size settings (between 1-3) are for men with sensitive skin and are the perfect place to start a seamless transition from cartridge razor shaving with no nicks, cuts or discomfort.
• Higher Rockwell Size settings (between 4-6) are for men with thick, coarse hair and men lining up a serious beard.

Problem: All multi-blade cartridges have a fundamental design flaw and your skin suffers for it. The problem is multiple blades, which can pull the hairs and cut them below skin level. When hairs are cut beneath the skin, they often curl and bend as they grow back, leading to skin irritation, and painful razor bumps. There's even a Wikipedia article explaining this!

Solution: Using a single blade razor like the Model T means no pulling and tugging is possible. Even better, the Model T is adjustable, which ensures that hair is never cut shorter than the surrounding skin. With an adjustable single blade razor you eliminate the causes of ingrown hairs, razor bumps and shaving irritation.

The Rockwell Model T uses double-edge razor blades, which we sell for 10 cents each. We're also including 100 free Rockwell blades with the Model T for every backer - that's two years of shaving if you use one blade per week!

If you already have a favorite brand of double-edge blade, no problem. The Rockwell Model T works with any double-edge blade on the market. You’re not locked into a specific ""blade system"" or subscription. The choice of blade is always yours.

Gladly! It's very simple: cartridges can cost from $1 to $5 each, but double-edge razor blades are available for 10 cents each - from our site, Amazon, and most drug and grocery stores. We think our blades are the absolute best value on the market, but feel free to try other blades too - we're okay with an open relationship.

• The adjustable shave dial allows you to customize the Model T to your skin type and facial hair length. Simply twist the dial to adjust the blade angle to the perfect setting for your skin and facial hair.
• Lower Rockwell Size settings (1-3) are great for men with sensitive skin, and are the perfect place to start for a seamless transition from cartridge razor shaving.
• Higher Rockwell Size settings (4-6) are great for men with thick, coarse hair, as well as men shaving or lining up a serious beard.
Twist the bottom of the handle to open the doors of the razor, allowing you to easily and safely load and replace blades.
Real Razor Blades, at an Unreal Price
<li>The Model T uses inexpensive universal double-edge razor blades.
As a backer, you'll receive a 100-pack of Rockwell Blades included in your pledge!
• Rockwell also sells the 100-pack of Rockwell Razor Blades for only $10 - that’s just 10 cents a blade!
• The knurled handle ensures a secure, comfortable grip during each shave, while maintaining an elegant aesthetic.
• Chromed brass externals provide a timelessly appealing look.
• Coated brass internal components ensure extreme durability.
Thanks for asking! Throwing out cartridges produces outrageous amounts of hazardous garbage every year.
We'll keep you posted with transparent updates through all the production (and you can hold us to that). Here's how the production timeline looks right now:
<figcaption>This schedule is subject to change if there are unanticipated delays, but this isn't our first rodeo - we're confident we'll ship by March 2017.</figcaption>
We're keeping it simple. Each pledge gets the following:

We've put 18 months into the design and testing of the Rockwell Model T to ensure it's not only an incredible razor and timelessly elegant, but that's it's also manufacturing-ready. Take a closer look!
If we're able to offer any stretch goals as the campaign progresses, we'll add them to this section. In the meantime...
The Rockwell Stainless Steel Stand is a fantastic way to proudly display your Rockwell Model T. It will be available to backers for $24.99 USD after the campaign.
<figcaption>The brushed finish of the Stainless Steel Stand will match the finish of the Model T.</figcaption>
The Rockwell Blade Safe is a safe, recyclable way to dispose of used blades - and costs just $1.99.
<figcaption>My thumb and forefinger are not included with this as a stretch goal, nor as an add-on</figcaption>
Free shipping included in pledge. Pledge rewards will ship by USPS.
Free shipping included in pledge. Pledge rewards will ship by Canada Post.

We care about our EU backers! We're providing free shipping to EU countries, and VAT will be charged in addition to pledge reward cost, at the time surveys are sent out. Pledge rewards will ship from within Europe, so backers aren't hit with additional duties and customs fees.

We've tried to keep shipping fees as low as possible for our backers in other countries. Shipping will be $20 USD in addition to pledge reward cost, and will be charged at the time surveys are sent out. Shipping methods will vary country-by-country, we'll announce shipping methods in a future update, close to shipping time. Please be aware we cannot control or eliminate, duties and customs fees shipping to your country. We will be accurately reporting the commercial value of the shipment to you - please do not ask us to mis-report the commercial value.

Please note that shipping to any country outside the United States, Canada, and the EU may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. Again, there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

column5: target=""_blank"">We had an immensely enriching experience
column8: > with our
column11: target=""_blank"">first Kickstarter campaign
column14: >, and we couldn't be more excited to now be on Indiegogo InDemand! The relationships we formed with all of our backers through crowdfunding are second to none. InDemand allows all of you to vote on the future of shaving, and we are grateful for every ounce of support you provide, whether your support is financial, social (sharing with your network), or simply providing us feedback. We have thoroughly enjoyed sharing the Rockwell journey with all of you. If you’re ready for a shaving revolution, please support our campaign and spread the word!

column1: Rockwell Razors is an experienced product design and manufacturing team, and it all started through crowdfunding (with our previous crowdfunded razor, the Rockwell 6S). We're dedicated to providing incredible shaving value to our thousands of backers all over the world. After not being satisfied with the first version of the product delivered to our backers from our previous campaign, we upgraded the design and manufacturing, made a whole new product, and delivered it to every backer of the campaign, at no additional charge. Actually, VentureBeat recently had us write a guest post on that incredible journey. We take fulfilling our promises to you very seriously, and have the track record to prove it.
Think2Thing - a simply incredible Toronto-based engineering and 3D-imaging lab.
VivaMedia - awesome, crazy-patient video editing. Matt's a star.
IndigoSeven - probably the best value for anything filming-related for startups in Toronto in need of video.
Music from BenSound, with license.

In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. Again, there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

We had an immensely enriching experience with our first Kickstarter campaign, and we couldn't be more excited to now be on Indiegogo InDemand! The relationships we formed with all of our backers through crowdfunding are second to none. InDemand allows all of you to vote on the future of shaving, and we are grateful for every ounce of support you provide, whether your support is financial, social (sharing with your network), or simply providing us feedback. We have thoroughly enjoyed sharing the Rockwell journey with all of you. If you’re ready for a shaving revolution, please support our campaign and spread the word!

Rockwell Razors is an experienced product design and manufacturing team, and it all started through crowdfunding (with our previous crowdfunded razor, the Rockwell 6S). We're dedicated to providing incredible shaving value to our thousands of backers all over the world. After not being satisfied with the first version of the product delivered to our backers from our previous campaign, we upgraded the design and manufacturing, made a whole new product, and delivered it to every backer of the campaign, at no additional charge. Actually, VentureBeat recently had us write a guest post on that incredible journey. We take fulfilling our promises to you very seriously, and have the track record to prove it.
Think2Thing - a simply incredible Toronto-based engineering and 3D-imaging lab.
VivaMedia - awesome, crazy-patient video editing. Matt's a star.
IndigoSeven - probably the best value for anything filming-related for startups in Toronto in need of video.
Music from BenSound, with license.",59.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column5: >Cloud Farms was created around the idea that everyone should have access to clean,

column1: fresh, healthy food, and that we should all have the ability to grow
some of our own. Cloud Farms is more than just this product
column2: we hope to build a company that continues to develop tools for growing that are simple, beautiful,

column1: and enjoyable. Tools that enable even those without time, growing
experience or access to outdoor space.
Cloud Farms AMPHORA uses hydroponics to grow fresh herbs, flowers, and
small greens without any of the hassle of trying to grow with soil
indoors. With a 1.5L water capacity, AMPHORA holds enough water for the
lifetime of your plant, meaning there is no watering. Plus our seed kits
come with everything you need to get growing. Fill it with water, add a
shot of nutrient, plant your seeds, and come back in 5-6 weeks to harvest your fresh
herbs. All you need is a sunny windowsill.

column7: >Designed in NYC | Cast Ceramic | Made in USA

column1: holds enough water for the lifetime of an herb plant. Roots grow
directly into the water and continue to descend as the water level
drops. By the time the water has almost run out, you have a full grown
Every AMPHORA perk includes a seed kit. Every kit includes enough material to grow 8 times: 50 seeds, 8
single-shot plant nutrient capsules, and 8 pieces of soil-less growing medium.
If you claim an AMPHORA perk, we will reach out to you after the campaign to see exactly what kind of seeds you would like.
...but if you contribute for an AMPHORA perk we will send you a postcard right away that you can gift for the holidays.
Here is what it will look like:
In order to get to where we are today, we hacked, tested, designed, prototyped, engineered, sampled, sourced production, found suppliers, and grew a whole lot of plants.

We are going to do a first production run of at least 100 units. In order to do that, we would like to have pre-orders for at least half of that number, around 50 units, so that we can cover some of those production costs. Even if we don't hit our goal, we still plan to produce 100 units.
What we need to pay for upfront:
• Brass stamp for the base of the pitcher.
• Amphora inventory costs including production, shipping, logo graphics, net cups, and packaging.
• Small item inventory for seed kits, including boxes, bags, growing medium, nutrients, printing, and seeds.
What you guys are going to get by supporting us now:
• Some early discounts on the first units.
• A postcard just in time for Christmas.
• The satisfaction of knowing that you helped to drive forward our future of personal farm systems!

column2: >December 19 - Production order is placed and other inventory is ordered.
>January 18 - Production molds are finished and ceramic casting begins.
>January 20 - Inventory arrives and perks are assembled minus ceramics.

column1:
Some of the challenges we face and how we will overcome:

  • We need to get through the first production run with our supplier. We will be be working closely with them to make sure that everything comes out exactly as it should. If there is any delay in our production process, we will let everyone know immediately of what is going on and when you can expect to recieve your perk.

• We are going to be shipping products for the first time! It is incredibly exciting for us, and we want to make sure that you are satisfied with what you get! If something is not right with your product, let us know and we will work fast to fix it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, here are some things you can do to help.

  • Tell your friends about our campaign. Tell anyone who you know who likes fresh food, who shops organic, who already grows or has had difficulty growing.
• Share the Indiegogo campaign with social media!
Industrial Design and Founder of Cloud Farms.

Seven Years ago, my family planned a holiday weekend getaway but had no one to water our Christmas Tree.  I wanted a solution. But there was none.
7 years, 4 prototypes, hundreds of revisions, countless tests, and the Christmas Tree Butler is ready!
Setting up your Christmas Tree Butler is easy and only take a few moments:
Fill your tree stand the first time, ensuring there are no leaks and your stand is level.
Fill Christmas Tree Butler's reservoir with water
Place the lid on the reservoir and Insert the Control Tower
Insert the Tree Attachment into your tree stand, making sure the “Fill To” line is below the top of the water
Secure the Tree Attachment to the tree by wrapping the shock cord around the trunk and snapping into the cleat
Plug the power adapter into the Control Tower and the wall outlet.

Christmas Tree Butler uses an included 9 Volt power adapter to operate. Not only is it safe to use near water, but it’s also inexpensive to run! The power adapter accepts 100 -240 Volts, so yes you can use it in Europe, as long as you have an adapter.

At the heart of the Christmas Tree Butler is The Tree Attachment, which monitors and delivers water to your tree stand. After years of engineering, we have developed a solution that is not only easy to attach to your tree, but also works with nearly any tree stand available on the market! Short, tall, narrow, wide: if it's out there, we made sure Christmas Tree Butler fits!
As an extra safety precaution, the Tree Attachment houses a tilt sensor that will stop the flow of water if the Tree Attachment is removed from your tree stand.

Our reservoir holds 2 1/2 gallons of water, enough to supply your tree with several days of water! Handholds on the bottom of the reservoir make for secure transport from the kitchen sink, or you can just refill in place with a watering can or bottle.

Our reservoir lid makes the Christmas Tree Butler easy to fill either in your sink or under the tree. Our translucent reservoir makes it easy to tell when you are done filling, and our no-spill lid helps prevent water spills.
All parts fit inside the reservoir for easy storage. No lost parts.

Using four circuit boards and two microcontrollers, our team of electronic engineers leveraged sophisticated water sensing and monitoring technology to make Christmas Tree Butler a truly hands-off system.

The Control Tower houses our Control Board.  The control board collects readings from the Tree Attachment every six tenths of a second and, using this data, it determines when to turn the pump on and when to turn it off.
As extra security, we’ve added sensors to shut off the pump if the Tree Attachment is pulled out of the stand, or if the pump runs too long.

In early versions, we tried using float switches, pressure sensors, and even electrical current sensors to determine when to turn the pump on and off. Float switches got stuck open or closed from debris. Pressure sensors weren’t accurate. And varying mineral content caused electrical sensors to become corroded.

Now we use electrically insulated strip electrodes, which are immune from debris and water mineral content. These highly accurate electrodes are non-invasive and won’t corrode, and there are no moving parts to break down or get bound up.
One of our biggest breakthroughs was the implementation of double siphon breaks.
For use with a short tree stand, the siphon break in the reservoir prevents water from flowing into your tree stand after the pump has stopped.
If you have a tall tree stand, the siphon break in the Tree Attachment prevents water from flowing back into the reservoir, emptying your stand.
No matter where you place your tree, Christmas Tree Butler's double siphon break means water will flow only when and where it's needed.

When the reservoir gets low on water, a gentle beep alerts you that it’s time to refill the reservoir. Simply pour water through our easy-fill lid, or carry it to and from the kitchen sink with the easy-carry handholds.
Once the reservoir is filled, your Christmas Tree Butler is ready to maintain your Christmas tree for several more days!
Enjoy this promotional video we made for the Christmas Tree Butler. The stars of the show are my nephew, his lovely wife, and their beautiful children.

No matter how much we've got our act together things can still go wrong. If they do, we promise to give you full transparency into the issues and solve them in a way where our backers are happy and proud to support our company. Supply Chain Risk: Sometimes a machine or tool breaks. Sometimes a factory loses power for a day. Sometimes we get the wrong parts or materials in. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our products. Acts of God : After 2020 we hope this is understood.
column2: ) We're launching a product late in the design phase, but still undergoing final tweaks. The items you receive might look a little different than what you see pictured in our video. But, isn't that part of the fun of backing a Kickstarter campaign? Come join us for the ride as we bring the Christmas Tree Butler to life! We realize you're taking on a little more risk than if you waited until these products were available for sale on Amazon. But you're also receiving a reward: you'll get the Christmas Tree Butler first.

column1: Share this link with someone who could use it!

column3:
> 

 

01 is world’s first dimensioning instrument. Carved in aluminum, and contained within a pen, pencil or stylus, 01 is both a serious writing instrument and a to-go dimensioning instrument.  Shipping now!

01Go has all of the dimensioning power of 01, but in a pure, strap-and-go package. Shipping March, 2017.

 

Features

column1: • Share via SMS, Email, make Facebook post
Features. App Lite features plus:

For Home
Dimension space for furniture, put up pictures, set up grid for posters, or get length of material needed. Share instantly. 

 

 

For Work
Quickly log H*W*D in mm, inches or just about anything else. Measure and log complex contours. Use a scale and read drawings. 

 

 

For Fun
Check kid's height, attach pic and share on social media. Dimension your grandfather's mustache. Compete for the largest bicep. 

 

Fastest, most portable and most affordable 3D curve scanner.

Wether you model scenes or design cars, capturing key curves in real life is something we all need. With InstruMMents PRO app, you'll be able to do this faster and easier then ever.  Just capture, share and download to CAD.  

 

Details:
• Bluetooth Smart System. Connect to your mobile device

column2: >01: a serious writing instrument
column4:
'>.

We didn't just attach a pen, pencil and stylus to 01.  We started with the highest quality, German made, ink cartridges and twist mechanisms, from-scratch pencil mechanisms. Then we crafted a device around them, that feels perfectly balanced in your hand.  Weight, feel and roll are just right, making 01 a must-have in your bag, purse or pocket.

 

 

 

 

We've been working with the manufacturers for six months now to fine tune parts, make just the right tooling and fixtures and get the assembly and testing finessed. We are days away from being able to ship.

 

It has your name on it
Like a great chef’s knife, a dimensioning instrument is highly personal. Whether it is a treat for yourself or a thoughtful gift, each 01 can be personalized with a signature. Simply let us know the name you'd like on your 01 and we'll create a signature, then precision laser it on the device.

 

SIGNATURES MUST BE REQUESTED BY SENDING AN EMAIL TO SIGNATURES@INSTRUMMENTS.COM UPON BACKING.  IF YOU DO NOT REQUEST WHAT YOU WOULD LIKE AS A SIGNATURE, WE CANNOT ETCH THE DEVICES FOR YOU.

 

Q: How does 01 work?

A: 01 rolls to capture dimensions of any object, then logs, converts and shares the dimensions through your mobile phone.  It contains a proprietary gear and magnet sensor system that is reading rotation and revolutions.

 

Q: How accurate is 01?

A: 01 uses a proprietary magnetic sensor and gear system to measure quite accurately.   Sensor is accurate up to 0.1mm, but the ultimate accuracy depends on the user.  We are working on solutions to remove the user error, but for now, the users will have to live with some small human caused tolerance, much like when they use a measuring tape.

 

Q: How do you measure straight on a wall?

A: Just like a measuring tape, perfectly measuring a long straight surface is hard. However, if you keep arm relatively firm, walking with some care from one end to the other, the result is surprisingly precise and consistent with what you would get from a measuring tape.  We are also working on ways to make this experience even easier.

 

Q: Who is 01 for?

01 is an essential tool for everyone who makes.  Designers, engineers, architects, tailors, carpenters and masons, for example.  But it’s also for the hobbyists, and even kids studying geometry, shop or physics.  If you think about it, dimensions are incredibly important.  We put up pictures, buy furniture and appliances based on size, and shop for clothes that fit best.  01 is meant to equip most of us with the most convenient, most intuitive way to capture and use dimensions every day.  It is also thoughtfully personal.  It’s crafted and elegant, and you can get your signature or initial etched.  Like a chef’s knife, this is a perfect treat for ourselves or a gift for someone we care about.

 

Q: Will I pay taxes or duty?

It is possible that you will pay taxes and/or duty in the country you are ordering from.  01s are shipping from assembly in Thailand.  You can check with your local authorities on taxation and duties on products imported.

I Made a Promise

My name is Shaun.  For the last six or seven years, my mother has been raising my niece, her granddaughter.  It's been hard, and I've helped them as much as I can.  But this year, on December 23rd, the money runs out.  My niece doesn't know this yet, but if I can't come up with some money, they'll be celebrating Christmas in my mom's car, instead of in their home.

I Can't Promise Much

I need your help to keep that from happening.  If you have $1, or $5, or $20, anything at all would help me keep my mom and my niece in their home come Christmas Eve.  Any money collected in excess of the $500 (Actually, I need $600.  I donated $100 to prove I'm serious.  I... didn't think that through.) goal will go towards paying next month's rent, then food and other necessities.  I've opted for the Flexible Funding option, so that they'll get whatever I can manage to raise.  Literally anything will help.
• Contributors of $1 or more will receive an individually-written thank you (by email).
• Contributors of $20 or more will receive a picture of my mom and niece on Christmas Day this year.
• Contributors of $100 or more will be listed as ""(Name) the elf"" in the ""From:"" part on my nieces' Christmas presents this year.  I will totally post pictures, too.

Help Me

On December 10th, I received an email from my mom.  It said she was going to have to cancel our plans for Christmas, because she would be evicted from her apartment by December 23rd.  She just doesn't have the money to make rent, and she can't scrape it together.  I have some money that I'm going to be giving her, but it isn't enough.  

I want to celebrate Christmas this year with a tree, and (really it's going to be small) pile of presents, not with a gas pump and a drive-through dinner.  Please help me make this happen.

Help Them

Even if you can't contribute money, I need your help!  Share this on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, your blog.  The more people who see this, the more likely it will be that they'll keep their home.  This is my Christmas present to them.  Won't you please make it yours, too?

[Coaster] 

Coaster protecting your tables from water mark or condensation damage

Drinks can create water rings and drip excess liquid as they sit on your tables. With Mug mate coaster, you can protect your table against marks and rings that can be a real hassle to remove. This coaster will keep your tables dry and scratch free, always with style and functionality.

 

 

[Lid] 

Food Grade Silicone Drink Cover Lid, Anti dust and keep Drinks Warm or Cold Longer

Cover a cup to avoid dust and keep drinks Warm or Cold Longer. Whether it's hot tea, coffee, or iced drinks, its silicone lid help maintain the temperature, freshness, and flavor of your cup's contents. So you have more time to savor what's inside! The lid is made of 100% Food Grade Silicone, and BPA Free, microwaveable &
column7:

Tea bag holder and infuser rest dish

>https://www.instagram.com/habitamin_goods/

 

Habitamin , the good habit like good vitamin for you,

“Habitamin” is made by habits of life and dedicated to providing valuable habits toward product which people are using everyday. Habitamin believes that the ""power of the habits"" and wants to help people keep the loop of their good habit through its product.

 

Our Mission

Our mission is to make everyday living easier and give a good habit with innovative products designed to help people organize and enhance their homes with good habit of lifestyle.  Our products always offer more than meets the eye—they solve problems, enhance the home, give a new good habit.

 

Team

We're small studio based in OC, CA and we pride ourselves in doing things and turning them into real. We have no outside investors, no revenue goals. But we love providing useful product to people through our ability and idea. We get to focus on what we love to do: designing beautiful, innovative products for likeminded people. So we think that Crowdfunding is a best way to reach to our pleasure.

Your support is greatly appreciated

Thank you all.

Best,

The team of Habitamin

column1: Current offerings in the market lack innovation and beneficial features. At Melange, we have harnessed technological advancements in order to bring you the best possible sheets at an affordable price.

One challenging obstacle we faced while developing the Melange sheets was figuring out a formula that allowed us to integrate a variety of features into one sheet. After extensive prototyping with different fabrics and fabric combination, we found a solution! Using 97% Premium Long-Staple Cotton and 3% Synthetic fibers, we were able to achieve our desired result.
We wanted our pricing to be simple and transparent. Therefore our prices revolve around 3 key aspects:
By selling directly to you online, we’re able to shave away excess and offer our high-quality products at a price everyone can get behind!

The way we celebrate is changing. The Posted Party Co makes at-home celebrations special. Elevate small gatherings or synchronize virtual events with our complete, professionally designed celebration boxes. Each box includes everything you need for an instagram post-worthy scene. Just add food, (virtual) friends and fun!

We are offering hand-crafted, specially curated Valentine's Day boxes for two to help make your at-home celebration special. Choose from our Simple or Deluxe Valentine's Day celebration box. All of our boxes include a complete table setting for two, from high-end disposable plates and cutlery, to beautiful paper flowers and candles, plus a sweet treat and a fun surprise! Our Deluxe box includes additional decorations to make your entire space feel festive. Perfect for a cozy Sunday brunch or celebratory dinner date. All of the items included are high-quality, and many can be kept and used as everyday decor. Each box will come with a brief instructional guide, showing you how to set-up your table and decorations.

The Posted Party Co looks forward to supporting your at-home, socially-distanced or virtual events with a series of seasonally themed boxes. We aim to make upscale hosting convenient and easy for all.

Our Valentine's Day box is a proof of concept for our offering. We are working on a very tight timeline to have everything ordered, assembled and delivered to you in time for Valentine's Day! We will jump through every hoop to make sure each box is delivered in time for your special celebration. However, we ask for understanding just in case there is any delay in delivering your box, as we work to become masters of shipping logistics! We promise to proactively communicate if we anticipate any delay in delivery. We are also working on our packaging, and will ask for your feedback on this and the overall experience.
If you can't contribute now, please keep an eye out for our offerings in the future. You can also watch our space on instagram: @thepostedpartyco

Waycap for Dolce Gusto is a stainless steel, eco-friendly, infinitely reusable, compatible capsule for brewing a perfect espresso at home.
Enjoying a good espresso at home can be a true pleasure, a moment to take a break and savour the day. But we believe that it shouldn’t come at the expense of our planet’s health.
Did you know that every year around 15 billion capsules are sold around the world, producing thousand tons of waste that end up in landfills and our oceans?
By changing a small habit, we can make our contribution to the environment. While saving money and without foregoing the great taste of your favourite coffee.

With Waycap for Dolce Gusto you can stop wasting tons of disposable capsules and help protect our planet. You can save up to 1000 euros on coffee per year for a family of four. But, most importantly, you can regain control over your choices: use it with almost any grind and any coffee available on the market, whether it’s from your favourite brand or a local independent roaster.
WayCap for Dolce Gusto is practical and easy to use. Here is how it works:
1) Place the capsule on the support ring for stability

2) Choose the interchangeable filter that fits with your coffee

3) Fill the capsule with your favourite coffee and press it with the tamper provided

4) Brew your coffee

5) Reuse it as many times as you want
column2:
>

What makes Waycap unique?

Our patented system of interchangeable filters allows you to use almost any blend available on the market, whether it’s from the supermarket or from your local roaster. Just use the filter corresponding to your coffee’s grind size to enjoy your favourite coffee at home. Your taste. Your choice.

The lid of our new Dolce Gusto compatible capsule is unique in its design. At the bottom of the lid there is a special “shower filter”. Thanks to this system, the water, entering the capsule from a single point, is actually distributed evenly throughout the coffee for a barista-quality espresso that is always impeccable.
column3: >
column4:
>

In contrast with our throwaway culture, with a stainless steel body and a lid in food-grade silicone, our Waycap capsules for Dolce Gusto are designed to last a lifetime. You can reuse them as many times as you like.

And what’s more, the impact on the environment is minimal in every step of the production process. Every element of the capsule is produced right next to the storage warehouse and only travels once to reach your home. Even our packaging is minimal and completely recyclable. The only waste product from Waycap are the coffee grounds.

Since Waycap works with almost any blend on the market, you can save up to 85% compared to disposable capsules. That’s up to 1000 euros per year for a family of four!
column7: >
column8: >
column9: >
column10:
>

 

Risk and Challenge

If the new WayCap for Dolce Gusto is successfully funded we are extremely confident we will be able to produce the capsules and have it sent to backers in time by November 2018, like we did in our previous campaigns.

In the last two years, we have been working around the clock refining our designs: numerous prototypes have been developed and countless hours have been spent making sure the capsule will be as good as we intend them to be. After extensive research, we have also established a good relationship with some manufacturers that have many years of experience in the field of stainless steel and silicone and are able to work to our exact specifications. But as with ANY new product, timeline is always the biggest risk. We will make every effort to deliver on time, and could even deliver the product before expected. However, there could be unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during early production. We ask for your patience, and promise to deliver a quality product to each and every backer as soon as possible.

Coloris is a color arrangement puzzle game, it allows players to create harmony from chaos and to have the sense of achievement after completion.

It is also a decorative piece that you can use it to light up your space.

Coloris uses wooden material as we believe touching natural material and feel the wooden texture will bring better playing experience. We uses laser cutting technique and will apply safe color painting on the wooden pieces directly to achieve the effect.

We started this project in October 2020 and we had several runs of iteration process to keep on improving our product.

Everyone has their own understanding to different colors. We have named part of color pieces but reserved some colors as the rewards, you are able to name it. We hope the beautiful colors could remind you something great in life. We will contact with the campaign about more detailed information.

Examples of color names:

 

Thank you so much for your support, hope you have a great life.

Introduction

No matter how the day went, it could easily turn sour if you go home to the wrong pillow. The pillow is one of the most important accessory to help us sleep better. After all, it keeps us comfortable and it is a direct pathway to a sweet slumber.

Pillows are often side-tracked and people forget they are not just an additional accessory to a bed but rather a pillow is the cherry on top of the icing. Why not bring home the comfort we thought we could only get from 5-star hotels to yourself and your family? 

The right pillow 

Think about it, you sleep on the same pillow every single night. Whatever you do, you come home and desire a good night’s sleep. However, when it comes to buying the right one, we’re still in a dilemma.

Cheap pillows tend to wear down after few sleeps. Even if you are willing to spend more, unfamiliar features and a wide spectrum of prices can make the options overwhelming. Finding the right pillow can be a frustrating experience but we can change that for you.

Besides, it is unable to accommodate all the different kinds of consumers. The foam could have an unbearable chemical smell or even uncomfortable. These inconveniences are something that we are forced to deal with and this have led us to create the ultimate pillow inspired from international 5 star hotels. It will certainly meet and match your expectations.  

Say hello to Waikite Pillow

This is where Waikite Pillow comes in. Anti-bacterial, odourless, firm and premium 5-star hotel pillow for your own home. 

After having studied hundreds of customer feedbacks, fabrics and types of pillows - we have created the ultimate one. We already know that international 5-star hotels’ pillows are still better than all the high tech pillows in the market. So we combined luxury with traditional materials and infused both world into one pillow.

Allow great craftsmanship to change your lives. Natural Cotton best for your skin, no chemical smell, breathable, anti-bacterial, direct machine washable, luxurious, firm &
column2:
self adjustable for your own sleeping preference. 

Traditional craftsmanship &
column3:
premium features

Using traditional craftsmanship that goes well with 100% natural cotton balls, the craft ensures to protect the fibre from being destroyed while maintaining superior quality. 

In modern luxurious hotel, the bed sheets are made of organic fabric. This is why we can sleep bare skin and feel so comfortable. We are inspired by the concept of fine experience and so the name ‘Waikite” a Japanese expression which means ""THIS IS LIVING"" is created.

Features

column1:
Inspired by your fine taste in life, from the craftsmanship and design to the quality of sleep yielded.

People with allergies no longer need to compromise with comfort as Waikite Pillow has used LENBING ANTIBACTERIAL TECHNOLOGY. This ensures that it is anti-bacterial. Feel secure when you lie on a Waikite Pillow.

 

Composed of 100% natural cotton fibre stitched by traditional 133*100 high density stitching. The classic &
column2:
3d stitching style we used is premium weaving unlike rival brands that uses low-grade sewing. 

The look and feel of a pillow highly depends on the quality of cotton used. Most pillows are made of synthetic or inferior cotton in order to compromise with the cost but also making it uncomfortable to lay on. We only use traditional 100% natural cotton ball and we don’t believe in compromising! 

Unlike synthetic, it’s better for the skin and even easier to wash! Along with high density stitching, Waikite is better for your skin as it is breathable and hygienic – long lasting even when machine washed multiple times.

 

Waikite pillow is made of allergen free synthetic spiral fibre that has great plush support that pleases all.

Specially selected high elastic micro-fibre (spiral fibre) has very good ventilation and elasticity. This prevents heat trapping and provide maximum comfort for you. When you lie on it, it feels really luxurious and yet remains firm enough for the contour of your head.

 

How long can you use it? Very long. 

The ends of the pillows are stitched with classic finishing, reinforced with 3D seals. This is the standard for high end pillows and Waikite Pillow has it too, making sure you have only the best experience with us.

 

Using natural cotton means longer and more fibrous threads. These factors allow every pillow cover made from it to have high air circulation. It’s breathable that keeps you comfortable and cool throughout the night.

 

Waikite pillow is as natural as it is and it does not have any chemical smell. Together with the breathability, any foul smell automatically gone as well.

 

 

Each of us has a different body shape and mass. The universal solution is to allow user to adjust the firmness of the pillow by adding or reducing the micro fiber. User would be able to have the best pillow for themselves.  

 

 

You can customise Waikite Pillow to your perfect body, allowing a custom fit and optimal alignment to get the most out of your precious sleep whether you are a stomach sleeper, side sleeper or back sleeper. 

 

 

Waikite Pillow is the best for urban lifestyle. You can use it as a support when you are reading, hugging it when writing and snuggling on the sofa with your loved one while watching movies. 

When it gets dirty, you can just put Waikite Pillow into the washing machine directly. No fuss at all. Once washed, take it out and dry it. It would be the same premium pillow as you first bought it - great for high humid countries.

 

No special care is needed. After wash, you can just hang it and it dries very fast. Great for people living in the city too!

 

This is not backed by data yet. Among 30% from our beta testers saying that their counter parts have actually reduce snoring when Waikite pillow is used. This feature would be quantified soon.

 

 

Waikite is working with a manufacturer that is supplying the pillows to the international 5-star hotels and resorts that have pass stringent tests. 

Therefore the Waikite pillow that you received soon will be the same when you stayed in 5-star hotels. We only added more features collected from beta testers to make it even more incredible for you!

 

We strive to build an unbreakable trust and we guarantee you'll love the pillow. and If you aren't absolutely satisfied, return it within 30 days for a refund.

column1: • Free exchange to your old pillow if you cannot get use to it

Virtue White is currently available as our standard colour. 

Where we are  

Our design has been heavily tested and refined every step of the way. Our designers are superiorly skilled and we make it happen in collaboration with factories and suppliers from across the globe. We are not just proud of our network but we put our faith in it. 

What we need

We need your help to raise USD$10,000 in order to fund the first product run of the Waikite Pillow. In detail, this money will go towards the initial pillow run, ordering raw material and hiring the labour required. 

Reward

By backing this project you are helping us make this into a reality. Be our super-backer by sharing about Waikite pillow. Click the following.

 

Top up

Dear backers, the following is the updated accessories and top up that you can upgrade with Waikite as the stretch goals are met. As we can only select one item on kickstarter, you can include the goodies by increasing/ managing the pledge amount with the goodies you want. At the end of the campaign, the form would be sent to tally with the amount pledge. Do not worry about any missing items. I would make sure that your Waikite is received in good condition. 

 

*For backers for more immediate replies on any queries, send me a msg directly as there is email notification. 

Care

Machine wash with cold water and mild detergent only. No bleach or fabric softeners. Hang or tumble dry low. Strong threads means this won't easily fall apart.

Beta Users' Reviews:

• The beauty of sleeping luxurious is found! Being one of the beta testers allows to believe that i can sleep like I was in the 5-stars hotel during my honeymoon. Life is amazing. - David W, Anchorage, USA

• The technology that comes with it is awesome. It makes me know that I am safe as the pillow I am lying every night is anti-bacterial. This is important as in super humid country like Singapore. The trust is the highest asset Waikite has. Lastly, I can also just wash the pillow directly. Super Convenient. - Lina Boo Singapore Singapore

• I am glad that Crystal incorporated the design that I have requested. As I have a very unique body mass, it is hard for me to find a suitable pillow. I gave up many years until Waikite. To be able to self-adjust the height of the pillow according to my body shape and sleeping preference just feels so good. - Dustin V Cañete la Real Spain

Presses

Click to download the PR kit. Thanks for sharing.

","IntroductionNo matter how the day went, it could easily turn sour if you go home to the wrong pillow. The pillow is one of the most important accessory to help us sleep better. After all, it keeps us comfortable and it is a direct pathway to a sweet slumber.Pillows are often side-tracked and people forget they are not just an additional accessory to a bed but rather a pillow is the cherry on top of the icing. Why not bring home the comfort we thought we could only get from 5-star hotels to yourself and your family? The right pillow Think about it, you sleep on the same pillow every single night. Whatever you do, you come home and desire a good night’s sleep. However, when it comes to buying the right one, we’re still in a dilemma.Cheap pillows tend to wear down after few sleeps. Even if you are willing to spend more, unfamiliar features and a wide spectrum of prices can make the options overwhelming. Finding the right pillow can be a frustrating experience but we can change that for you.Besides, it is unable to accommodate all the different kinds of consumers. The foam could have an unbearable chemical smell or even uncomfortable. These inconveniences are something that we are forced to deal with and this have led us to create the ultimate pillow inspired from international 5 star hotels. It will certainly meet and match your expectations.  Say hello to Waikite PillowThis is where Waikite Pillow comes in. Anti-bacterial, odourless, firm and premium 5-star hotel pillow for your own home. After having studied hundreds of customer feedbacks, fabrics and types of pillows - we have created the ultimate one. We already know that international 5-star hotels’ pillows are still better than all the high tech pillows in the market. So we combined luxury with traditional materials and infused both world into one pillow.Allow great craftsmanship to change your lives. Natural Cotton best for your skin, no chemical smell, breathable, anti-bacterial, direct machine washable, luxurious, firm & self adjustable for your own sleeping preference. Traditional craftsmanship & premium featuresUsing traditional craftsmanship that goes well with 100% natural cotton balls, the craft ensures to protect the fibre from being destroyed while maintaining superior quality. In modern luxurious hotel, the bed sheets are made of organic fabric. This is why we can sleep bare skin and feel so comfortable. We are inspired by the concept of fine experience and so the name ‘Waikite” a Japanese expression which means ""THIS IS LIVING"" is created.Features

Inspired by your fine taste in life, from the craftsmanship and design to the quality of sleep yielded.People with allergies no longer need to compromise with comfort as Waikite Pillow has used LENBING ANTIBACTERIAL TECHNOLOGY. This ensures that it is anti-bacterial. Feel secure when you lie on a Waikite Pillow. Composed of 100% natural cotton fibre stitched by traditional 133*100 high density stitching. The classic & 3d stitching style we used is premium weaving unlike rival brands that uses low-grade sewing. The look and feel of a pillow highly depends on the quality of cotton used. Most pillows are made of synthetic or inferior cotton in order to compromise with the cost but also making it uncomfortable to lay on. We only use traditional 100% natural cotton ball and we don’t believe in compromising! Unlike synthetic, it’s better for the skin and even easier to wash! Along with high density stitching, Waikite is better for your skin as it is breathable and hygienic – long lasting even when machine washed multiple times. Waikite pillow is made of allergen free synthetic spiral fibre that has great plush support that pleases all.Specially selected high elastic micro-fibre (spiral fibre) has very good ventilation and elasticity. This prevents heat trapping and provide maximum comfort for you. When you lie on it, it feels really luxurious and yet remains firm enough for the contour of your head. How long can you use it? Very long. The ends of the pillows are stitched with classic finishing, reinforced with 3D seals. This is the standard for high end pillows and Waikite Pillow has it too, making sure you have only the best experience with us. Using natural cotton means longer and more fibrous threads. These factors allow every pillow cover made from it to have high air circulation. It’s breathable that keeps you comfortable and cool throughout the night. Waikite pillow is as natural as it is and it does not have any chemical smell. Together with the breathability, any foul smell automatically gone as well.  Each of us has a different body shape and mass. The universal solution is to allow user to adjust the firmness of the pillow by adding or reducing the micro fiber. User would be able to have the best pillow for themselves.    You can customise Waikite Pillow to your perfect body, allowing a custom fit and optimal alignment to get the most out of your precious sleep whether you are a stomach sleeper, side sleeper or back sleeper.   Waikite Pillow is the best for urban lifestyle. You can use it as a support when you are reading, hugging it when writing and snuggling on the sofa with your loved one while watching movies. When it gets dirty, you can just put Waikite Pillow into the washing machine directly. No fuss at all. Once washed, take it out and dry it. It would be the same premium pillow as you first bought it - great for high humid countries. No special care is needed. After wash, you can just hang it and it dries very fast. Great for people living in the city too! This is not backed by data yet. Among 30% from our beta testers saying that their counter parts have actually reduce snoring when Waikite pillow is used. This feature would be quantified soon.  Waikite is working with a manufacturer that is supplying the pillows to the international 5-star hotels and resorts that have pass stringent tests. Therefore the Waikite pillow that you received soon will be the same when you stayed in 5-star hotels. We only added more features collected from beta testers to make it even more incredible for you! We strive to build an unbreakable trust and we guarantee you'll love the pillow. and If you aren't absolutely satisfied, return it within 30 days for a refund.

Free replacement if stolen or lost

Great news, all the original backers have their Smart Shades delivered and we still have some left!

column1: Will Smart Shades be compatible with my existing blinds?
Yes, you can add rise to your existing window covers as long as they have a sidewinder chain – no need to get new blinds.
Is Smart Shades easy to set up?
Yes, Smart Shades works wirelessly which means there is no need to run power cables, making it easy to install and use.
What is the wireless range of Smart Shades (for example in the case of a multi storey house)?
Smart Shades has an operation range of about 40 metres, which means that it should easily cover your entire house.

Once charged by the solar panel, the device can make up to 60 full movements of the blinds or when connected to solar panel it will be always full. Usually out of box there is charge for moving curtains up and down for ~10 times.
How long does the battery charge when empty?
If the battery is low it needs 3-5 days at sunlight on window to fully charge or about 1/2 days of sun to get the system up and running.
Which smartphones are compatible with Smart Shades?
Smart Shades are currently compatible with iOS and Android phones and tablets which support Bluetooth LE.
Are Smart Shades working with all kinds of shades (vertical, horizontal, different materials etc)?
Smart Shades is compatible with all kinds of roller shades and window covers with rope.
What makes Smart Shades better than other automated shades in the market?
Smart Shades is not only easy to use, but easy to install since it is wireless. You don't have to worry about charging the device because it does it on it's own during the day using the solar panel.
How and where can I order Smart Shades?

You can support us on Indiegogo and we will deliver your Smart Shades within 1 month (required because of Indiegogo payment handling policies). You may also order the device from https://somasmarthome.com/ where it will be shipped out next business day following the order.
How can Smart Shades attached to the wall?
The best option is to use included double sided tape. Screws(not included) can be used for mounting to places where double sided tape may peel of or have weak adhesion.
Yes they will work without smartphone after initial installation.
How heavy curtains can Smart Shades move?
Supported curtains are max 2m(7foot) wide and 2m(7foot) high.
My question is not answered, where can I get support?
Please contact us on smartshades@wazombi.com. We will get back to you within 24-48h.

{UPDATE} You Are Our Heroes!

We have been blown away by your support, words, investments in our mission, and rallying behind what we're trying to do! Below you'll see the sweet token of our appreciation ('Beat the Best!' wristband) that will be bundled with your 'Thank You' package from us to you. These will go to each and every Indiegogo Investor in addition to the investor tier gifts listed to the right. THANK YOU! We think these will look great on you and we'd like to see you posting you proudly wearing them on our Facebook page.
Who's beating the what?! What is Best Disease?

'Beat the Best!' is a support network for those with Vitelliform Macular Dystrophy (Best Disease). I, Ahmed Makkawy, along with my younger brother have the gene associated with this rare form of vision-loss.

To help visualize the effects of Best Disease and the cause for vision loss - here is a diagram of the eye (source: mib.org.uk):

The macula is the part of the retina associated with color and central vision. Those with BVMD have a 'yolk-like' mass which hinders regular vision as light is projected onto the back of the eye. Below (source: mcw.edu) is an example of this genetic irregularity. The condition can be discovered and diagnosed in an individual at several stages. The most severe of which involve the mass seen below rupturing and ultimately leading to blindness in the individual. Early detection gives patients more time to get the education and support they need regarding Best Disease and the genetic testing needed to become involved in the latest stem cell research.

In early 2009, I thought I'd harness the power of social media to find others who have BVMD to build a support network where I could find people in similar situations and how they are coping. I also had contacts in the research/medical field that allowed me to become a liaison of sorts with new studies and exciting treatments being made available to the public.

Here's what we've been able to do thus far :
  • Build a network of 1,000+ individuals on our Facebook page who actively engage in discussion, Q&
column2:
A, and help support one another with their stories and inspiration.
  • Attended a SCORE (www.score.org) seminar and training to learn the ins/outs of successfully starting an international non-profit organization. 
  • Built a database of 1,500+ researchers, experts, and ophthalmologists around the globe to help connect members to the care and information they are seeking.

column1: • Funded our first round of non-profit status filing via a T-Shirt design contest and sales along with generous private donations.
• Met with researchers at the University of Iowa Carver Lab to gain a better understanding of the latest phase of genetic discoveries and bio-medical advancements

• An active member of a bio/medical meetup 'BioAM' in one of America's leading medical research cities (Rochester, Minnesota), home of the Mayo Clinic. 

    • They say passion is the key to making a difference in any endeavor. We have passion, great members, and a serious need for resources to keep the impact we can make together a success.

column2:
What You Get

We love our supporters dearly - so let's break that down:

  • Our 'Beat the Best!' network ranges in nearly every continent, therefore we rely heavily on social networking, a website, and resources to print leaflets/mailers to send to your local vision/eye clinics to spread information about options for those with BVMD and their loved ones. 
  • We're an active and generous bunch at 'Beat the Best!' - We'd like to send out gifts of our appreciation if we reach our funding goal in 60 days.
  • We have stretch goals in place for 200% funding that would allow us to truly show you how much we are amazed by the power of crowd-funding initiatives. 

The Impact

What we can accomplish if our crowdfunding goal is met:

  • Legal fees to establish chapters of 'Beat the Best!' in the US, Europe, Asia, Africa, Middle East would be covered
  • Domain name, hosting, and web development costs covered to make an impact through a new website full of expert and community bloggers, links and contact information members would fine useful, accessibility items available for donation/purchase to assist those with low-vision in their daily lives, and of course educational material to help those who have recently been diagnosed with Best Disease. 
  • Mailing/shipping costs as we begin sending informational material to members worldwide. 

    The impact you'd be making through an investment is real and helps goals be met!

Challenges

The funding we are looking to gather via Indiegogo has little risk thankfully. I am a computer science and business administration graduate who will use the funds to do grow our network in three primary steps: 1) Register a domain and hosting services for the next five years, 2) Design and implement a responsive and text-to-speech software accessible website capable of serving up today's latest research, resources, and discounts for those with BVMD (as well as other vision-loss related conditions), and finally 3) prep for our FIRST set of international round of conferences open to the public in the United States, Europe, and Africa initially. Your donation will go a long way and we truly appreciate your help!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help us grow 'Beat the Best!' but perhaps don't have the means to help us financially - not to worry! Investing in our non-profit organization could also mean bringing your talents as a researcher, medical professional, experience in non-profit organization structure/leadership, etc. to the table. I urge you to reach out!

And that's all there is to it. THANK YOU!

Careful consideration of the details has made Flipclip 2 - strong, durable  and useful.  

Many types of material were tested to get the right feel and look without compromising function - A High quality polyurethane rubber was chosen which gives a premium feel and is flexible to store different thickness of pens. 

The stainless steel spring clip will securely attach to notebooks from 1mm to 3mm thick - most notebooks would fit within this range. 

The metal hinge allows flipclip to pivot about the hinge so it can be laid flat on a desk or fixed against a book. 

The metal clip securely attaches to the cover of a notebook. 

 Store pens in the clips 

Rotate and lay on a desk - having all your utensils right where you need them. 

Securely fixed against the book so can carry and use on the go 

The feedback I got from Flipclip 1 was invaluable in making this version - 

The key modifications are:

a) Change the material from a nylon to polyurethane rubber- very strong but also flexible with a Matt finish.

b) Connect the clip to the rubber part with a metal rod that acts as the pivot. The parts will not separate.

c) Increase strength of the spring metal clip from 0.3mm to 0.5mm, giving it extra strength and affix more firmly to the notebook.

HOW IT WORKS

REWARDS 

Choose from 3 colours: Black, Orange and Grey

Flipclip  X 1 = £8 ($10 approx) + delivery  

Flipclip  X 2 = £15 ($20 approx) + delivery 

Flipclip  X 5 = £35 ($46 approx) + delivery 

Black on a book

Orange on a book

Grey on a book

FINAL WORDS

Key Things I have learnt: 

Get a good factory! A good partnership with the factory is critical to the success- having people who will offer their expertise in how to manufacture more efficiently is really helpful. 

Get the pricing right- don’t forget delivery and contact distribution partners early 

Only launch when you have a thoroughly tested the product 

And finally don’t give up - if you firmly believe in your project keep going until you have a product you are happy with.

HELP OUT BY SHARING THIS PROJECT

If you like this project and you think others may too, then please help us reach our goal by sharing with them. Many thanks from the Flipclip Team.

column2:
Resorts

 

 

“Sleep is the golden chain that ties health and our bodies together” - Thomas Dekker
 


Science has proven that the Japanese’s way of sleeping can extend one’s lifespan. I was pleasantly surprised to know that one of the secrets was bedding! 

 

 

By combining modern production techniques and traditional craft, I recreated the magical bedsheet.  
 

Product
