column1: SAY GOODBYE TO PHYSICAL LABOUR, SAY HELLO TO CONVENIENCE
FOR ALL THOSE WHO CAN’T AFFORD OR DO NOT HAVE SPACE FOR THE
IDEAL FOR PEOPLE LIVING ALONE LIKE STUDENTS, BACHELORS,
Since there are no complicated electronic systems,
the operation is so simple that it can be operated in any bucket (minimum 20
liters, ideally 25/30) in your house, hence plumbing, wiring etc. is not required.
Even in the case of regular washing machines you
will have to use a brush to remove dirt from places like shirt collars,
underarms etc. The vertical rotation method of Mini Washing Machine removes
dirt from different places like shirt collar and gives clothes unmatched
cleaning. Kids clothes can be washed separately and hygienically. Delicate
clothes can also be washed without any damages.

All Venus that will be shipped to backers will come with an AUTO POWER OFF feature. This means that even if you forget that you have left the machine ON, it will switch OFF automatically after running for 4 minutes.
We now seek your help. Whatever money we
could, we have invested in the engineering and mold development. We now have a
fully tested machine ready to be mass produced. In order to mass produce it and
keep the price low for the poor people of India and other parts of the world to
buy, we need to make them in a certain quantity.

homes to use the traditional washing machines. These people are forced to wash
their clothes manually which is not only physically taxing, but also time
consuming. Manual washing also consumes more water…a fast depleting commodity
these people, the VENUS, is the alternative.

8 years ago my late mother had brain surgery and was
rendered paralyzed and bed ridden. During this time, one of the biggest
challenges we faced was washing her soiled bed sheets and clothes. Washing them
in the regular washing machine was neither advisable nor hygienic and the
bathroom had to be cleaned thoroughly after they were washed in there.
is then, when I thought of a portable washing machine that can do the same work
as a regular machine and yet be easy to clean. With the help of an engineer
friend and an old photo from the internet we came up with the idea of a PORTABLE
washing machine that can be mounted on any bucket for easy use. This solved all
our problems. The mess washed in the
bucket was easy to dispose off and the bucket easily cleaned without fear of
to say that what I used during my mom’s time was a very crude prototype. Since
then, I have had several friends and relatives ask me for such a washing
machine. Encouraged by this, we carried out a small survey to ascertain whether

we set out to make a proper
Since I had already used the initial prototype for a considerable period of
time, we had the necessary practical experience to make the necessary changes

and perfect the design. We drew inspiration from a very old design we saw photo of on the internet and used it as the base to develop our product keeping in mind that it should be compact, light weight and easy to use in any condition.
The result is VENUS, the machine you saw in the video.

We don't claim to be the inventor of this design. We have re-modeled a very old design which was inefficient, power consuming big and bulky (it was designed to work with a drum) and developed it into a compact, energy efficient light weight working model that can be mounted on a bucket as small as 15 liters and as big as 25 liters. Also the super insulating feature is absolutely new and all Venus will be shipped with this. Venus is a completely re-engineered, absolutely safe device.

poor people. My deceased mother used to say, it is better to make money - but it's better to make it by doing something that benefits the underprivileged...This is my first step towards this goal. I seek partners like you.

column1: few other socially relevant projects for the future. However, it will be

of motor was the most challenging aspect of this product design. Since we
wanted to mount the device on a plastic bucket, the overall weight of the
device was of prime concern. We had to ensure that we can wash maximum possible
load with a powerful, yet light enough motor so that the device weight does not
become unbearable for the plastic bucket.

Since we are using 110/220 volts of alternating current to power the device, we were aware of the natural fear of electric shock that people have. Extra care has been taken to ensure that under no circumstance can there be a danger of electrical shock. The motor and electrical points have been sprayed with a special chemical imported from Russia. This super insulating coating makes all electrical devices WATERPROOF - even when live current is on.
Most importantly, unlike others, we are not seeking funds to develop a product. We already have done all the required R&

","Are you okay with using Public machines in Laundromats?
Different people have different hygiene levels...

1) It is not hygienic to wash the dirty cloths used for mopping the floors, toilets and kitchen platforms in the regular washing machine. Use VENUS to wash them separately in a bucket which later can easily be cleaned and disinfected.

2) Children love to play in the mud and cleaning such clothes in the regular washing machines leaves a mess behind inside the tub. Cleaning this mess is an avoidable tiresome chore. Use VENUS for such washes.
3) Wash infant’s messy clothes without fear of contaminating regular laundry.
5) Use VENUS to wash clothes that leak/shed color.
6) People who are often on the road like salesman, can carry this compact machine and wash clothes easily in hotel bathrooms, thus saving money!!!
VENUS easily fits in a small backpack
EACH & EVERY BACKER WILL RECEIVE THEIR REWARD REGARDLESS OF THE OUTCOME OF THIS CAMPAIGN
ADVANTAGE OF THIS DESIGN OVER OTHER PORTABLE WASHING MACHINES

* Lightest of the lot* Extremely easy to carry around during picnics and camping trips.* Most hygienic since you clean in an open bucket which can easily be washed and disinfected.* Can be used by anyone, even a child* Easy to store in smallest of the place* Ideal for dormitory students.* Ideal for people living in places far from a Laundromat.* Virtually Maintenance free
We plan to develop DC (Direct current) operated version also if we exceed our funding goal. This would make this machine ideal for campers.

everyday. To expect them to wash clothes by hand is nothing short of torture.
condition prevents a large number of families from buying a proper washing

SAY GOODBYE TO PHYSICAL LABOUR, SAY HELLO TO CONVENIENCE
FOR ALL THOSE WHO CAN’T AFFORD OR DO NOT HAVE SPACE FOR THE
IDEAL FOR PEOPLE LIVING ALONE LIKE STUDENTS, BACHELORS,
Since there are no complicated electronic systems,
the operation is so simple that it can be operated in any bucket (minimum 20
liters, ideally 25/30) in your house, hence plumbing, wiring etc. is not required.
Even in the case of regular washing machines you
will have to use a brush to remove dirt from places like shirt collars,
underarms etc. The vertical rotation method of Mini Washing Machine removes
dirt from different places like shirt collar and gives clothes unmatched
cleaning. Kids clothes can be washed separately and hygienically. Delicate
clothes can also be washed without any damages.

All Venus that will be shipped to backers will come with an AUTO POWER OFF feature. This means that even if you forget that you have left the machine ON, it will switch OFF automatically after running for 4 minutes.
What We Need & What You Get
We now seek your help. Whatever money we
could, we have invested in the engineering and mold development. We now have a
fully tested machine ready to be mass produced. In order to mass produce it and
keep the price low for the poor people of India and other parts of the world to
buy, we need to make them in a certain quantity.
India & elsewhere still can’t afford the regular washing machines. Additionally,
while many can, they do not have sufficient place to keep the bulky machines in
their 1 room homes. Millions do not have running water connection in their
homes to use the traditional washing machines. These people are forced to wash
their clothes manually which is not only physically taxing, but also time
consuming. Manual washing also consumes more water…a fast depleting commodity
these people, the VENUS, is the alternative.

column2: >Meet ICUmini: ICUmini is one of the smallest, smartest and most affordable hidden HD camera systems in the world!
column3: >The ICUmini doesn't use unsightly cameras like most systems.  ICUmini technology integrates ultra-tiny HD cameras into household objects like clocks and LED picture frames and provide powerful secret monitoring!
column4: >ICUmini wirelessly connects to its compact sync station, letting you monitor/record, live streaming audio and video (up to 8 cameras).
column5:
>


ICUmini sets up super fast and can move from room to room easily.

column2: >With our intuitive App keep tabs wherever you go right on your smartphone!  Keep intruders out, a watchful eye on your nanny and kids ... plus so much more!

column1: Place it anywhere you want

ICUmini is battery-powered and completely wire-free, so our devices are simple to place, position and move within any environment. Create a system that covers your entryways and windows, monitors the garage, or keeps a watchful eye over the kids' rooms.
column2: >Best of all, the ultra small size of the cameras mean that your nanny, thief or intruder will never know they are being watched!

>ICUmini has been designed to make your peace of mind easy and accessible. As soon a motion is detected, video starts recording and an alert is sent to your smartphone or tablet, so you can see exactly what caused the alert and decide how to react.
>Not only will the cameras go undetected, they are connected with the Sync Station, letting you view the feeds live wherever you are, whenever you want.

>Our main goal is to help protect your home and your wallet: ICUmini starts at just $45 and there are no monthly fees, Its unique design makes it easy to create and expand a system that’s just right for your apartment, home or business, for a fraction of the cost of other home monitoring devices. Currently ICUmini allows up to eight cameras connections and we are working hard to build a new sync station with up to 24 connections.

>Setting up the ICUMini takes as little as 5 minutes and you can set the cameras and station literally anywhere in your home or office. It could be in the kitchen, children’s rooms, office, garage or even a walk-in closet.

Doubled security for a quarter of the price.

With an integrated picture slideshow available in each ICUMini Picture Frame, not only do you protect your home using less space, but that space houses a work of art. So, not only do our cameras protect your home, they look great while doing so.

column2: >With ICUmini, our mission is to provide a effortless and affordable peace of mind for everyone.

column1: Your pledge will contribute to our pursuit of this, and will allow us to make the ICUmini system even better. Our goal is to create a new system, allowing to integrate a minimum of 24 cameras and build more ""common household"" devices in which we can integrate our camera system.
column2:

When will you get your ICUmini's

We

column1: have gone long way to make sure there are minimum risks for individuals
supporting the ICUmini campaign. The ICUmini picture frames and ICUmini
clocks are fully ready for manufacturing and all the necessary

contracts are secured.We estimate delivery of the first orders by mid December 2014

Where the money goes

column2:
>

What if you don't reach your goal?

We have been asked this quite a lot over the last days, since the marketing campaigns we are running are still slow.

So, here our answer on that question:

We

column1: have put more then one year into this project, which means we already
spend hundreds of hours of work and thousands of dollars in this project and
certainly we will not stop just because we couldn't reach the goal with

this campaign.

We do have a back-up plan with a local firm who
already agreed to buy part of the company, which will gives us the funds

to move forward.

For obvious reason we will wait until Nov. 1, 2014 before we move ahead. Maybe we don't need to go that way.

Said that. This depends totally on you, the crowd....

So please spread the word and help to make it happen :)

The ICUmini app   allows you to arm or disarm your complete system with one click or each camera separately.Live View Mode
You want to  see what's happening at home? Use Live View mode for instant insight:
Every ICUmini system comes with the ICUmini Sync station, which provides a quick and easy set-up of the ICUmini camera units. The ICUmini Sync station requires no assembly or configuration
column2: simply plug it in and follow the prompts of the ICUmini app to get started.

column1: To set up your ICUmini system:
Plug the Sync Module into any wall outlet
Launch the ICUmini app and run the Setup Wizard
Place your ICUmini unit(s) wherever you'd like
That's all you have to do to get the system running.
ICUmini's battery-powered, wire-free design provides you simple solution to monitor any part of your home.
Your video and data is encrypted and secured through SSL communication.Created in San Jose – Developed in GermanyWhy Your Pledge Helps
With ICUmini, our mission is to provide a effortless and affordable peace of mind for everyone.

Your pledge will contribute to our pursuit of this, and will allow us to make the ICUmini system even better. Our goal is to create a new system, allowing to integrate a minimum of 24 cameras and build more ""common household"" devices in which we can integrate our camera system.Project TimelineWhen will you get your ICUmini'sWe
have gone long way to make sure there are minimum risks for individuals
supporting the ICUmini campaign. The ICUmini picture frames and ICUmini
clocks are fully ready for manufacturing and all the necessary
contracts are secured.We estimate delivery of the first orders by mid December 2014Where the money goes
What if you don't reach your goal?We have been asked this quite a lot over the last days, since the marketing campaigns we are running are still slow.So, here our answer on that question:We
have put more then one year into this project, which means we already
spend hundreds of hours of work and thousands of dollars in this project and
certainly we will not stop just because we couldn't reach the goal with
this campaign.We do have a back-up plan with a local firm who
already agreed to buy part of the company, which will gives us the funds

to move forward.For obvious reason we will wait until Nov. 1, 2014 before we move ahead. Maybe we don't need to go that way.Said that. This depends totally on you, the crowd....So please spread the word and help to make it happen :)You've heard from us and now we'd love to hear from youPlease let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!Email Support at support@icumini.comDon't forget to like and follow us for the latest informationsLike Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/icuminiSend us a tweet: @icuminiFor inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail, and Partnerships please contact our sales team at: sales@icumini.com",27.0,1,"2 Campaigns

column1: Why is this a flexible funding campaign?

Because the Stashtray is getting made no matter what! Even if we do not reach our goal, you will get every perk item that you pre-order.  We are a young company and we are just looking for some help with the manufacturing costs.  We appreciate that you are willing to invest your money and trust in us.  We will not let you down. 


Why is it $60 for international shipping?


It actually costs $77.95, we just rounded it down to $60.  We know this is a lot so we will eat some of the cost.


For Canada, add $40 for shipping.

Short Summary

WillCo Management Group LLC (WillCo) is a three year old company that is a spin up of a successful information technology (IT) company. WillCo creates simple solutions to complex problems. We began in 2005 designing large-scale IT system for the US Department of Defense and our flagship product is still in use by over 1.1 million active users today. The principle partners came together in 2010 to start working on a consumer based Smart Grid solution.

WillCo views the Smart Grid as a new frontier. The early visionaries of the world-wide web saw the need to connect users to the vast potential of the internet.The interactive electric grid offers multiple connection points and two-way communications. Advances in home automation products, renewable energy systems, and energy storage technologies make it possible to create new types of distributed energy source systems. Consumers can generate power from a single home, a single block, or a neighborhood. WillCo has developed YOUR-24 to empower consumers like never before. The Smart Grid offers new ways to get electricity to consumers.
column2:
>

The US Electric Grid was considered the premier engineering marvel of the 20th century. We just turn on the switch and the lights come on. But the electric grid is aging and the new Smart Grid is under development. New laws and regulations enacted in 2005, 2007, and 2009 paved the way for the next generation of electric power delivery to consumers. The National Institute of Science &
column3:
Technology (NIST) published the Smart Grid Interoperability Framework in Sept 2009.

A Smart Meter installed in a home offers two-way communications between the consumer and the electric utility. This is the first step in creating an interactive electric grid (Smart Grid). The enhanced communication will allow consumers to do more with their energy use. New and emerging energy storage technologies combined with the advances in home automation and renewable energy are driving breakthroughs in distributed energy source systems. Now electric power can  be generated from a home, a city block, or a neighborhood. WillCo is pioneering a consumer-oriented system to take advantage of the unique possibilities realized by the Smart Grid. The company has four patents-pending in the area of distributed energy source systems.

WillCo created a comprehensive Smart Grid program called YOUR-24. Our approach begins with a cloud-based software platform to connect consumers to the electric grid. Our software collects data from the utility and plug-in devices installed in your AC outlets. We filter the data from multiple sources and deliver easy to read information to users through their smart phone, tablet. computer, and other mobile devices. The second part of our comprehensive approach is a small controller that is used in the home. We added the ability for consumers to have greater control over electronic devices and the home environment. The controller serves as the ""Brain"" of the Energy Management System. It learns your unique environment and allows you to set up money-saving energy control events and zones. Then we combined the latest energy storage technologies to produce an easy way for all of us to store electricity to use in our homes everyday. The Smart Grid is Here!

As shown at http://your24.info/, the YOUR-24 System makes it easier for consumers to save money by providing both control over connected devices and timely notification when action is appropriate. Cloud-based software enables the consumer to use a smart phone or other mobile device to control lights, appliances, thermostats, cameras, door locks, and sensors. The user-friendly software captures energy use data and consumer patterns and applies predictive modeling to provide consumers with well-timed tips, notifications, and alerts. It learns the preferences for home lighting, temperature, appliances, and plug-in devices. The system creates personal energy settings for each member of the household. The key is our patent-pending personal energy assessment tool that captures each user's unique environment. The result is money in consumer’s pocket.

The personal energy assessment tool produces a comprehensive, personalized electric energy management solution that works 24 hours a day. This project will turn a prototype of the tool into a robust web portal for consumers to use in their everyday lives. YOUR-24 notifies people on their smartphones or tablets of immediate actions they can take to reduce their electric power consumption. It does that by integrating off-the shelf hardware and proprietary software into a system that collects energy data and uses it to develop recommendations that it sends to the user. The integrated components include RFID tags, wireless switches, plugs, sensors, secure transmitters, and open source products. Electronics and appliances that users want to manage are connected to devices that plug into electrical outlets. The system monitors and analyzes power usage at those outlets and uses the secure transmitters to notify users that they can reduce electric energy use at home by taking some action. We provide the plug-and-play equipment and the software to analyze power usage and manage communications. 

The YOUR-24 software system integrates with home automation products from any vendor (vendor-neutral) and connects to the electric utility's Smart Meter through YOUR-24. The program saves money on utility bills and provides the conveniences of home automation. Keep the home automation system you have and use the YOUR-24 software platform to manage your energy use or select one of our packages for a turnkey solution.

What We Need &
column4:
What You Get

The campaign is seeking $250,000 in funding to support development and deployment of a software platform to connect consumers to the Smart Grid through a smartphone or other mobile device. The funds would and a $350,000 stretch goal. The funds would be used to pay for the development and deployment of the software platform including the unique energy assessment tool. The YOUR-24 cloud is designed to securely capture energy use data and turn it into valuable information for consumers and other engaged electric Smart Grid stakeholders.
column5:
>     

YOUR-24 membership includes a one-time energy assessment. The $60 annual membership fee is used to maintain the communications platform and for ongoing technical support to members. Membership includes software updates. There are many devices on the market for home automation but YOUR-24 integrates these technologies into an open source personalized energy system for consumers. There are added benefits to our approach. Users get the convenience of controlling lights and electronics. They also get the benefits of a system that can scale to a home security system for a lot less than traditional offerings. We recommend Do-It-Yourself products that are on the market in packages tailored to each home. The products ship to the home and the customers plug-in the devices. Professional installation is available for an extra charge. The program also reduces green-house gases and the overall carbon footprint.

The “brain” of the system is a SmartTech Controller, which uses the Smart Grid as a window to personal energy use. Users can view and control all of the connected electrical devices in their home. This patent-pending SmartTech Portal Device is a Programmable Logic Controller that combines wireless, RFID, Ethernet, and Home Automation technologies into a single device. This device will serve as a Lifestyle Management System to let you control all of the electric devices that are plugged-in or wired to your home's electrical system. It works with other home automation systems and also uses a smart phone, tablet, other mobile devices, and computers.

This project would build on the successful prototype. The team will use technical specifications to design and fabricate a low-cost SmartTech Controller for home and office. The mass production device would be about 3""- 4"" x 5”- 6"" with touchscreen capabilities as an option. The SmartTech Controller would range from $100-$150 and the plug-in sensors would range from $5-$10. Other connected device packages would be available ala carte and include
column6:
thermostats, CO Detectors, door locks, and cameras. These packages would cost in the $100-$300 range and can be combined to create the ultimate Smart Home. Other recommended packages would include cameras, door locks, and sensors for convenience, security, and safety. These would range from $500 up. The energy savings program will pay for itself in 12-18 months for the average consumer.

These components combine seamlessly into an innovative hardware and software system that helps electricity consumers manage their lives while saving them money. YOUR-24 will send alerts and notices to a computer, smart phone or mobile device notifying the subscriber of an event that can reduce their energy bill. They may elect to click through to take advantage of the event or set automatic filters to manage the process. YOUR-24 can tell you that you left the curling iron on or remind you to turn on the crock pot to start dinner before leaving work. It can turn off the AC when you leave home and turn it back on 30 minutes before you get back. It can tell you if the kids opened the liquor cabinet while you were out or if the locked gun cabinet has been opened. The system can serve as a home security system using motion sensors and it can even recognize when you come home and turn on lights and set the temperature just for you. The system can tell you if the pollen count is high outside your house or alert different family members about specific air quality conditions. The possibilities are almost endless. We allow you to choose how to use YOUR-24.

STRETCH GOALS

The next generation in Smart Home evolution is the growth of distributed energy. Solar and wind systems are gaining popularity as viable home energy sources. These renewable energy sources are made even more valuable by storing the power they produce for future use. Advances in battery technologies in the last two years have made it feasible to produce mass-market personal electric vehicles (PEV) and now WillCo is developing a Personal Energy System for homes.

We have created a patent-pending process for electric grid-tied energy storage. A series-connected rechargeable battery bank using lithium ion, lithium air, lithium ceramic or other smooth discharge technologies make up part of the system. Ultra Capacitors or Super Capacitors are also series-connected in a battery bank to deliver bursts of energy when needed and fast recharging. Other components include a battery back up for the CPU, a CPU, AC to DC charger, DC to AC inverters, and a controller with wireless router.

This system is engineered to be installed at or near the electrical panel and tied to the electrical service at the meter. The system can by-pass electrical service and use stored energy to power the precise needs of the home. The personal profile data is stored in the device along with enough battery power to run devices during peak demand periods. Initial design specifications are 30""- 36"" wide x 42"" - 48"" high x 3"" - 4"" deep, using a raised lower case to 9"" deep. Battery storage requirements will drive the ultimate size of the home units.

If this project is able to reach a Stretch Goal of $350,000 during this campaign, the additional funds would be used to create a mass production prototype of this personal energy storage technology and a limited production run of the unit to satisfy the rewards fulfillment. The production run would include units for submission to testing and regulatory authorities. The initial development time will be spent testing the integrated battery technology in the research lab and produce the specifications for a test run of the device.

If the campaign is not able to reach the funding goal, the actual funds raised will be used to continue development and deployment beginning with the software build out. Current staff would be reassigned for 6 months to support the project. Staff would be supplemented with contract labor to fill skill gaps.
column11:
>The Impact

WillCo has studied the needs of the electric utility industry and we understand the challenges of creating the Smart Grid. We also worked for two years learning how the emerging Smart Grid technology could benefit consumers. With the help of interested consumers, we can shape the Smart Grid and help it reach its potential. The technology already exist to deliver electric power to consumer in ways that were not possible just 5 years ago. Electric utilities are looking for ways to balance loads during peak-demand periods to prevent added cost from secondary power sources. W
column12: >e believe the world is ready for ""Personal Energy"". Much like personal computing changed the world, so too can personal energy.
column13: >WillCo has seven years of experience designing and building large-scale IT infrastructure
column14:
> systems. Our flagship product (IA-STAR) is still in use today by over 1.1 million active users in the US Department of Defense. We have turned our talents and passion toward getting this new solution to market.   

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word and send people to our Indiegogo campaign. Use the share tools and help us spread the word. Together we can shape the future.

Electric utilities are looking for ways to balance loads during peak-demand periods to prevent added cost from secondary power sources. We believe the world is ready for ""Personal Energy"". Much like personal computing changed the world, so too can personal energy.WillCo has seven years of experience designing and building large-scale IT infrastructure systems. Our flagship product (IA-STAR) is still in use today by over 1.1 million active users in the US Department of Defense. We have turned our talents and passion toward getting this new solution to market.   Other Ways You Can HelpSpread the word and send people to our Indiegogo campaign. Use the share tools and help us spread the word. Together we can shape the future.",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Check out the gallery for more videos!

Introducing the Pillar Boat!

Hi, I'm an aerospace engineer living in the Puget Sound area.  I've spent a lot of time in the air and on the water.  This year, after watching SpaceX fail to land the Falcon 9 first stage on their barge, I began tinkering with an idea for making a stable floating platform which is immune to the action of the waves.   The result is a working, small scale prototype, you can see on my YouTube channel.

So, What is a Pillar Boat?

A Pillar Boat is a self propelled wave isolated floating platform.  Instead of having a conventional hull, it is supported on sets of spar buoys attached to swivel footings which support the main platform.  Figure 1. shows the simplest version of a Pillar Boat, the non transitioning 3X3 configuration.

Pillar Boats get their support from deep below the waves and have a naturally deep draft.  This makes them fairly slow, but their purpose is not speed, it is to support large masses safely and smoothly above the waves.  Rather than fight the waves as traditional surface ships do, the Pillar Boat allows them to wash harmlessly underneath.  Also traditional surface vessels must face into the approaching waves and are vulnerable to waves from the side.  The Pillar Boat has no bow or stern and can handle waves from any direction.

The deep draft makes it hard to navigate in and out of port, that is why the buoy transitioning system was developed.  For additional buoyancy, and redundancy for increased safety, five floats per cluster were also incorporated into the basic design.
Figure 2. shows a self propelled, 5X3, transitioning Pillar Boat.  This campaign is intended to generate funds for the design and construction of a scale prototype of the model shown below.

So, How Do We Know it Will Work?

Watch the videos on my YouTube channel for starters.  You can also check out a technical PDF document on my LinkedIn page.  Her are a few other reasons the Pillar Boat will be a success.
  • My engineering background and design experience has helped me develop the Pillar Boat mechanism and create 3D printed parts for the test model.
  • The sea is a beautiful place, but it can get rough, and not everyone can enjoy being out on it.  The Pillar Boat will allow more people to enjoy being at sea in comfort and it will open up a whole new range of seaborne activities.

• Pillar Boats can range in size from small to very large.  The largest will be capable of standing up to hurricane wind and waves and supporting cities at sea.  In the future, Pillar Boats at sea will serve as bases for business and leisure travel.  Large enough to land aircraft on and dock cruise ships, they will host hotels, casinos, floating theme parks, and much more.
• The Pillar Boat will be the ultimate party boat!

How does it all start?

If you build it they will come.

  • Stage 1: This stage has a goal to build a complete working, small scale prototype.  This stage is well underway with a 1/300 scale model nearly ready for the addition of a propulsion system.  Watch my YouTube video postings. Funds required to complete this stage are around $3,000.

• Stage 2: The goal of this stage is to design detailed plans for a 20 to 50 ton displacement vessel with a computer control system, passenger cabin, and helicopter landing pad.  Funds required to complete the design are around $25,000.
• Stage 3: The goal is to actually build a 20 to 50 ton displacement vessel with a computer control system, passenger cabin, and helicopter landing pad.

• Stage 4: Large Gulf of Mexico platform.  This platform will demonstrate the full potential of the support architecture in a deep water marine environment.  Multiple 5X3 Pillar boat modules will link together at sea to form a large floating complex.  The scale will be large enough and the construction robust enough to survive a hurricane.  The complex will serve as an ocean research platform, a business park, and a wave power generation station.  Commercial and residential space will be available for lease.

• Stage 5: The full vision. Following the success of the Gulf platform.  A full sized city capable of navigating any of the worlds oceans will be constructed.  The overall shape will be two semi circles connected by a crossbar like this (--). The semi circles will be joined at the ends by bridges to create ship canals into each internal lagoon.  The cross bar will support a landing strip capable of receiving large commercial aircraft, as well as an airport terminal, docks, and a shipping terminal.  All will be supported on linked variations of the Pillar Boat flotation system.  Light rail lines will run the length of the crossbar and circle the city for quick transportation to anyplace in the complex.  The inner lagoon will be lined with long sloping concrete platforms to create man made beaches and extend up to 100 feet below the water to allow for the growth of coral reefs.  Electric energy will be generated from waves passing under the city, thus damping the waves as they pass and ultimately sheltering the lagoons and cross bar terminals.

• Funding received will go to Stage 1 to complete the RC demonstration small scale model.  When the $25,000 level is reached it will pay for Stage 2 design development, as well as to cover patent and other business expenses.  At the $250,000 level actual construction of a working Pillar Boat suitable for large lakes and inland seas can begin.  A new campaign will be kicked off to launch each stage.

Pillar Boats will change the world.  Just like the Space Needle, once debuted, every city in the world (with ocean access) will have to have one.

  • Pillar Boats will allow land locked countries to expand to the sea, opening new business and leisure destinations.
  • Pillar Boats will open ocean exploration, enable new sea life research, and allow for greater stewardship of the world's oceans.
  • Dare to dream big!  A Pillar Boat can be a place to be free.  Hey Disney Corp! How about building a Tomorrow Land park on one of these in the Gulf of Mexico?

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

The Pillar Boat concept is in its infancy.  The only working model in the world is currently in my garage.  There will be a lot of testing and development needed along the way.  I will start small and carefully build up and scale up as funds allow.  The whole concept flies in the face of conventional boat design and I'm sure there will be plenty of skeptics.  When I host the first party on the stage 3 prototype for contributors, we will prove them wrong!

  • I have worked on and contributed to many large projects, including the International Space Station, SRB integration, and several models of commercial jet aircraft manufactured nearby.
  • I know many skilled engineers who can help with design challenges.  I can do a lot by myself but I am not too proud to know when I need outside help.  I hope to see a community of Pillar Boat enthusiasts rise up and help the project move ahead.

column1:
Ways Anyone Can Help

Some people can't contribute funding, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Contribute financially if you can.
• Watch my YouTube posts on the latest developments.

• Get the word out to all your friends and family.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and other social media!
• Have a skill?  Put it to work volunteering on design and fabrication!
You can find a technical PDF on the Pillar Boat there.

Ye Olde Gift Shoppe

We all love the old claw games, even if they are rigged to steal your money. The hope that forms anew each time the start button is pressed. The agony when the claw picks up your prize only to drop it half way to the finish. And the inexplicable joy when a $.10 prize is won after pumping $5.00 into the machine. We think everyone should experience these highs and lows without having to pump a days wages into the machine.

What We Need &

Our goal is to refurbish an old claw game for the Burning Man playa complete with lights, sounds and cool prizes. The machine, an original Ye Olde Gift Shoppe, has already been requisitioned and configured for unlimited free play. It will be given placement in the Souk Tents surrounding the man for maximum foot traffic. Now we want to deck it out with all the bells and whistles and stock it with truly unique Burning Man gifts for those skilled enough to win!
• The first task will be applying lighting to the machine. Using an El-wire sequencer and 8 EL-wire strands Ye Olde Gift Shoppe will beckon would be challengers with it's neon glow.

• And what is a good game without a soundtrack that reflects the emotions the player experiences. Using an MP3 shield with multiple triggers we'll have the Gift Shoppe cheer you on as you align your claw, mock you when you lose and sing your praise if you win!

• Finally and most importantly, we want the prizes to be unique to the experience. We don't want to give away all secrets of the prizes but we are hoping to stock it with custom stuffed animals (sparkle ponies?), Burning Man inspired fortune cookies, playa survival supplies and much more!

The Impact

Your contributions will make the overall experience better for everyone. Better prizes, better music and better lights! Help us bring a fun, interactive piece to the Souk Tents to compliment the Caravansary theme.

Be the first with a preventive shield

The Zwobbx preventive shield is the first module you will get from us for your home. We focused on the development of this function as it is one of the basic needs of people to have a safe home. But we start with our solution before the most regular alarm systems notice anything. The protective shield uses a barrier of sensors that detect dangers early and it can be used to take preventive actions like light or TV activation.



Basic equipment
enters the secure zone around your house gets monitored by the Zwobbx-module.
Now the system reacts like you configured it. Your
house can look like you are at home, an alarm sirene can sound or the lawn

sprinkler can start. Everything is possible inside your Wi-Fi protective shield. Just connect Zwobbx to your existing systems or devices.

Zwobbx can communicate
with common SmartHome systems like KNX, EnOcean, Zigbee and many more. You
can program every scenario. Your home will do it alone or after requesting you.
get a message to your mobile phone or to have the neighborhood watch to be
with phone, tablet or pc via app and WiFi router
routines how your home shall react
a security service, the police or simply your neighbour to check the Situation

Project status

The development of the Zwobbx device started allready one year ago. Today we have got fully working prototypes.

At the current stage we are working on the final case design and single sensor configurations.


We also have got the App working so the connection to mobile devices is possible beside the connection to the PC. It's a major concern for us that the system is easy to handle for everyone.

To speed up development, serial production and to get a proper Feedback we decided to start the indiegogo campaign.


Roadmap


The greater Vision

We don' t want a new conventional alarm system or a new weather station even less a single energy metering tool. What we want is to combine all useful home observation, automation and security features together and connect all of them with your Wi-Fi  - easy to handle for you with your phone, tablet or PC. Our low power battery driven Wi-Fi module connects directly to your existing network. Furthermore Zwobbx can interact with established systems through our special gateway.

Many other solutions work with one or two operations and need a main base station. We were wondering why they do this? For this reason we like to offer with Zwobbx comfortable a bunch of operations just by using your existing Wi-Fi.


Future upgrades for the Zwobbx system

These are only a few situations where Zwobbx can help you to make your day easier. Even if you don't own a house or garden you have the opportunity to keep an eye on everything that is important to you.

About the people


Christopher Brauer:

Age: 24

Industrial Manager

Specialist field: Project coordination

Christian Hänsch:

Age: 46

Master of Engineering

Specialist field: Hard- and Software development

References:

Deutsche Börse
Vodafon
SAP
Mercedes-Benz
Microsoft

Robert Frischbier:

Age: 34

Business Economist

Specialist field: Security and business development 

Works in the private security sector



What´s next?
Zwobbx will become the home automation all-purpose tool. The next functions to be integrated in the Wi-Fi based system will be:
sensor for motion detection in addition to the infrared sensor

the children come home after school?

-  Air quality and smoke detection

Depending on the progress of the campaign, we will implement additional functions already to the first devices.


Shipping

The shipping is free for all countries.

FAQ

Is this the final case design?

It is a possible design and very dependent on the type of sensors which are included. Some sensors need special case requirements.

How long is battery lifetime?

The Zwobbx module based on an ultra-low power, Wi-Fi chip. Battery lifetime: approx. 6 month, depends on TX-Rate, temperature and so on.

Is there a alternative to batteries?

We will offer an AC/DC-adapter to power up the Zwobbx module.

How open is the system for the end user?

We provide an API for customized applications. Furthermore the Zwobbx modul can interact with REST-Services and provides support for Wi-Fi Direct, WPS, legacy Wi-Fi Client, SoftAP modes and HTTPS/SSL. As a result you can stuff all gathered data in your own application, home server, our tools or whatever you like to use.

Which of my data gets the Zwobbx company?

We just need the common informations which are necessary to transact a trade. Besides this you have the full control about your data privacy.
- isolate all monitored informations in your home network.
- get messages by the Zwobbx server about your home status (only
intrusions or other alarm signals etc. without sending specific home data to
- use the full potential of your protective shield and
connect with us and other user to spot criminal movements in your city,

district or even the street.

What kind of support service is offered?

Until now we prefer a full online support.

Which languages will you provide for manuals, App, support service etc.?

As things are now we would start with English and German. According to circumstances we will successively add more.

Which operating systems support our app?

We want to provide our application for Android, iOS and Windows Phone.
project and make your nearest environment safer. Select the perk that suits
best to you and benefit from the system soon.

And please don´t forget to tell your friends, families, neighbors, colleagues and whoever could be interested in.

Visit us @ www.ilumi.co

column2: /> “Interested in installing LED lights that you can control remotely, but not so interested in rewiring your whole house? You might want to look into new technology introduced in late November by iLumi Solutions.”
/>  “When it comes to lighting, most of us live in a yellow or white world. iLumi, a new player in the light bulb space, aspires to change that with a few fresh and colorful ideas.”

column4: /> “One more contender to consider when it comes to intelligent LED lighting”

column2: /> “Two young eco-entrepreneurs have created a family of super-brainy, Bluetooth-enabled LED bulbs”

column4: /> “iLumi ditches wires by utilizing Bluetooth technology”

column1: Introducing, iLumi, the world’s most intelligent light bulbs!

iLumi is a series of customizable and energy-efficient  Bluetooth-enabled LED light bulbs. Much more than just light bulbs, iLumi offers users complete flexibility and control of their lighting with millions of color combinations, amazing programing options, and simple wireless control through an iOS or Android App.

After two years of research, design and development, we are ready to manufacture iLumi, and we want you to be a part of it.  Support our campaign and help bring the world’s most intelligent light bulbs to the world, and in return be some of the first to receive iLumi.
The iLumi prototype and app

Other multicolor LED lights sacrifice brightness and efficiency for the ability to produce color. Our patent-pending HyperLux LED technology, utilizing red, green, blue, and white LEDs (RGBW), makes iLumi the brightest and most efficient multicolor light bulbs.

Using just the iLumi app, you can customize your lighting to any variation of bright white or rich color light without sacrificing brightness. With whiter whites, brighter blues, and richer reds, iLumis are both functional for everyday use and fun for specialty applications.
Any hue of white or color at the brightest light possible
The iLumi prototype LED Board

Every iLumi has advanced Bluetooth technology built inside the bulb. You don’t have to worry about connecting to routers, master/slave dependency, or other complications and headaches. Each iLumi has up to a 100 foot range, and multiple iLumis can communicate with one another to pass on commands and work together, creating a reliable Bluetooth mesh network.  Technically speaking, each iLumi uses dual-mode Bluetooth Classic and Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth 4.0) wireless technology that is low-power, secure, scalable, and supports almost every mobile device.

This gives you complete control over how and where you use your iLumi bulbs. Control a whole house of iLumis, control a room, or control just one. Take your iLumis to a friend’s house. For professionals, like gaffers, photographers, or event lighting specialists, take your iLumis with you on location to create amazing effects with the touch of a button. Plus it’s great for commercial locations like bars, restaurants, and nightclubs.
Along with Bluetooth, each iLumi is equipped with computing technology, including a processor, memory, and real-time clock for endless programming possibilities. Here’s an idea of what’s possible:

Set your lighting to fit your schedule – Slowly turn on your lights with your alarm in the morning, set your lights to dim or brighten as the sun rises and sets, or have your lights slowly turn off when it’s time for bed.

Set your lighting to recognize when you’re there – iLumis can sense your location and proximity, turning off when you leave, turning on when you come back, or even automatically lighting your path as you move around the house.
Lighting for information at a glance – Receive text, social media, and phone call alerts, get an idea for the day’s weather, or keep up to date with stock price movements and news alerts.
Create and save scenes for perfect personalized lighting – About to watch a movie? Impress a date? Or just head off to bed?  One tap on saved scenes and your lights create the perfect mood.
Create dynamic atmospheres – Have your lighting synchronize to music, mimic an underwater world of rolling blue waves, or create amazing effects like light strobes, fire, candlelight, and more.
The sky is the limit – We plan to release a software development kit (SDK) so anyone can come up with innovative new ways to use iLumis.  Receive SDK first in a Light Hacker Kit perk level.
Checkout the video of the Music Sync application in action by clicking the picture below!
We want you to have an amazing experience from day one, so we’ve simplified the set-up process to these two easy steps:

After iLumis receive power for the first time, they automatically find and pair with the open iLumi app and create a secured authentication for that mobile device. You can always share access with family and friends who download the iLumi app on their own devices. There are no boxes, routers, master-slave configurations or dependencies -- it just works that simply.
Plus you can always use an old fashioned light switch to turn your iLumis off and on to a personalized default setting.

Home lighting comprises about 25% of your electric usage every month, so it pays to practice energy efficiency. By combining our advanced HyperLux LED technology’s efficiency with programming and automation functionality, iLumi is the most energy efficient light bulb in its class. And every iLumi lasts up to 20 years.

Every iLumi more than pays for itself multiple times over through the course of its life. Considering energy savings and replacement offset, comparing the large 15 watt iLumi to a 100 watt incandescent you can save about $340. Comparing the small 8 watt iLumi to a 60 watt incandescent you can save about $200.
Savings reflect Large iLumi compared to 100 watt incandescent over 20 years
Behind iLumi is the iLumi app, which will be available as a free download in the App Store or Google Play. We’ve designed the iLumi app to be simple, rich, intuitive, and engaging.

The app is compatible with all Android phones and tablets, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPad 3 (Retina Display), and iPad mini. When you set up your iLumis, it creates a secure authentication between the app and each light (so no practical jokes from the neighbors). The app is easily scalable to accommodate one or up to 100 iLumis, and comes loaded with a multitude of programs and the ability to schedule commands – well beyond simple color control settings.

Again, we’re also working on a software development kit (SDK) so others can come up with creative ways to use iLumis and share them with the iLumi nation.  Receive the iLumi SDK first by contributing to a 'Light Hacker Kit' perk.

column10: >few of the rich colors produced by the iLumi prototypes

column1: Our team is led by co-founders Corey Egan and Swapnil Bora out of the Alcatel-Lucent Gravity Center, an entrepreneurial incubator in Dallas, Texas. With a combined 12 years of high-tech experience, Corey and Swapnil’s affinity for lighting, mobility, and technology has been a major part of their lives.  The rest of the iLumi crew based in Dallas and India is a talented mix of engineers, designers, and advisors.
We are also supported by a world class partner network including leading LED and computing manufacturers, wireless communications and LED experts, and sourcing and operations partners.
Further, our team and technology have received numerous awards and accolades:
• Most Promising Company – Rice Alliance CleanTech and Energy Venture Showcase, September 2012
• Semi-finalist – CleanTech Open Accelerator and Competition, June 2012
• Grand Prize – Carnegie Mellon McGinnis Venture Competition, March 2011
• First Place Graduate Level - University of Texas at Dallas Business Idea Competition, November 2010

column7: >These beautiful shots of the iLumi prototype and app were backlit with nothing but another iLumi

column1: Now there's only one thing left to do – join us and Live Your Light with iLumi!
If you want to know more, check out our FAQ below, contact us, or leave a comment, and we'll get back to you.  Also be sure to connect on Facebook, Twitter, or our website.
The iLumi prototype

“Interested in installing LED lights that you can control remotely, but not so interested in rewiring your whole house? You might want to look into new technology introduced in late November by iLumi Solutions.”
“When it comes to lighting, most of us live in a yellow or white world. iLumi, a new player in the light bulb space, aspires to change that with a few fresh and colorful ideas.”
“One more contender to consider when it comes to intelligent LED lighting”
“Two young eco-entrepreneurs have created a family of super-brainy, Bluetooth-enabled LED bulbs”
“iLumi ditches wires by utilizing Bluetooth technology”
Introducing, iLumi, the world’s most intelligent light bulbs!

iLumi is a series of customizable and energy-efficient  Bluetooth-enabled LED light bulbs. Much more than just light bulbs, iLumi offers users complete flexibility and control of their lighting with millions of color combinations, amazing programing options, and simple wireless control through an iOS or Android App.

After two years of research, design and development, we are ready to manufacture iLumi, and we want you to be a part of it.  Support our campaign and help bring the world’s most intelligent light bulbs to the world, and in return be some of the first to receive iLumi.
Bright Multicolor Light Powered by HyperLuxTM

Other multicolor LED lights sacrifice brightness and efficiency for the ability to produce color. Our patent-pending HyperLux LED technology, utilizing red, green, blue, and white LEDs (RGBW), makes iLumi the brightest and most efficient multicolor light bulbs.

Using just the iLumi app, you can customize your lighting to any variation of bright white or rich color light without sacrificing brightness. With whiter whites, brighter blues, and richer reds, iLumis are both functional for everyday use and fun for specialty applications.
Any hue of white or color at the brightest light possible

Every iLumi has advanced Bluetooth technology built inside the bulb. You don’t have to worry about connecting to routers, master/slave dependency, or other complications and headaches. Each iLumi has up to a 100 foot range, and multiple iLumis can communicate with one another to pass on commands and work together, creating a reliable Bluetooth mesh network.  Technically speaking, each iLumi uses dual-mode Bluetooth Classic and Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth 4.0) wireless technology that is low-power, secure, scalable, and supports almost every mobile device.

This gives you complete control over how and where you use your iLumi bulbs. Control a whole house of iLumis, control a room, or control just one. Take your iLumis to a friend’s house. For professionals, like gaffers, photographers, or event lighting specialists, take your iLumis with you on location to create amazing effects with the touch of a button. Plus it’s great for commercial locations like bars, restaurants, and nightclubs.
Along with Bluetooth, each iLumi is equipped with computing technology, including a processor, memory, and real-time clock for endless programming possibilities. Here’s an idea of what’s possible:

Set your lighting to fit your schedule – Slowly turn on your lights with your alarm in the morning, set your lights to dim or brighten as the sun rises and sets, or have your lights slowly turn off when it’s time for bed.

Set your lighting to recognize when you’re there – iLumis can sense your location and proximity, turning off when you leave, turning on when you come back, or even automatically lighting your path as you move around the house.
Lighting for information at a glance – Receive text, social media, and phone call alerts, get an idea for the day’s weather, or keep up to date with stock price movements and news alerts.
Create and save scenes for perfect personalized lighting – About to watch a movie? Impress a date? Or just head off to bed?  One tap on saved scenes and your lights create the perfect mood.
Create dynamic atmospheres – Have your lighting synchronize to music, mimic an underwater world of rolling blue waves, or create amazing effects like light strobes, fire, candlelight, and more.
The sky is the limit – We plan to release a software development kit (SDK) so anyone can come up with innovative new ways to use iLumis.  Receive SDK first in a Light Hacker Kit perk level.
Checkout the video of the Music Sync application in action by clicking the picture below!
We want you to have an amazing experience from day one, so we’ve simplified the set-up process to these two easy steps:
Screw in one or multiple iLumis

After iLumis receive power for the first time, they automatically find and pair with the open iLumi app and create a secured authentication for that mobile device. You can always share access with family and friends who download the iLumi app on their own devices. There are no boxes, routers, master-slave configurations or dependencies -- it just works that simply.
Plus you can always use an old fashioned light switch to turn your iLumis off and on to a personalized default setting.

Home lighting comprises about 25% of your electric usage every month, so it pays to practice energy efficiency. By combining our advanced HyperLux LED technology’s efficiency with programming and automation functionality, iLumi is the most energy efficient light bulb in its class. And every iLumi lasts up to 20 years.

Every iLumi more than pays for itself multiple times over through the course of its life. Considering energy savings and replacement offset, comparing the large 15 watt iLumi to a 100 watt incandescent you can save about $340. Comparing the small 8 watt iLumi to a 60 watt incandescent you can save about $200.
Savings reflect Large iLumi compared to 100 watt incandescent over 20 years
Behind iLumi is the iLumi app, which will be available as a free download in the App Store or Google Play. We’ve designed the iLumi app to be simple, rich, intuitive, and engaging.

The app is compatible with all Android phones and tablets, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPad 3 (Retina Display), and iPad mini. When you set up your iLumis, it creates a secure authentication between the app and each light (so no practical jokes from the neighbors). The app is easily scalable to accommodate one or up to 100 iLumis, and comes loaded with a multitude of programs and the ability to schedule commands – well beyond simple color control settings.

Again, we’re also working on a software development kit (SDK) so others can come up with creative ways to use iLumis and share them with the iLumi nation.  Receive the iLumi SDK first by contributing to a 'Light Hacker Kit' perk.
A few of the rich colors produced by the iLumi prototypes

Our team is led by co-founders Corey Egan and Swapnil Bora out of the Alcatel-Lucent Gravity Center, an entrepreneurial incubator in Dallas, Texas. With a combined 12 years of high-tech experience, Corey and Swapnil’s affinity for lighting, mobility, and technology has been a major part of their lives.  The rest of the iLumi crew based in Dallas and India is a talented mix of engineers, designers, and advisors.

This will be my 5th Tea House at a burn! The first was little more than a 6x8, 4' tall shack that I slept in and served tea from. With a little help from my friends, the 4th evloution (24'x24'x12') was a huge success.
I already have all of my tea making equipment we need
column2:
so funds will mainly go towards 3 areas.

-=-A 24'x32' good quality tarp, for our roof, providing shade and protection from rain.  Not to mention keeping in the warmth at night!

-=-Upgrading the kitchen space:  Leaving my tiny electric flat-top at home, and aquiring a outdoor propane flat-top griddle.  Sat morning breakfast will reach a whole new level at the Tea House.

-=-Last but not least, More Wood!  Not much needs replacing, but extra supports and a possible loft area would be awesome.

If we can get over the Goal
column3:
we have plans to order a Camp Flag, and finally get some more lights and decoration going!
The More we raise the better the Tea House will be, there's no limit to it's evolution.
Thank You All for your support!

column1:
WAIT!  A Burn? You plan to what? Huh?  :D  Well I'll tell you!

Burns are community events held all around the world. Each burn is a unique temporary city, built by the participants for a short amount of time and then disassembled again. For Alchemy, our city will last just three short days. 

At Alchemy the Tea House serves as an oasis for any weary traveler. It is a place where I share my love of tea and all its wonders.  Food of all sorts is cooked though out the day, with good music never in short supply. 
Another imporant function of the tea house is water when someone needs help.
People can be having such a good time they forget to carry some water with them from camp, No scary dehydration allowed whilest the foxes are around!


=^.^=   -+- Rewards -+-   =^.^=

-This year I have some really awesome tea cups (made by local JSU student), some have already been given to supporters of the tea house, thus only a few remain!
-There's a private tea ceremony for a whole camp to enjoy.
-I'm also including a special dinner (of your choice) Friday night at alchemy for up to 4 people.
-Finally the big one, for a big supporter:  I'll bring epic dinner to you and yours.

I know there are lots of people that love the foxes but don't have much to spare, and that's ok!  Send your love by helping us spread the word and share our page!


In closing a few words about tea.

Tea has been a major part of the world for hundreds of years, it's not going anywhere but up. Most Southern Americans will only ever drink ""one kind,"" I aim to show them everything Tea can be.


“When tea becomes ritual, it takes its place at the heart of our ability to see greatness in small things. Where is beauty to be found? In great things that, like everything else, are doomed to die, or in small things that aspire to nothing, yet know how to set a jewel of infinity in a single moment?”
- Muriel Barbery, The Elegance of the Hedgehog

“Take some more tea,"" the March Hare said to Alice, very earnestly.
""I've had nothing yet,"" Alice replied in an offended tone, ""so I can't take more.""
""You mean you can't take less,"" said the Hatter: ""it's very easy to take more than nothing.""
""Nobody asked your opinion,"" said Alice.”
- Lewis Carroll, Alice in Wonderland

“I don't want tea,"" said Clary, with muffled force. ""I want to find my mother. And then I want to find out who took her in the first place, and I want to kill them.""
""Unfortunately,"" said Hodge, ""we're all out of bitter revenge at the moment, so it's either tea or nothing.”
- Cassandra Clare, City of Bones

“We had a kettle
column2:
we let it leak:
Our not repairing made it worse.
We haven't had any tea for a week...
The bottom is out of the Universe.”
- Rudyard Kipling

Tea cultivates the Mind, the Body, and the Soul
column3: and we must always cultivate the Soul.

column1: Who are we and what are we doing?

Full Moon Cheesecakes creates and delivers high-quality cheesecakes within Guadalpe, Comal, Bexar, and Kendall counties (ok... we cheat and go outside of those sometimes) in Texas.  Wherever possible, we source our ingredients from (in order) local, state, American, small business, then corporate.

Additionally, Full Moon Cheesecakes has been a regular at the New Braunfels farmer's market for some time.  We've found the community to be extremely receptive to what we do, and now we'd like to set up shop in New Braunfels or Gruene to become more convenient and responsive to our customers.

We wish to set up a cozy family-friendly haven for folks to enjoy our cheesecakes and Hawaiian coffees.  This campaign is to fund the larger equipment items we will need for this shop.  Foodies in New Braunfels value the seemingly polar opposites of rustic and cosmopolitan with a little ""weirdness"" for good measure - that's precisely what  we're aiming to provide!
To our existing customers:  YES we intend to keep delivering to where you need it, and coming to the New Braunfels Farmer's Market!
More details on us and our cheesecakes is here:  http://www.fullmooncheesecakes.com
Total goal for this campaign is $15,000 for equipment including the following
• Two Food Processors and several sets of Blades and Bowls
We do NOT expect $15k to cover everything we will eventually need for this business
column2: but if we can get these items, they will help generate revenue for the actual building lease and the small stuff - both of which we will sweat.

column1: • NO MATTER IF WE MAKE OUR GOAL OR NOT - we will donate 10% of all funds received to the Spirit of Sharing (SOS) Food Bank in New Braunfels.  We contemplated donating cheesecakes, but SOS better knows the food needs of the local community - we'll let them make the call.  After that donation, we will use any collected funds to purchase what we can of the equipment above.
• ALL contributors - regardless of amount - will be listed (unless you request otherwise) as a ""founder"" on our website.  We will also list your name on our ""Founder's Wall"" in-shop.
When the equipment's funded and the shop's open, you will be able to:
• Bring a friend or two and comfortably enjoy coffee and cheesecake!
• Experience no/lower lead time between order and delivery!
• Drop by after work and pick up just the right cheesecake for the family!
• Drop by DURING work and pick up fresh team treats!
• Stop by for a sample just to see which of our flavors is the perfect one for your party or gathering

We also have been renting a commercial kitchen for the past year - while that's been a fantastic incubator for our business, it keeps our costs and prices high (no volume ingredient buying) and limits the fun and creative things we want to do!
We've also never been able to support our customers who visit from Austin - if we get this shop open, we can!

We've been selling and delivering to retail customers now for a year - and you've told us you love what we do for you!  But we _have_ heard what else you want, and this is our opportunity to make it happen!
PLEASE HELP GET THE WORD OUT
<div>Even if you cannot help fund this campaign, share it with others!
Use the Indiegogo share tools, tell folks word of mouth, email, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn - Anything you can do to let folks know what we're planning and how to help would be SINCERELY appreciated.
More details on us and our cheesecakes is here:  http://www.fullmooncheesecakes.com
This indiegogo campaign is located at http://indiegogo.com/fullmooncheesecakes

Like all ViviPet products, our newest product is packed full of features, meticulously designed and engineered. This is a minimalist design that is not only stylish, it is also a unique playground for your cats. It's perfect for apartments and compact spaces with unlimited configurations of the Cat Walks. The Cat Walk's unlimited configurations is perfect for apartments and small spaces.

The idea of the Cat Walk came to us when we visited Peter Cohen's House of Nekko. We came to realize that cats are a part of our life
column2:
they aren't only here to comfort us -- they live with us. Why not build a place for them?

To maximize the living comfort for both human and cats, we need to utilize the space above our heads and on the walls for the cats. With this structure, the cats are able to jump around and enhance their health and agility. Now, they use the spaces that we never use such as the doorway, wall corners, and many more. With the help of Peter Cohen, Founder of ZenByCat, we are able to bring this idea to life.
column3:
>WHAT MAKES THE CAT WALK SO AMAZING?

The high-quality materials used in the Cat Walk is great for both human and cat use. We can proudly say that this is a one of a kind floating wall shelf and nothing on the market comes close. With the unique double L-shape joint, the shelf locks together securely and distributes the pressure to the shelves evenly rather than just the wall. The cats can jump all the day and you won't have to worry of about loose screws and damaged walls.

 

 

The Cat Walks can withstand the jumping and landing pressure of a cat, which can be up to 2.5x the cat's weight. We made sure that the Cat Walk can support that long-term fun without weakening the holes and joints.

We specially designed this Cat Walk for cats. That's why we use a unique double L-shape joint that can withstand the constant jumping and landing pressure from the kitties. All of the Cat Walks have been tested with weights, real life scenarios, and is able to hold up to 25 pounds. That’s 2 big cats or 128 tacos!  

 

All shelves are painted with 4 layers of protective coating: prime coating, water resistant coating, color paint, and scratch resistant coating.

All of the shelves are customizable. They can be attached to each other to make a really long Cat Walk and/or you can add different add-ons, such as the hammocks, cat house, cat arch, and much more.
column4: >PRODUCT FEATURES
column5:
>HOW TO GET THEM

Become a backer of this project and pick the desired reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering our shelves. You will get a special backer discount, and you will receive your stuff before anyone else. Want to buy more than one? Buy with different lengths? Check out all of the rewards and combos we created for you.     

We have no traditional investors. Instead, we launch products here on Kickstarter. The funds we raise here not only go towards manufacturing, they also help us design future products.
column6: >REWARDS
column7:
>DONATION FOR ZENBYCAT

We work closely with ZenByCat to raise awareness and find a cure for the FIP disease. We were impacted personally and because of that, we are doing whatever we can to educate people and to hep find the cure. We will donate a portion of the sales to ZenByCat and let them continue to do their jobs and fight on! #FIP Warrior.
column8: >PROJECT TIMELINE
column9:
>YOUR SUPPORT MATTERS

We can’t say it enough. Thank you to all of the fans that have been supporting us and believing in us. You mean the world to us and this is all for you. We cannot wait to get these Cat Walks in your hands.
column10:
>RISKS AND CHALLENGES 

This is ViviPet’s first Kickstarter project. We've been in business for several years now and we have not disappointed anyone with our products (hopefully stays this way!) We are a growing company that has an amazing team behind us to care for our products and our customers.

In short, we are a pet lover company -- we know what we do best, to intertwine the health benefit, functionality with amazing design that one would mistakenly for a human product.

Supply Chain Risk: We have been working with a manufacture since we started the company, and both parties instantly connected and know exactly what each other want. They are very fast in delivering our orders. However, sometimes things happen and it's out of our control. Sometimes shipping containers of the products get stuck in the custom for longer than expected.

Why not build a place for them?To maximize the living comfort for both human and cats, we need to utilize the space above our heads and on the walls for the cats. With this structure, the cats are able to jump around and enhance their health and agility. Now, they use the spaces that we never use such as the doorway, wall corners, and many more. With the help of Peter Cohen, Founder of ZenByCat, we are able to bring this idea to life. WHAT MAKES THE CAT WALK SO AMAZING?The high-quality materials used in the Cat Walk is great for both human and cat use. We can proudly say that this is a one of a kind floating wall shelf and nothing on the market comes close. With the unique double L-shape joint, the shelf locks together securely and distributes the pressure to the shelves evenly rather than just the wall. The cats can jump all the day and you won't have to worry of about loose screws and damaged walls.  The Cat Walks can withstand the jumping and landing pressure of a cat, which can be up to 2.5x the cat's weight. We made sure that the Cat Walk can support that long-term fun without weakening the holes and joints.We specially designed this Cat Walk for cats. That's why we use a unique double L-shape joint that can withstand the constant jumping and landing pressure from the kitties. All of the Cat Walks have been tested with weights, real life scenarios, and is able to hold up to 25 pounds. That’s 2 big cats or 128 tacos!   All shelves are painted with 4 layers of protective coating: prime coating, water resistant coating, color paint, and scratch resistant coating.All of the shelves are customizable. They can be attached to each other to make a really long Cat Walk and/or you can add different add-ons, such as the hammocks, cat house, cat arch, and much more.  PRODUCT FEATURES  HOW TO GET THEMBecome a backer of this project and pick the desired reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering our shelves. You will get a special backer discount, and you will receive your stuff before anyone else. Want to buy more than one? Buy with different lengths? Check out all of the rewards and combos we created for you.     We have no traditional investors. Instead, we launch products here on Kickstarter. The funds we raise here not only go towards manufacturing, they also help us design future products. REWARDS DONATION FOR ZENBYCATWe work closely with ZenByCat to raise awareness and find a cure for the FIP disease. We were impacted personally and because of that, we are doing whatever we can to educate people and to hep find the cure. We will donate a portion of the sales to ZenByCat and let them continue to do their jobs and fight on! #FIP Warrior. PROJECT TIMELINE   YOUR SUPPORT MATTERSWe can’t say it enough. Thank you to all of the fans that have been supporting us and believing in us. You mean the world to us and this is all for you. We cannot wait to get these Cat Walks in your hands.  RISKS AND CHALLENGES This is ViviPet’s first Kickstarter project. We've been in business for several years now and we have not disappointed anyone with our products (hopefully stays this way!) We are a growing company that has an amazing team behind us to care for our products and our customers.In short, we are a pet lover company -- we know what we do best, to intertwine the health benefit, functionality with amazing design that one would mistakenly for a human product.Supply Chain Risk: We have been working with a manufacture since we started the company, and both parties instantly connected and know exactly what each other want. They are very fast in delivering our orders. However, sometimes things happen and it's out of our control. Sometimes shipping containers of the products get stuck in the custom for longer than expected.",18.0,0,"1 Campaign
