column3: /> Hello one and all. My name is Simon and i have come seeking help. Goodness knows i need it!

column1: I came up with this amazing idea for a table lamp 4 years ago whilst i was looking out of my window at the setting sun. I didnt want the day to end so i thought ""there must be a way to carry this on?""

There and then this came to me, A way of simulating the sun still in your room, With the light coming through the blinds. A lamp would be great i thought and so i set my design prowess to work on achieving this modern delight.
I will require $25000 and this sum will be spent wholly on the manufacture and some packaging for my table lamps. THIS IS WHERE I NEED YOUR HELP.
You can contribute in one of two ways.
For your time and donations i will be swapping them (donations) in exchange for my table lamps which i assure you will be yours before they go on general sale.

As i have previously stated all of the work has been done i am just stuck at the final hurdle so you would be doing me such an enormous favour that it goes beyond words just how greatful i would be if you could assist me.
• I have a selection of perks for you all ranging from sincere thank you all the way through to varying amounts of lamps.

• Please rest assured if i do not meet my goal the funds will still be going towards the manufacture of this home ""accessory"" It will just have to be on a much smaller scale until i get up and running.

• The impact that your contributions will make quite frankly will be the difference between failure or success. In my past employments i have been the one who provided the service and here i am asking for you all to  PLEASE SHOW YOUR GENEROSITY in donating to my campaign
I attended Denstone College where i took seven G.C.S.E's and an A'level in art and design. It was from my designing interest that i brought this idea to fruition.

Although my employment back ground does not really contribute to the concept of this table lamp i guess you could assume from it that i work best when left to my own devices. Before this i was a test driver for J.C.B and the bar manager for a popular hotel. Both requiring long hours and a word which has proven to be key in my adult life. Preparation.

This leads me perfectly into the next point, about my lamp. I had to do a lot of preparation in initializing my grand plan. I first had the patents to contend with which took alot of time and effort and then there was the dreaded sourcing of the manufacturer. After several expensive and very poor quality samples i finally settled upon a great company who have agreed to make it and even sell some for me themselves, for a commission of course.

I just feel that this lamp will benefit all of its users as you can simply and effectively angle the light to wherever it is wished and there is the added feature of the colour changing ability by adding or removing the transparent coloured slides that slip easily down grooves on each side of each ""side"". So if you choose to you can mix and match the colours.
The lamp is also LED so it wont't need to be upgraded anytime soon which has to be a positive as the normal (cfl) bulbs as you are probably aware are being phased out.
Your assistence will be of paramount importance as i have done everything i can. I have now hit the proverbial brick wall and can do no more until i pay for manufacture.
Please, if for whatever reason you just cant contribute, even after reading this then could you please share instead as the more people who see my campaign the greater my chances of success
It would be so amazing of you all and would be greatly appreciated.
please look at stylish lamp suppliers

column3: />This lamp fundamentaly will be of great benefit to the end user for a number of reasons.

column1: 1) It will decrease the electricity bills as the need for a main light will be a thing of the past as you just adjust the blinds to wherever you need the light to be.
2) The end user will be able to cater for their mood by inserting the relevant colour for there current state of mind.

3) It will most definately negate the need to arrange the room accordingly to cater for this light source or even trying to find some where to plug it in will be a thing of the past as no matter where it is placed a simple adjustment will ensure you receive the light.

The Easy2LED project (www.easy2led.com) was launched to help DIY enthusiasts in making custom LED lights. The most difficult part in a DIY LED light is the metal housing, so we so we focused on making housings where you can install your favourite LED, optic and driver.
The first project was designed for 20mm optics and it proved to be a success. Now we are in the process of making a larger housing for 35mm optics.
The new housing will be easier to assemble, waterproof and reusable.
The project is under way but we need funding to pay for manufacturing and assembly on a larger scale in order to lower the unit cost.
The new housing will feature improvements over the previous model but unfortunately those improvements are costly, that is why we started this campaign. More information on the product is below.
We have paid the tooling costs and made prepayments for some of the parts.
The collected funds will be used to pay for part of the manufacturing and assembly costs and if the funding goal is reached, we will be able to make a spare rear cover for each kit.
Each backer will receive a complete kit for making your own rugged LED light.
1 aluminium pill for the LED board and driver
1 multilayer coated glass with retainer ring
1 rear cover (2 if the funding goal is reached)
set of screws for the front ring and rear cover
Please note that the shipping is by registered airmail
The general design is already fixed, but if you have an interesting idea feel free to submit it.
Drawing of the housing without the pill.
This is the final version , made by 3D prototyping.
The pill screws inside the housing at any desired depth, so you can use optics up to 35mm in diameter and up to 30mm in height.
The front ring and rear cover will be made from black polycarbonate.
Please note that the surface finish will be black anodizing.

The Story

At first it was just me and the mouse in my pocket, but ideas have a way of taking on a life of their own.

I live in historic Keeler, Ca, a profoundly quiet place now, born of mining and wed to the railroad. The current population of about 50 hold on at the edge of storied Owens Drybed Lake, with majestic surroundings of Death Valley to the east and Mt. Whitney westward.

I noticed the old pool site was declining. Keeler has been described as a living ghost town (it is a wisp of its former population of 2-3,000 people), but there are a number of significant historic sites remaining. One is the old pool, built by a hardy community in the 1920s, luring Hollywood stars to cool off in the hot desert after filming,  holding county events, and serving as a playground for generations of families.

Even after it closed, photographers, painters, nature lovers and historians remained intrigued, and its little buildings are much loved in their setting. I didn't realize how much it meant to me until the prospect of its destruction loomed before me. (The substantial ghost town of Aurora was dismantled one brick at a time, until nothing of it remains. ) We don't want that to happen to Keeler.

So, people here got together and formed K.E.E.P.S. Keeler Early Era Preservation Society (to become a non-profit) and entered into negotiations with the private owner, who is inclined toward community restoration.  He is in favor of our  endeavors, which have evolved as we discussed plans.

Maintaining a chlorinated, almost olympic-sized pool for 50 residents seemed like a luxury unbecoming to our era. So we are planning a natural pool (like the example in Ibiza, Spain at the Agroturismo Can Marti www.greentraveler.uk.co/blogs/hotels-natural-swimming-pools.) Half the area is plantable.

column5: >
column8: > Fed by an artesian spring, we have local plants that like the water.

column1: As an oasis in the desert, water garden, a handshake with the  future, a place to sit under the stars. . . this little corner to be preserved as a community asset again
column2:
this is our dream.

What We Need

  • We need $1,500 to open escrow. That is our immediate need and our current goal.
  • If we went straight to the entire purchase price of $15,000 that would be fantastic! We could start refurbishing the pool immediately. Otherwise, we have a 90-day escrow and will be conducting further fundraising.
  • If we don't reach our goal, funds will be donated to the Eastern California History Museum. They are doing great work!

The Impact

  • The history of the Owens Valley has water at its center. We are record-keepers and place-holders, because we are not the only ones to inhabit these lands.
  • A little town can have a big heart, and we can grow through completion of a grand idea.
  • On your way from Death Valley to the great Sierra Nevada Mountains, stop by to see the little railroad town that could!, known as ""The End of the Line.""

Risks &

column1:
This is an ambitious project for a town that is big on ambience, but short on financial substance. Also, such a quiet town cherishes its peaceful surroundings, and if this measure of change does noise-ify us, we will have lost something.
  • The place itself is as influential as the people in their desires. So, the profound quiet is likely to proclaim itself in the hearts of visitors and admirerers.
  • Growing a swimming pond will be a gardner's challenge, something people here are excited about taking on. We have gardeners galore!

<li>Refurbishing an old pool will be expensive and will take time, patience and diligence. We have people experienced in this aspect, willing to work with us, but first things first, we need to secure the property.    <span class=""Apple-style-span"" style=""background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)

column2: >Nowadays, lighting appliances slowly rise to be one of the hot spots in the technology industry. Numerous tech companies are racing against each other to create the smartest and the most intuitive indoor lighting to improve their customers' experience. How about portable lighting appliances? This is where we take over.
column3: >Meet Allocacoc's FlashLight version 2.0. On this version, we expand the prospects of using FlashLight by extending its' usage, making it more than just a portable lamp or a tool used during emergency moments.
column4: >
column6: >The upgraded FlashLight v2.0. is equipped with four types of accessories. You can use the FlashLight as a mobile lighting device, but with these add-on accessories, you can turn your FlashLight to a desk lamp, a reading lamp, a bike lamp, and night lamp!
column12: >BikeFix works as a bike lamp mount for your FlashLight. Simply mount the FlashLight to BikeFix and you're ready for your next adventure.
column15: >StandClip is one of FlashLight's accessory that turns your FlashLight to a reading lamp.<span style='letter-spacing: 0px
column17: '> Direct the StandClip to your working/reading area and start working with an adequate amount of light, reducing eye strains and avoiding posture problems in the future.
column21: >Do you want a table lamp which brightness you can decide? DeskLight gives you an opportunity to turn your FlashLight to a table lamp. Slide the FlashLight up and down to adjust the beam and the brightness.
column22: >
column24: >Each FlashLight package is equipped with NightShade. Its' silicone body dims the light coming from the FlashLight, creating an ambient light to lull you to sleep. Put it on a flat surface and have a pleasant night!

column31: >Good Design Award is a movement aimed at enriching lives and society through design. It is a system to discover new designs and share these discoveries with the society, with five fundamental ideals: Humanity, Honesty, Innovation, Aesthetics, and Ethics.
column32: >As a Winner of the Good Design Award, FlashLight’s design for multiple purposes is recognised as an example of society-leading good design.

column38: >No worries about bringing FlashLight on your outdoor adventure through any kind of weather. It is splash resistant!

column11:
>

 

 

In line with our slogan: ""A Different Standard"", we strive to recreate household products to be more stylish without compromising the function. Therefore, we want to invent an adaptable lighting solution that is both useful and multifunctional for various occasions. As what is said by Vincent Wang, the lead Designer of FlashLight: ""How many times does one get to use a flashlight at home? With a conventional flashlight, maybe three times in a year. With the Allocacoc's FlashLight, that's infinity.”
column12:
>

 

","Nowadays, lighting appliances slowly rise to be one of the hot spots in the technology industry. Numerous tech companies are racing against each other to create the smartest and the most intuitive indoor lighting to improve their customers' experience. How about portable lighting appliances? This is where we take over.Meet Allocacoc's FlashLight version 2.0. On this version, we expand the prospects of using FlashLight by extending its' usage, making it more than just a portable lamp or a tool used during emergency moments.  The upgraded FlashLight v2.0. is equipped with four types of accessories. You can use the FlashLight as a mobile lighting device, but with these add-on accessories, you can turn your FlashLight to a desk lamp, a reading lamp, a bike lamp, and night lamp!BikeFixBikeFix works as a bike lamp mount for your FlashLight. Simply mount the FlashLight to BikeFix and you're ready for your next adventure. StandClipStandClip is one of FlashLight's accessory that turns your FlashLight to a reading lamp. Direct the StandClip to your working/reading area and start working with an adequate amount of light, reducing eye strains and avoiding posture problems in the future. DeskLightDo you want a table lamp which brightness you can decide? DeskLight gives you an opportunity to turn your FlashLight to a table lamp. Slide the FlashLight up and down to adjust the beam and the brightness. NightShadeEach FlashLight package is equipped with NightShade. Its' silicone body dims the light coming from the FlashLight, creating an ambient light to lull you to sleep. Put it on a flat surface and have a pleasant night!  Winner of Good Design Award!Good Design Award is a movement aimed at enriching lives and society through design. It is a system to discover new designs and share these discoveries with the society, with five fundamental ideals: Humanity, Honesty, Innovation, Aesthetics, and Ethics. As a Winner of the Good Design Award, FlashLight’s design for multiple purposes is recognised as an example of society-leading good design. LightweightWeighing at only 109 grams, the FlashLight makes a compact addition to your everyday life. Splash ResistantNo worries about bringing FlashLight on your outdoor adventure through any kind of weather. It is splash resistant!No External Batteries NeededFlashLight is rechargeable with USB-C Cable.

column1: One-Click ControlAdjust the brightness level from 0 to 100% by pressing the button for 2 seconds. Impact ResistantFlashLight's aluminum body makes it impact resistant up to 1 meter high.            In line with our slogan: ""A Different Standard"", we strive to recreate household products to be more stylish without compromising the function. Therefore, we want to invent an adaptable lighting solution that is both useful and multifunctional for various occasions. As what is said by Vincent Wang, the lead Designer of FlashLight: ""How many times does one get to use a flashlight at home? With a conventional flashlight, maybe three times in a year. With the Allocacoc's FlashLight, that's infinity.”",36.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Discreet ventilation allows moisture to evaporate if you don't have time to clean or dry your toys right away.  The additional antibacterial additive in the non-toxic plastic helps prevent bacteria growth.
column24: >*Please note this is not a dishwasher box or ""self-cleaning"" (you still have to remove body fluids and lubricants) but it is a solution for the real way people use their adult pleasure products.
column28:
>

THE ISSUES

If you’ve ever owned a vibrator, condoms, lubrication or any other sexual enhancement, product, then you have been faced with these questions.

1. Where do I set it when I’m done and things are ‘sticky’?

2. How do I clean it and dry it?

3. What if I don't have time to clean it?

4. Where do I put it after I clean it?

5. Where do I store it so someone won’t find it?

6. What if someone finds my box?

column1: Vinyl storage boxes, shoe boxes, sock drawers and plastic grocery bags are the most common storage ideas. Who wants to pick lint or pet hair off a toy before using it? You wouldn't put your toothbrush in your sock would you? These aren't safe at all and can have a chemical reaction with your sex toy causing  burning or infection in your genitals!

column4: >Patent pending Joyboxx with Playtray solves these problems.

column1:
American's spend $15 BILLION DOLLARS A YEAR on pleasure products!  That is a lot of sex toy joy going on and believe it or not, a non-toxic, body and product safe storage solution doesn't exist.  So after this ‘ah-ha’ moment, inventor Deborah Semer began designing a safe place for millions of passionate consumers to have a viable storage solution for their pleasure products.

Deborah recruited friends and family to help make this dream come true and then met 30-year industry veteran, Phyllis Heppenstall
column2:
the legendary founder of Peekay Inc., a Pacific Northwest based company with 46 stores in six states (Lovers, Con Rev, Christal's). Heppenstall not only became an advisor, but also an investor.

“We must address the cleanliness of our adult ‘toys’ with the same passion that we use them. Finally here’s the product that all consumers need to address this void!” says Heppenstall.

WE ARE VERY CLOSE...

Buyers are ready, supply chain is in place, packaging is designed,  the Joyboxx prototype process is complete and final adjustments to the steel mold are being made and should be completed in the next few weeks. Plastic injection molding is trickier than one would think, but we are ready to shoot the first big production run and work out any final kinks!

HELP SHARE THE JOY!

Help fund the first production run and bring Joyboxx to the world.  In addition to injection molding production costs, there are: overseas shipping, packaging, assembly, displays, marketing and making awesome tongue-in-cheek videos to pay for.   We estimate delivery to you by September 2014, if not sooner!

YOU COME FIRST

Because you are the first early adopters of this revolutionary new system, you should come first.  We have narrowed down the colors choices, and will get your feedback on the final color combinations. Your feedback, insights and opinions will be critical to the future designs, shapes, sizes and colors. 

BUILD IT AND THEY WILL COME.

Thank you for your support!

(All puns intended)

It's all because of my wife...

she yelled constantly about coffee stains around the house. That's enough to make a designer out of anybody.

 

I tried a variety of mugs, even those giant double-wall tumblers, but that left stains too!

It was clear, I wanted to design something beautiful, useful and unique. While the solution was not apparent to me right away, inspiration struck one day as I reached for a tasty banana.

 

The banana hook-holder had an interesting shape that got me wondering. Somehow, the hanger kinda, sorta, looked like a handle. I guess that was the moment. Needless to say, the ensuing prototypes left a lot to be desired.

 

It wasn't pretty, and it was far from what I envisioned as ""the most beautiful mug in the world""

573 strangers pledged their support faithfully, with the promise that I would deliver.

Although it was my first crowdfunding effort, a group of individuals trusted me enough to provide me the funding necessary to bring my concept to life.

 

Today, I'm excited to tell you about the Floating Mug® Clear.

 

It's made of glass and now 50% larger than the original. Dare I say, beauti-fuller?

12ounces (350ml) of hot goodness
column2:
it's just what you need to get any day going.

 

 

 

Does the coaster work? I say ""YES!"", but...

you should definitely keep a napkin handy. There are moments when you'll cause spills that result in too much moisture dripping onto the base.

Some people like to say condensation causes the coffee stains on furniture. That's inaccurate, specifically if you're describing hot tea or coffee.

 

One reason you might see liquid rolling down the side of your cup is because we sometimes ""dribble"". 

This is not a scientific fact, but I believe the repetitive sipping from a single point on the mouth of the mug, accumulates to a point where it ultimately has to roll down the side of your cup, it's not a lot of moisture.

 

You may inadvertently spill some coffee over the side of the mug by stirring heavily, or by stumbling while you walk to your seat or desk.

In any event, these scenarios will likely see moisture drip down the side of your mug. 

So, won't the excess moisture spill into your lap as you drink?

 

For the typical use case, the amount of moisture that does make it to the bottom of the Floating Mug, usually evaporates away, or simply clings to the bottom of the mug. 

Excessive moisture accumulation caused by an actual spill can simply be 'dabbed' dry using a small napkin.

Thousands of Floating Mugs (original porcelain version) have sold on online. An overwhelming majority of positive reviews provide feedback addressing this one concern. The mug and coaster is truly functional. 

   

So! You may not need a new mug today, but this one is designed with love, and so I hope you'll want it.

column1:
Visit www.halospheres.com to purchase.

 

Halospheres is an extreme velocity desktop toy. At over 3600 RPM, Halospheres brings lightning-fast speeds and mesmerising halos to your fingertips.

Forged from steel and plated in gold, Halospheres is a real showpiece, generating a vortex of kinetic light effects, driven by just the power of your lungs!

 

 

 

 

Halospheres is a real showpiece - both moving and when still.

The Halospheres are first cast from stainless steel and then polished to a mirror finish. After which, they are plated with gold for that characteristic halo hue.

The spinning plate is hand cast in concave form from black resin and then highly polished, resulting in a perfect pairing for both performance and aesthetics.

 

The lightning-fast speed of the Halospheres is result of its unique motion.

As it spins on its centre axis on the concave plate, it also rolls like a wheel, which generates a lift force on one sphere raising it into the air - much like forces at play on a curveball. This is known as the Magnus effect.

This reduced friction together with its high relative mass and angular momentum, allows the Halospheres to accelerate to extreme velocities.

The halo effects themselves are a result of its spherical shape. Each sphere creates a pinpoint light reflection in its mirrored finish from any significant light source in the room - be it light from windows, lamps or flashlights. As it spins at great speed, the pinpoint reflections blend together to our eye, creating its characteristic halo effects.

 

 

 

It takes a bit of practice to get going.

The first step requires a good flick of the fingers to jump-start the Halospheres into spinning in the correct motion.

The next step will take a bit of experimentation to find that sweet-spot of where to aim and angle the pipe. Top Tip: its not all about how hard you blow, but rather using repeated controlled breaths aimed towards the outside of the Halospheres.

Once at speed, a short puff intermittently, and you can keep it spinning on and on. Otherwise it will wind down in about 2-3 minutes.

 

 

Playing around with different light sources in different environments will create new and colourful halo combinations. Large, diffuse light sources (like windows), create thicker halo bands, whereas smaller, more focused light sources (like lamps, flashlights, etc) create narrower halo bands. The brighter the source, the brighter, more intense the halo.

Once you hone your skills and find that sweet-spot, you won’t be left with any doubt that you’ve found it. Compete with your friends and family to see who can drive Halospheres the fastest! 

 

 

 

 

 

In association with Enventys Partners, the marketing partner for Halospheres.

 

Risks and challenges

With a background in industrial design, we have extensive experience with product development and bringing projects like this into reality. Thus we can anticipate well the events required to take products all the way to your door. We have partnered with manufactures and fulfilment providers that we trust, which have a good working relationship with already.

Prior to launching this campaign we took the extra step on confirming all product elements through production ready sampling. This helps reduce the possibility or unforeseen hiccups in the production process.

Should any delays occur, we will be sure to keep our supporters apprised of any such delay and what we doing about it. We take your support seriously and communication is a priority for us.

column2:
>

WayCap Ez is a reusable capsule for Nespresso systems that protects the planet, allowing you to stop wasting tons of disposable pods. One that allows you to save up to 1 thousand euros on coffee per year for a family of four. But, most importantly, one that puts you back at the center, allowing you to use mostly any grind and kind of coffee available on the market, whether it’s from your favourite brand or your local coffee shop.
column3: >
column7:
>

Last year you helped us make WayCap a reality. Today we’re back to introduce the result of all the hard work developed thanks to your precious feedback: WayCap Ez.
column9:
>

Waycap Ez widens the grind range to almost any kind of coffee on the market. Here’s why we’re equipping WayCap Ez with 3 different interchangeable tops, each targeted to a particular kind of coffee grind. The thinner the grind, the bigger amount of slots you should use, and vice versa. By switching them you will easily find the one that best suits your tastes.
column13: >
column14:
>
With the extra tops you’ll complete your Barista Set. The kit includes 5 extra tops, in addition to the 3 already supplied, to be as precise as you can when you make your espresso. You can choose the Basic Kit Barista (1 WayCap Ez, 1 manual dispenser and 8 tops) or you can add the set to your order through the button at the bottom of the following picture.

column2:
>

Thanks to you, we’ve also changed the way the capsule opens and closes, to make refilling it even easier and faster. You now simply snap the top, and unsnap it.
column3:
>

Each WayCap is produced entirely in Italy, in timeless stainless steel, and just a bit of FDA compliant high quality silicon in the new external ring, that makes WayCap Ez even more compatible.
column8:
>

Since WayCap Ez works with mostly any bland on the market, the savings can be up to 85% compared to the disposable capsules. A family of 4 can save up to 1000 Euros per year.
column10:
>

WayCap capsules are made of stainless steel. They're designed to last and to be refillable, so they can be reused as many times as you’d like. They don’t produce any waste except for the coffee grounds and their environmental impact is minimal in every stage of production. 

Now you can finally kiss goodbye to the millions of disposable pods that accumulate in landfills 

Every part of the pod, including the seals, is manufactured in the immediate vicinity of the warehouse and makes only one trip before arriving at your home.
column11:
>

WayCap can be refilled in 20 seconds, just enough time for the machine to warm up, using the manual dispenser, that leaves no trace.
column12:
>

The manual dispenser can store up to two caps that you can bring with you anywhere you go, for example at office.

column1: Make your WayCap experience complete with the new Ruvidock, the support made by WayCap that holds up to 2 capsules and 1 manual dispenser. Ruvidock includes Scovolino, the stainless steel cleaning stick to easily clean the capsule right after use.
You can also enjoy your espresso with the new WayCap glass coffee drinks: a better way to appreciate your espresso.

WayCap is compatible with the following Nespresso® machines:

- Inissia

- Essenza

- Lattissima

- Pixie

- Citiz

- U

- Maestria

- Prodigio

- Kitchen Aid
column3: >
column4: >

column3:
>

The Nespresso® trademark is not the property of WayCap srls. There is no affiliation between Nespresso®, Nestle Nespresso S.A.®, Societe des Produits Nestle S.A.® and their affiliates and WayCap srls

 

We are in production stage

 

Risk and Chalenges

Last year you helped us make WayCap a reality.
It was a hard working summer and we ended up delivering our product in perfect time to all our 4 thousands backers around the world.

In the last three years, we have been working around the clock refining our designs: numerous prototypes have been developed and countless hours have been spent making sure the capsule will be as good as we intend them to be. After extensive research, we have also established a good relationship with a/some manufacturer/s that has many years of experiences in the field of stainless steel and is able to work to our exact specifications.   But as with ANY new product, timeline is always the biggest risk. We will make every effort to deliver on time, and could even deliver the product before expected. However, there could be unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during early production. We ask for your patience, and promise to deliver a quality product to each and every backer as soon as possible.

In any case, we will keep you informed of any changes.
Thank you for helping make this product a reality!

column3:
>

Gryphon combines a high performance smart WiFi router with a simple to use App, making it easy for parents and families to manage the connected home.

All security features are built directly within the router itself, so there is no complicated software to install on your connected devices.

Everything in our homes is coming online: speakers, thermostats, light bulbs, cameras, washers, dryers, and everything in between - creating new security threats. The home wifi router manages all the internet traffic that goes in and out of our homes making it the main entry point for viruses, malware, and hackers. Gryphon can keep all your connected things safer with 24/7 intelligent intrusion detection (beta) and active whole house malware filtering.
column4:
>

Intelligent Intrusion Detection

Each connected device has a unique fingerprint when it communicates on the network. When there is an attack on the device, that fingerprint will change.

Gryphon Intrusion Detection works 24/7 by using machine learning to recognize the unique fingerprint of each connected device on your network and will warn you and quarantine the device when a particular device's fingerprint changes.

Please let us know if you like to be part of our beta to help us improve this feature.
column5:
> 

Whole House Malware Protection

Gryphon filters the incoming data streams to clean up and prevents malware from entering your home by constantly syncing with the latest threat database.  This is done in the background and at the network level without you having to do anything.
column7:
>

 

Manage your entire WiFi network from a simple, intuitive, yet powerful app (supported on iOS and Android). It allows you to view all your connected devices, manage site access in real-time, and review browsing history.
column9:
>

The average family has 10 Internet-connected devices and counting, creating new security threats and vulnerabilities. What’s worse, unfiltered web content is on the rise. Over 70% of children see inappropriate content by accident.
column10:
>

Gryphon gives parents peace of mind as their kids explore the internet. Software updates and parental control are included free of charge forever. There are no monthly or annual charges for Gryphon updates or parental control.

Screen Time Management 

Through the app, easily set age levels for each device, pre-set bedtimes, homework times, or simply pause the internet to get together for more family time. You can also separately set Internet time limits for each child as well as view their browsing history, even the ones they view in incognito mode.

Real-time Request and Approval From Anywhere

Sometimes, your child needs access to certain websites for homework. If a website is blocked, the child can send a real-time request that will show up on the parent’s phone. The parent can then immediately review and grant permission from anywhere - even from outside the home.

Watch the video below demonstrating the Real-Time Request and Approval!
column12:
showinfo=0"">
 

Gryphon CrowdRanking(™) 

It’s difficult to know which websites are appropriate for our child. To guide the parent, Gryphon aggregates the approval ratings from other parents and the community through Crowd Ranking™. The ranking is constantly updated based on your child’s age and the approval ratings of your community.
column13:
>

Safe List Sharing 

Managing your child’s online activities is not just about blocking harmful websites but also about discovering useful content to help your child learn and grow. We made it easy to share your safe lists among friends, teachers, and the community. Think playlist sharing for your favorite music app and you get the concept. :)
column14: >
column16:
>

 

Gryphon’s easy to use, high performance technology is packaged in a beautiful and sleek design that is inspired by the sculptural school of mannerism. The days of hiding your router in your closet are over!
column17:
>

We are proud of what we have designed and we want you to also proudly display Gryphon out in the open. It’s not just for looks. The curves allow us to place the internal antennas orthogonally to generate the best radiated patterns for optimal RF performance. By placing Gryphon out in the open, you give it the optimal location to provide the best coverage for your living spaces while enhancing your home design.
column18:
>

 

Security and safety without the need to compromise on your WiFi performance!
column19: >
column21:
'/>

We have assembled a global team of experts with a proven track record of delivering award winning products like the Apple iPod and the MiFi mobile hotspot. We’ve worked over the past year creating a beautiful design and developing the software platform. We are using Qualcomm and their latest WiFi technology and have chosen our manufacturing partner.

It's been a long road and we’re extremely excited to introduce this WiFi router to the world.

Now we need your support! In order to pay for the tooling and get the costs to a price we believe creates value for our customers, we need to have a large initial production run. Your support will allow us to place our first large order with our manufacturers so that we can reduce production costs and get Gryphon to families everywhere.

column1: Hi. My name is Anthony and i have been Living in Lebanon for the past 10 odd years. I work at a wedding and events company. Over the years here in Lebanon i have made many friends and met many people. My parents, and a few of these friends including (my now 'Mother In Law' to be) and my Fiance have always given clothes to Charities and whenever possible given clothes and food and other items to the poorer families in our community. It is now Low Season for weddings here in Lebanon as it is winter time and the fashion for weddings is outdoors so i have had some time on my hands and been thinking about Christmas and how i can do my part. There are many Orphanages in Lebanon. While most are well kept and provide well for the Children who occupy them. There are a few who are smaller and rely mainly on the communities around them for anything more than the bare minimums. These are the Orphanages i will be focusing on.

I will be making an honest attempt to raise some money in order to buy gifts for as many orphans as i can manage in order to surprise them just in time for Christmas. If i can't raise enough to buy Gifts then i will be using the money to cook as many meals as possible. The Orphans and the Management are not aware of my attempt as i don't want to let anyone down should i fail. I will However use Whatever funding i do obtain (as little or as much as it may be) to Buy Gifts of Provide a Christmas meal for the Children.
My mother in Law to be, as well as my Fiance, will be helping me as they have been doing this charitable work for many years, as well as a few friends to help me distribute the Gifts or Meals.

As far as perks go, I am not really sure what i can give you back other than the knowledge that you have provided a gift for someone who wasn't expecting anything. Or a proper Christmas meal as opposed to the regular Daily Rations, and definitely put a smile on a lot of children's faces. However if you leave an email address i hope to get a group photo of the children with their gifts / dinner, and maybe a signed card that i can send out to you all by email.

I would just like to remind you that this is an honest attempt and i am acting on Faith that i may be able to do my part in making a few children's Christmas a Happy One. Therefore i will not be putting a minimum donation in order to receive a perk. Nor will i be giving money to the management of the Orphanages which i will provide this  service to. I will be buying the gifts, and delivering the gifts personally (with a few friends and my Fiance to help). And if it turns out that i make the meals instead then i and my friends will be delivering them. This way i can Guarantee that the gifts / food go to where they are needed most. The Average value of each gift will be 10$ therefore if i reach my goal i'll be able to provide 250 gifts :) This will cover at least 1 Orphanage :)

I would just like to take a moment here to mention the obvious. Every Cent Helps, and i really want to thank in advance all persons who donate as well as those who just spread the word. Also i would like to wish everyone a very Merry Christmas. :)

About our team

The idea of developing something warm and cosy for cats was made by one couple from Latvia. Andrejs and Lydia were inspired by their own pets and saving the animal shelter.

In 2014 animal shelter “Second home” started its activity and this organization was in search of charity foundations to build dog's kennels. Andrejs and Lydia decided to help and as a result in the animal shelter were installed first three dogs kennels.

Since that time they are helping the shelter in different ways. Andrej and Lydia organised a fundraising company for place reconstruction, collecting feed for animals and run classes for children about how to take care of animals. In addition, they organise charity events and for their own wedding, instead of presents and gifts, they asked to bring some food for animals from the shelter.

This shelter located in Demene settlement(Latvia) and give the roof for about 100 cats and dogs in the majority, however here they also help wild animals. Last year in this shelter was saved cormorant and little fox.

Very important is that in this shelter doesn’t euthanise animals!

Now Andrejs and Lydia decided to develop something useful and helpful for pets, moreover, it helps animals, which do not have a hosts yet. Our product “CatNap” will bring happiness to your fluffy friends and together we can help animals!

Follow us on instagram and
column3:
ref=notif"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">facebook.

 

Even more! We are also committed to helping animals at animal shelters. We are ready to donate 5% from income to the animal shelter ""Otrā māja dzīvniekiem"" (“SECOND HOME”) in Latvia, which supports homeless animals and helps them to find a new home. (https://www.otramaja.lv/en/). You will be notified when the donation is made!

That’s why we have come up with an idea to design a special CatNap, which would allow you, your family, and your pet to feel even more comfortable at your home.

What you get


By supporting our project you invest in a cosy, stylish, and qualitative accessory for your cat. The standard CatNap comes in two random solid colour combination with a heating feature. However, you can choose your own colour of the CatNap at some higher price too! In case you are about making a present for a friend or you have not one, but two cats, you can order two CatNaps at once at a discounted price! There are two more options as well. One is to get a CatNap with the name of your cat embroidered on it, and the second is to get both – the CatNap of a particular colour and the embroidery of your cat’s name on it.

We have tried our product on various cats and noticed that cats feel comfortable inside the CatNap and like staying in it for a long time. This cat`s bed brings you such benefits as:

column1: • it is easy to brush with a vacuum cleaner
• you can clean your house faster because your cat spends more time in one place!
• it is more comfortable for you to work because your cat does not disturb you!
• it makes your cat feel warm, what might be especially important during the cold seasons!

Meeting your demand


We have chosen the Flexible funding campaign because of our production facilities. This allows us to produce even less CatNaps that we have stated as our target. Of course, we would bear additional costs for producing less, but we still will supply all the funders with the orders after the end of the campaign, even if we do not reach the target amount of funding. However, we feel positive about the outcome and have also predicted the case of raising more money than the initial target sum. If this occurs, we have arrangements with the factory to produce as many CatNap as you need!
•  By purchasing the CatNap you contribute 5% of the CatNap price to the animal shelter “SECOND HOME”, because as we said we are going to make a donation of 5% from each contribution made here.
•  By buying our product you also help to recycle materials, which come to us as the leftovers from the textile production company. In other words, you go green!

The other ways you can help


If you do not have a cat at home, you are welcome to spread the word about our project to make others who have a cat at home know about us! By telling others about us you would implicitly work with us on our goals – not only to provide a professionally made product to a wide audience, but also to support those animals, which do not have a home yet because we are donating 5% of income from this project to the animal shelter in Latvia. Besides, telling about us would also mean that you are among those who are eager to make our planet cleaner!

Andrejs and Lydia were inspired by their own pets and saving the animal shelter.In 2014 animal shelter “Second home” started its activity and this organization was in search of charity foundations to build dog's kennels. Andrejs and Lydia decided to help and as a result in the animal shelter were installed first three dogs kennels.Since that time they are helping the shelter in different ways. Andrej and Lydia organised a fundraising company for place reconstruction, collecting feed for animals and run classes for children about how to take care of animals. In addition, they organise charity events and for their own wedding, instead of presents and gifts, they asked to bring some food for animals from the shelter.This shelter located in Demene settlement(Latvia) and give the roof for about 100 cats and dogs in the majority, however here they also help wild animals. Last year in this shelter was saved cormorant and little fox.Very important is that in this shelter doesn’t euthanise animals!Now Andrejs and Lydia decided to develop something useful and helpful for pets, moreover, it helps animals, which do not have a hosts yet. Our product “CatNap” will bring happiness to your fluffy friends and together we can help animals!Follow us on instagram and facebook. Even more! We are also committed to helping animals at animal shelters. We are ready to donate 5% from income to the animal shelter ""Otrā māja dzīvniekiem"" (“SECOND HOME”) in Latvia, which supports homeless animals and helps them to find a new home. (https://www.otramaja.lv/en/). You will be notified when the donation is made!That’s why we have come up with an idea to design a special CatNap, which would allow you, your family, and your pet to feel even more comfortable at your home.What you getBy supporting our project you invest in a cosy, stylish, and qualitative accessory for your cat. The standard CatNap comes in two random solid colour combination with a heating feature. However, you can choose your own colour of the CatNap at some higher price too! In case you are about making a present for a friend or you have not one, but two cats, you can order two CatNaps at once at a discounted price! There are two more options as well. One is to get a CatNap with the name of your cat embroidered on it, and the second is to get both – the CatNap of a particular colour and the embroidery of your cat’s name on it.We have tried our product on various cats and noticed that cats feel comfortable inside the CatNap and like staying in it for a long time. This cat`s bed brings you such benefits as:
it is easy to brush with a vacuum cleaner
the CatNap is suitable for washing
you can clean your house faster because your cat spends more time in one place!
it is more comfortable for you to work because your cat does not disturb you!
it makes your cat feel warm, what might be especially important during the cold seasons!

Meeting your demandWe have chosen the Flexible funding campaign because of our production facilities. This allows us to produce even less CatNaps that we have stated as our target. Of course, we would bear additional costs for producing less, but we still will supply all the funders with the orders after the end of the campaign, even if we do not reach the target amount of funding. However, we feel positive about the outcome and have also predicted the case of raising more money than the initial target sum. If this occurs, we have arrangements with the factory to produce as many CatNap as you need!
By purchasing the CatNap you contribute 5% of the CatNap price to the animal shelter “SECOND HOME”, because as we said we are going to make a donation of 5% from each contribution made here.
By buying our product you also help to recycle materials, which come to us as the leftovers from the textile production company. In other words, you go green!

The other ways you can helpIf you do not have a cat at home, you are welcome to spread the word about our project to make others who have a cat at home know about us! By telling others about us you would implicitly work with us on our goals – not only to provide a professionally made product to a wide audience, but also to support those animals, which do not have a home yet because we are donating 5% of income from this project to the animal shelter in Latvia. Besides, telling about us would also mean that you are among those who are eager to make our planet cleaner!",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

Full tang with a razor-sharp 15° blade angle each side

Double Bevel, suitable for left and right-hand people.
The mirror polished patterns are contrasted with the blasted Damascus patterns.
The beautiful combination of whole hammered and layered pattern blade will make you enjoy cooking much more even by looking.
A sharp knife does less damage to the cell walls of an onion, releasing less propanethial s-oxide, the irritant that causes you to cry.

column1: Vie Belles Luxury Pro 8"" Chef Knife provides a natural hold for left-handed or right-handed chefs. Each knife is handcrafted and takes a total of 100+ hours to make. Featuring an innovative new bolster shape for unrivaled comfort, balance, and safety without compromising the cutting edge.
• Handle is made from a solid piece of Cocobolo wood, which is very durable, and also resistant to insect attack, and black pure Micarta, mosaic pin and takes 32 hours to create!
• It comes with finger guard made of the grooved brass bolster.
• The sharp blade is made from VG-10 steel core, Damascus clad, 67 layers folded of SUS 430 Japan stainless steel
column2: full tang with a double bevel razor-sharp 15° blade angle each side, 61-62 Rockwell Hardness, double for a durable edge and takes 38 hours to craft.

column1: Soldering a stainless steel blade to a brass bolster is a difficult &
column2: time-consuming process. Only a skilled craftsman can achieve this level of standard. It was very important for us to add a grooved bolster to the knife in order to aid in thumb placement for a confident grip.

column1: Cocobolo: Most likely the wood most often used on custom knives, and with good reason. Cocobolo is incredibly hard, dense, and most of all, stunningly beautiful. The wood has streaks of black, purple, yellow, red, orange, brown and white. It’s simply an amazing wood. High oil content means the wood is very stable, even in damp or marine applications, as well as excelling in culinary uses. The woods oil content has the effect of killing off a variety of pathogens that end up on the surface, helping keep the handle sanitary.

column2: >

column1: From professional chefs to the most basic of cooking novices, genuine foodies know that the key to amazing meals comes with fresh ingredients and high-quality kitchen utensils.

BONUS

 

VIE BELLES EVERYDAY CUTTING BOARD
column3:
>

Inspired by modern art, our double-sided cutting board has been created with three types of wood to give its aesthetic appeal.

column1: • The construction is an end-grain butcher block made with Oregon black walnut, maple, and oak woods then top coated with an oiled, food safe finish.
• A magnetic strip runs down the center of the block to hold knives in place for ease of storage.
• The cutting board can be stowed away sitting on its flat surface, or on its side for space efficiency.

column2:
>

To prevent food from being stuck in the block, we have added an extra slot on the opposite end to help with air circulation and ease of cleaning. So go ahead and store your knives away... and if food gets lodged inside - give it a good knock, the particles will fall out!
column3:
>

A combination of professional chefs and master craftsmen have provided their expertise in the construction, design, and reliability of each cutting board.

360° View
column5:
>

Attention: We do not have any control over natural wood color. Natural wood vary in color over time, due to oxidation or exposure to oxygen.
column6:

REVIEW

We have tested our knife and cutting board with both professional chefs and home cooks to develop a product that feels intuitive for everyone. Tested, reviewed and approved by Chef Maryam Ghargharechi.
column7:
>

 

ABOUT VIE BELLES

We have no outside investors, no revenue goals, no PowerPoint presentations. That means it's just you, our brilliantly skilled suppliers, and us.
column8:
>

We get to focus on what we love to do: designing beautiful, innovative products for like-minded folks &
column9:
foodies.

We think crowdfunding is a better way to bring products to life, for companies, customers, and the world at large.

We also believe that Kickstarter is not just for starting a business, it’s for running a business and driving continued innovation. Why? Because it’s pure. It connects creators and inventors (like Vie Belles) directly with customers who share their passion (like our Kickstarter backers). As a 100% crowdfunded company, the only “board of directors” we listen to is our backer and customer base. We get to spend our time doing what we love - making stuff that improves people’s lives - and not spinning our wheels on PowerPoint decks to convince a room full of venture capitalists that we are hitting our revenue goals.
column12:
TAXES 

Shipping costs will be charged at the end of the campaign for accuracy and discounted shipping rates if applicable. 

DOMESTIC: If you're in the Canada, we'll be shipping your package out of our Vancouver fulfillment center using a ground service Canada Post or FedEx depending on destination and shipment size). These packages will have tracking information that will work within the Canada.

Note Canadian customers, the additional shipping costs may be higher than expected due to the inclusion of taxes for Canada.

INTERNATIONAL: Non-Canadian orders (International customers) are responsible for duties charged by their respective countries. Visit https://www.dutycalculator.com/ to calculate approximate duties.

Note that we cannot alter the value of your rewards on customs declarations - the value will be declared as the total value of the items contained in the shipment.

At this time our shipping partners are unable to ship to PO Boxes or APO/FPO military addresses so you will need to provide a street address. If you provide a PO Box or APO/FPO military address, it will delay shipment of your items.

Also, we cannot do direct pickups of rewards. Our shipping system is highly automated and designed to get large quantities of product to people quickly and accurately, but it is not designed for manual pick-up.

LIMITED WARRANTY 

All Vie Belles products carry a limited lifetime guarantee. In order to uphold our quality standards, each Vie Belles® cutlery is backed by a limited lifetime warranty designed specifically to protect against any defects in workmanship or material. 

Lifetime sharpening and protecting service are not included in this warranty. 

We will not warranty products due to loss, damage caused by abuse, neglect, misuse, accident, improper blade sharpening or dis-assembly. Certain foods are too hard to be cut with a knife and should be avoided such as frozen items, bones, shellfish shells, hard squashes, hard cheeses, nut shells, blocks of chocolate, etc. Defective knives will be replaced, repaired, or refunded at our discretion.

RETURN POLICY 

While all of our products are guaranteed for life, we, unfortunately, do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Kickstarter rewards. 

The support we get from our Indiegogo backers is what enables us to run and grow our business, gather customer feedback, design new products and improve existing ones. In the Kickstarter community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as ""rewards"" because they are not purchases in the traditional sense. They are gifts - in our case, cutlery products - that are sent to our supporters as a token of appreciation for their support of our business. 

HOW TO BACK

Become a backer of this project and pick a perk. You will essentially be pre-ordering one of our new cutlery products. You'll get a special backer discount, and receive our products before it is available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check out All Rewards. 

How to back

column1: • Choose a perk level to back this project! You will receive items stated in details. We have 11 reward levels to pick from.
• Note that you can order multiple items by doubling/tripling/etc the amount you increase your pledge by.
• If there is a product you don't see on the menu but wish to add-on, inquire with us and we will work something out after our campaign ends.

All details like shipping information and other specifics will be collected after this campaign has ended. [After the campaign has ended, all backers will receive a form to complete which entails shipping address, sales tax (if the destination address is in Canada), shipping charges and all other details &

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is Vie Belles Kickstarter project. We launched over 30 products in the last 5 years and we've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders for our customers. We've also been blindsided more than once by completely unexpected issues and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our supporters.

Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make when we say we'll make it. But know what? Sometimes 10 shipping containers of product get stuck outside a shipyard for 4 weeks. We pad our schedule for this kind of things, but sometimes not enough.

Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.

This is WYPE
column3:
>

 

WYPE is a totally new type of floor cleaner than can absorb liquids and brush up solids at the same time. Cracked eggs, cereal and milk, fries, and ketchup, it all disappears inside the patented absorbent roller leaving nothing but a clean streak behind.
column4:
> 

 

The best part, WYPE even cleans itself. A clever base station flushes out dirt and debris, separates liquid from solids, and recharges WYPE at the same time. WYPE is designed to make daily life just that extra bit better by saving you time on chores every day.
column6:
dry cleaning at the same time

Take shaving or cutting your hair (hello quarantine bangs). You've got hairs, shaving cream, and maybe a bit of water on the floor. Do you mop that up? Gross, no. Do you grab the vacuum? Nope, that can't handle liquids. So what do you do? 

Simple, you clean it up with one WYPE.
column7:
> 

And it works on any hard floor type, not just tiles or concrete. WYPE loves to clean up your hardwood floors too.
column8:
> 

WYPE loves eating as much as we do, just look at it go on a full plate of spilled spaghetti with tomato sauce.
column9:
> 

Putting WYPE to the test

WYPE handles your everyday situations like a pro. Has dealing with your pet's fur becomes an epic battle? No need, just see how easy it is to clean your pet's stray fur.

column1: No more fumbling with a broom and a mop during kitchen spills. One WYPE is all it takes.
column2: >
column3:
>
 

Even long hairs are no match for WYPE.

column2:
>

The secret: a unique absorbent roller 

The reason WYPE is able to absorb and clean at the same time is that we engineered a patented, absorbent roller using advanced, environmentally-friendly materials.

The outer layer of the roller is what we call a fast-absorption layer with liquid lock, meaning it quickly absorbs and locks liquids.
column3:
>

 

The outer layer consists of a semi-permeable polymer membrane, meaning it can both absorb and expel liquids. The second layer absorbs liquids and locks them in to prevent any leaks and finally, there's an elastic composite material that makes the roller squishy so it can pick up larger items.
column4:
>

 

Inside there’s a secondary brush roller, which moves in the opposite direction, depositing all the guck into the spillproof container.
column5:
>
 

 Underneath is a rubber wiper that makes your floors come out squeaky clean, leaving nothing behind but a fresh bit of water infused with your favorite floor cleaner.

>Self-cleaning station

WYPE doesn’t just clean your floors, it also cleans itself. A mop’s bucket is probably the grossest part of the whole ordeal because you’re constantly double-dipping your mop in the same water. 

That’s why we invented the self-cleaning station, it’s basically the most advanced bucket ever made that keeps clean and dirty water in separate tanks while also cleaning and charging WYPE at the same time, all with one press of a button.

column1: The self-cleaning station can be easily lifted and filled with water plus your favorite floor cleaner. When you put WYPE back after a clean, the station pumps clean water into WYPE, spins the rollers, and flushes out any dirt and debris, leaving WYPE sanitary and clean ready for the next job.
column2:
> 

Because we know the reality of a household with running kids and clumsy husbands, we’ve made a trip-proof charging cable. It’s magnetic, just like you might have seen on Macbooks, so if someone trips, the station won’t be knocked over.
column3:
> 

Dual tank technology

The biggest issue with a mop is that you always double-dip in a dirty bucket. That's why we've created separate clean and dirty water tanks that ensure you're never pushing dirt around.
column4:
> 

Quiet, lightweight and ultra-flexible

One of the best things about WYPE is that it’s cordless, lightweight, and quiet. Because it’s charging in the station, it’s always ready to go, and you’ll get a good 60 minutes of cleaning on a single charge.
column5:
>

 

It folds fully flat for those hard-to-reach places underneath furniture.

 

 

 

Allergy-free cleaning

If you suffer from allergies, the tools that are meant to clean your house can become your worst enemy. Air-based vacuum cleaners, even fancy robots, blow dirty air out with incredible force, surrounding your in a cloud of fine dust particles. And have you ever seen the dust cloud when you empty your vacuum? Yuk!

Wype is different because the technology is air-free, the moist roller makes dust stick to it, rather than suck it up. The self-cleaning station flushes it out with water making it completely harmless and keeping it out of the air forever.
column7:
> 

 

 

Replacement parts

Do you want to stock up on replacement parts? We'll offer an accessory pack after the campaign! When the campaign closes, we'll send out a survey, asking for your address, and in that same email, we'll offer you the chance to add a full accessory pack for just USD$19.99.
column9:
> 

Why are we on Indiegogo?

 

We have successfully funded WYPE on Kickstarter, raising over $200,000 in just one month, and because so many people still want to get their hands on WYPE we moved to Indiegogo InDemand. Here you'll get the last chance to snag WYPE at a price that's below retail. If you back us on Indiegogo you'll be the first in the world to get WYPE, and this offer will never return.

column1: Behow is a startup focused on reinventing how we clean. Our mission is to make cleaning easier and better by applying radical engineering to something the entire world agrees on: cleaning sucks. Because we don’t just want to reinvent another iteration of the same flawed product, our slogan is simple: Behow, Next Level Clean.
column4:
VAT are covered by us!

Back WYPE with peace of mind, knowing that you won't get any unexpected taxes or fees when receiving WYPE. We're covering all VAT, fees, and customs clearance for the countries listed below.
column5:
>

 

Press inquiries?

Kindly email pierre.laffite@yg-consultancy.com for more information and review units, or download the full press-kit here.
column6: > ","This is WYPE   WYPE is a totally new type of floor cleaner than can absorb liquids and brush up solids at the same time. Cracked eggs, cereal and milk, fries, and ketchup, it all disappears inside the patented absorbent roller leaving nothing but a clean streak behind.     The best part, WYPE even cleans itself. A clever base station flushes out dirt and debris, separates liquid from solids, and recharges WYPE at the same time. WYPE is designed to make daily life just that extra bit better by saving you time on chores every day.     Wet & dry cleaning at the same timeTake shaving or cutting your hair (hello quarantine bangs). You've got hairs, shaving cream, and maybe a bit of water on the floor. Do you mop that up? Gross, no. Do you grab the vacuum? Nope, that can't handle liquids. So what do you do? Simple, you clean it up with one WYPE. And it works on any hard floor type, not just tiles or concrete. WYPE loves to clean up your hardwood floors too.   WYPE loves eating as much as we do, just look at it go on a full plate of spilled spaghetti with tomato sauce.  Putting WYPE to the testWYPE handles your everyday situations like a pro. Has dealing with your pet's fur becomes an epic battle? No need, just see how easy it is to clean your pet's stray fur.

column1: No more fumbling with a broom and a mop during kitchen spills. One WYPE is all it takes.   Even long hairs are no match for WYPE.

What people think The secret: a unique absorbent roller The reason WYPE is able to absorb and clean at the same time is that we engineered a patented, absorbent roller using advanced, environmentally-friendly materials.The outer layer of the roller is what we call a fast-absorption layer with liquid lock, meaning it quickly absorbs and locks liquids.   The outer layer consists of a semi-permeable polymer membrane, meaning it can both absorb and expel liquids. The second layer absorbs liquids and locks them in to prevent any leaks and finally, there's an elastic composite material that makes the roller squishy so it can pick up larger items.  Inside there’s a secondary brush roller, which moves in the opposite direction, depositing all the guck into the spillproof container.  Underneath is a rubber wiper that makes your floors come out squeaky clean, leaving nothing behind but a fresh bit of water infused with your favorite floor cleaner.

Self-cleaning stationWYPE doesn’t just clean your floors, it also cleans itself. A mop’s bucket is probably the grossest part of the whole ordeal because you’re constantly double-dipping your mop in the same water. That’s why we invented the self-cleaning station, it’s basically the most advanced bucket ever made that keeps clean and dirty water in separate tanks while also cleaning and charging WYPE at the same time, all with one press of a button.

The self-cleaning station can be easily lifted and filled with water plus your favorite floor cleaner. When you put WYPE back after a clean, the station pumps clean water into WYPE, spins the rollers, and flushes out any dirt and debris, leaving WYPE sanitary and clean ready for the next job.   Because we know the reality of a household with running kids and clumsy husbands, we’ve made a trip-proof charging cable. It’s magnetic, just like you might have seen on Macbooks, so if someone trips, the station won’t be knocked over. Dual tank technologyThe biggest issue with a mop is that you always double-dip in a dirty bucket. That's why we've created separate clean and dirty water tanks that ensure you're never pushing dirt around.   Quiet, lightweight and ultra-flexibleOne of the best things about WYPE is that it’s cordless, lightweight, and quiet. Because it’s charging in the station, it’s always ready to go, and you’ll get a good 60 minutes of cleaning on a single charge.  It folds fully flat for those hard-to-reach places underneath furniture.   Allergy-free cleaningIf you suffer from allergies, the tools that are meant to clean your house can become your worst enemy. Air-based vacuum cleaners, even fancy robots, blow dirty air out with incredible force, surrounding your in a cloud of fine dust particles. And have you ever seen the dust cloud when you empty your vacuum? Yuk!Wype is different because the technology is air-free, the moist roller makes dust stick to it, rather than suck it up. The self-cleaning station flushes it out with water making it completely harmless and keeping it out of the air forever.Rewards   Replacement partsDo you want to stock up on replacement parts? We'll offer an accessory pack after the campaign! When the campaign closes, we'll send out a survey, asking for your address, and in that same email, we'll offer you the chance to add a full accessory pack for just USD$19.99.  Why are we on Indiegogo? We have successfully funded WYPE on Kickstarter, raising over $200,000 in just one month, and because so many people still want to get their hands on WYPE we moved to Indiegogo InDemand. Here you'll get the last chance to snag WYPE at a price that's below retail. If you back us on Indiegogo you'll be the first in the world to get WYPE, and this offer will never return.  Specs

Because we don’t just want to reinvent another iteration of the same flawed product, our slogan is simple: Behow, Next Level Clean.   Timeline   Tax, duties & VAT are covered by us!Back WYPE with peace of mind, knowing that you won't get any unexpected taxes or fees when receiving WYPE. We're covering all VAT, fees, and customs clearance for the countries listed below. Press inquiries?Kindly email pierre.laffite@yg-consultancy.com for more information and review units, or download the full press-kit here.",26.0,3,"1 Campaign

The Sparkle Paper Saver Notebook is a zero waste notebook, reusing the back blank sides of your used paper as pages of the notebook. 

With a functionally-designed spring steel binder inside to insert and hold the used paper, you can conveniently access the blank sides as pages of your Sparkle Paper Saver Notebook. With an endless supply of used paper for pages, you can say goodbye to unnecessary new notebooks.  

With bright, sparkly canvas covers, the Sparkle Paper Saver is a unique way for kids and adults alike to collect used paper to draw and write on, reduce waste, and understand how easily sustainable living can be applied to everyday activities. 

The Sparkle Paper Saver aims to help you to not only reduce waste, but to develop a deeper understanding of the environmental impact. Most people are environmentally aware, but what the Paper Saver wants to achieve is to turn that basic awareness into conscious decisions about sustainable everyday practices and making sustainability a regular habit.

With the current recycling crisis reiterating the challenges we still face against climate change, it is imperative we change our wasteful habits now and lead the way for our next generation in how we manage environmental issues.  Sustainable living must form part of our everyday life now.

Our global recycling crisis is a great example of good intentions gone wrong when improperly planned. As adults of today and tomorrow, we need to better our current efforts to save our planet. 

We can make sustainable, less wasteful choices for ourselves and our kids so they can learn by example. By creating teaching moments through everyday activities, they can learn behavior and become our future sustainability leaders.

The Sparkle Paper Saver Notebook reuses the back blank sides of your used paper as pages of the notebook, reducing waste, in three simple steps:

1. Collect a pile of the used papers (old printouts from work, spreadsheets, drafts, bills, itineraries, used coloring and activity sheets, school notices, letters, etc.)

2. Fold the papers in half

3. Insert papers through the functionally-designed binder, which is made of spring steel to ease the paper insertion, yet durable and strong enough to secure all the paper.

The Environmental Awareness Woven Stickers supports the Sparkle Paper Saver by denoting different environmental issues with fun designs, and created to be applied anywhere - the Paper Saver, phone covers, bags, etc. - so these environmental issues stay top-of-mind and act as conversation starters as you take them out and about.

The Paper Saver Organizer encompasses a pencil case, three cardholders, and a pocket for documents and other accessories.  Inserted through the Sparkle Paper Saver’s steel binder under the used paper, the Organizer ensures nothing is left behind again when you are constantly on-the-go. 

The Paper Saver Organizer also fits into the existing range of Classic Paper Saver Notebooks.

The Paper Saver started in Melbourne, Australia, in 2015 with the simple goal to reduce paper waste. Designed by architect Jon Yong, he and his wife Michelle Lee are now parents with the desire for their two young children to grow up in a sustainable world. Driven by this, the Paper Saver aims to promote environmental awareness and sustainable living.

column3: >Now you have the chance to pre-order unseen products by young Finnish designers from the first manufactured and numbered batch. Young Finnish Design aims to develop a service for young Finnish designers to manufacture and find customers for their products.​The compensation for your contribution is the product which is being campaigned. In this campaign the compensation is Airy design lamp by a young designer Heidi Huovinen from Finland. Heidi is also a co-founder of Young Finnish Design !
column4: >Your contribution is important. When you contribute you choose which design products should be manufactured. When we reach our target amount in Indiegogo we will start manufacturing. If we don´t reach the target amount in Indiegogo we will refund your contribution in full.
column7: >  Airy table lamp is designed by a young Finnish design duo HE Design Helsinki
column10:
>  ""We are furniture designers from Aalto University, Helsinki Finland and we are also the founders of Young Finnish Design ! Through our own experience when showcasing our own prototypes in international design fairs in New York, London and Helsinki, we noticed that young Finnish designers lack the skills and money to manufacture and sell their products. We are the designers of the first campaign product Airy table lamp. Testing crowdfunding in Indiegogo with our own product is valuable for the upcoming campaigns for other young designers' products. 
We want to make sure our service is reliable and that we are able to deliver good quality products to our customers."" 
- Heidi &

column1:
For our Airy campaign video, we had a unique chance to collaborate with indie rock band  INVOLVERS and have their newest song Haunted on our video. We wish to collaborate with influencers and talents from various fields to combine design with everyday life happenings and phenomena.
Thank you INVOLVERS ♥ You can listen to their new song Haunted through this link:
column6: >  Young Finnish Design lets the customers decide which products will be manufactured. We have a manufacturing contract with Innojok Oy, a certified lighting manufacturer in Finland.
column7:
>We are two designers from Finland and through our own experience we noticed that many young designers are struggling with the same issues which are producing and selling their products. It takes a lot of money, time, experience and contacts to develop, manufacture, market and sell a design product and deliver it to customers.
♥ Our aim is to solve this issue for as many designers as possible ♥
column8: >Young designers from Finland, such as we ourselves, display their newest prototypes in design fairs every year in Milan, Stockholm, New York, Finland and UK in the hope of finding a manufacturer and visibility for their prototypes. Simultaneously the most known and established design media publish images and articles of young Finnish designers and their prototypes. In most cases this publicity doesn´t turn into the end result of manufacturing and sales which is what the young designers are looking for.
column11: >  Airy table lamp comes in white colour. Aluminium is powder painted white.
column13: >  Airy table lamp creates beautiful, angular shades of light in front of and around the lamp.
column15:
> We need your help to bring prototypes into life through crowdfunding. 
We bring the coolest new designs and customers around the same table in Indiegogo and we let the customers choose by contributing to our campaigns which products they would like to have at their homes. When we reach the target amount in Indiegogo we can start manufacturing the products. 
Our aim is to help young designers to find a manufacturer for their prototypes and sell their designs online in Indiegogo. Our products are furniture, lighting and interior design products. Stay tuned also for our upcoming campaigns.
column17: >We are working together with professional manufacturers inside EU and we will start manufacturing when the target amount is reached. This is because before the Indiegogo-campaign we need to know that the manufacturer is able to produce the products we are offering here in Indiegogo.
column19:
>

column28:
>We work hard for our campaign, because we believe in the product we are offering for you. We invest in marketing, photographing, videographing and editing. We also invest a lot of time to find the best manufacturers for our products. 
We believe that all of our campaign products deserve to be manufactured and delivered to the customers who have contributed so that the prototypes will come to life.
