column2: >We discovered cold brew coffee a few years ago and instantly fell in love with it.  Soon after, we found out about cold drip (aka dutch coffee, kyoto coffee) and fell in love with it even more! Although cold drip uses cold water to brew coffee just like other regular ‘tea bag style’ cold brew, we concluded that the drip method provided the best flavor that you cannot taste with any other brew method.
column3: >We soon realized that although there are numerous ‘tea bag style’ cold brewers on the market, there were very few true cold drip brewers and they were all too expensive. So we made it our mission to make one for ourselves.
column4: >We had a pretty successful initial launch last year in a select market. With valuable user feedback and experience, we have made some improvements from our first model and now we are trying to launch our upgraded version on the US market for the first time.
column5: >We have lined up our suppliers and manufacturers that we have worked with for our initial model all ready to go and we just need your help to bring BeanPlus into the mass production stage!
column9: >Unlike regular cold brewers that employ the ‘tea bag method’ (immersion of coffee grind in a water container), BeanPlus Cold Drip Brewer utilizes the ‘drip method’ that is also known as the ‘dutch coffee’ or ‘kyoto coffee’ brewing method. Although both methods are cold brew that yields smooth, less acidic, flavorful coffee, the ‘drip method’ has 3 distinct advantages over regular ‘tea bag method’ cold brew:

column2: >Cold drip offers richer, more complex, and full bodied flavor that you cannot taste with any other brewing method.
>Cold drip requires only 4 hours of minimum brewing time compared to minimum of 12 hours for tea bag method.
>Cold drip method requires much less coffee grounds than tea bag method when brewing coffee.

>Previously, there have been dutch coffee or kyoto coffee brewers out in the market but the cost was well over a few hundred dollars. BeanPlus Cold Drip Brewer is the only true cold drip brewer that is also affordable.
column6: >The Cold Drip Brewer creates delicious cold brew coffee through its patented slow drip valve. Create your perfect cup of coffee by adjusting the valve to achieve your desired strength. Unlike other brewers on the market, Beanplus adjusts water drip rate through the water filter rather than adjusting size of the drip hole, ensuring a consistent drip rate to produce ultimate flavor satisfaction.
column9: >Non Clogging Drip Mechanism + Water Filter
column10: >Crafted with a unique built-in water filter that enables the system to purify your water while regulating the drip speed to achieve a completely constant drip rate from beginning to end. This thereby prevents any blockage of the valve allowing hassle-free brewing and maximized quality of taste.
column14: >Its seamless design inhibits outside dust and particles from contaminating your coffee while maintaining sound air circulation and consistent brew temperature within the machine. Cold Drip’s exceptionally attractive interface fits perfectly into any kitchen environment
column18: >Effortless Setup for Everyday Use
column19: >Simplest cold drip system for the most sophisticated taste buds
column21: >Easy to Use, Easier to Clean
column22: >All of its parts disassemble within seconds for easy cleaning. Carafe and Stainless steel coffee basket is even dishwasher safe!
column24: >Compact and Portable for on-the-go Use
column25: >Its compact structure allows you to take your BeanPlus with you on-the-go anywhere you desire! Easily stow it in your bag and savor the taste of fresh cold brew at you favorite vacation spot. Even detach the glass carafe from the system to save and store your freshly brewed coffee for later in the refrigerator!
column27: >Reinforced Glass for Ultimate Durability
column28: >Made from the finest glass makes for a device resistant to high-heat exposure and cracking. Its durable nature ensures BeanPlus brew you excellent coffee for years.
column30: >Combining Environmental Concern with Cold Brew Perfection
column31: >Developed with the environment in mind, the Cold Drip Brewer has been crafted using sustainable materials and even requires absolutely no electricity!
column47: >1. How is drip cold brew different from immersion cold brew?
column48: >Drip method Cold Brew brings out more complex, layered flavors than tea bag method as well as requiring less time to brew and less amount of coffee grounds.
column49: >2. How long does the water filter last?
column50: >Recommendation is that you change the filter after 10 uses or when color of the filter starts to change. However, we were able to use them everyday for 2-3 weeks by using already filtered water.
column51: >3. Why do you need two coffee filters?
column52: >The coffee filter on top of the coffee grounds evenly spreads water drops throughout coffee grounds, and the coffee filter at the bottom of coffee basket actually filters the coffee. The bottom filter can be permanently replaced with a stainless steel filter which is included in our premium package.
column53:
>4. What is a breathable lid? Do I get two lids?
Our carafe lids have 2 different kinds of valves that can be exchanged. You get one lid but you can install either valve that would fit your usage. Installing valves are quick and easy.

-The doctor said to me, “Because of the nerve damage, you’re going to have to learn how walk again.""  Pretty scary thing to hear someone say, especially when he’s looking right at YOU.  Yes, you do think…”Me?”
Not to mention by trade I'm a STAND UP COMIC!  Kind of breaks down that title doesn't it.
Now I'm a... ""If He Can Stand Up- Comic""

I started my physical therapy mid 2011 at Rancho Los Amigos Medical Center with some of the greatest physical therapists on earth.  They got me through the scariest most difficult time of my life.  (Not including performing at Betty's Fireside in New Jersey) I feel as though I’m now at about 45% back!!! Today, I'm out of the wheelchair and actually up and walking with a cane and I truly owe them my life.  After going through an experience that can only be summed up as indescribable and dragging my family through hell I want to give SOMETHING BACK!!!

column2: >Our goal is to raise money for new equipment in the Physical Therapy Gym.  They have a bizarre mix of cutting edge equipment along with some machines from the 60's.

column1: On May 18th the hospital is putting on a 5k Run/Walk/Roll Around the Grounds.  (Yes I’m going to do it.  Last year I participated but finished last.  Seriously, dead last!  THIS YEAR, STEP ASIDE!)

We are planning to present the new equipment on that day so anything you could contribute before than would be greatly appreciated.  If we don't make our deadline of May 18th, we will continue this campaign for the full 60 days in order to give the maximum charity to these deserving therapists and patients.
While any amount you contribute automatically makes you a humanitarian and that should feel good enough, here's what you are actually doing with as little as $10 or as much as $1000.
*  Making the job easier for the most selfless people I know.
*  Enhancing and speeding recovery for discouraged and at times hopeless patients.

*  Literally helping people gain back any amount of their independence. From brushing their teeth or feeding themselves, to walking or driving again.  As mundane as brushing their hair to as private as using the bathroom, this is what you are helping to accomplish.

column2: permission we would have filmed this whole journey.  But we will video our walk and donation to the people at Rancho on May 18th and will let everyone know when it is posted so that you can see the joy and feel the gratification of helping these people.

column1: Some people just can’t contribute money, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

*  The power of word of mouth is more effective than we give credit to.  Word of mouth is exactly what reaches the masses.  You never know who has had an experience similar or who this will touch.  Please share this with everyone you know. Don't be shy.
*  Use the Indiegogo Share tool, Facebook, your regular email, Twitter or just flat out talk about it.  Like all day, just go around talking about it.  That helps.  :)

column2: on behalf of all the therapists and patients and their family members at Rancho Los Amigos Medical Center.

column1: -The doctor said to me, “Because of the nerve damage, you’re going to have to learn how walk again.""  Pretty scary thing to hear someone say, especially when he’s looking right at YOU.  Yes, you do think…”Me?”
Not to mention by trade I'm a STAND UP COMIC!  Kind of breaks down that title doesn't it.
Now I'm a... ""If He Can Stand Up- Comic""

I started my physical therapy mid 2011 at Rancho Los Amigos Medical Center with some of the greatest physical therapists on earth.  They got me through the scariest most difficult time of my life.  (Not including performing at Betty's Fireside in New Jersey) I feel as though I’m now at about 45% back!!! Today, I'm out of the wheelchair and actually up and walking with a cane and I truly owe them my life.  After going through an experience that can only be summed up as indescribable and dragging my family through hell I want to give SOMETHING BACK!!!
Our goal is to raise money for new equipment in the Physical Therapy Gym.  They have a bizarre mix of cutting edge equipment along with some machines from the 60's.
On May 18th the hospital is putting on a 5k Run/Walk/Roll Around the Grounds.  (Yes I’m going to do it.  Last year I participated but finished last.  Seriously, dead last!  THIS YEAR, STEP ASIDE!)

We are planning to present the new equipment on that day so anything you could contribute before than would be greatly appreciated.  If we don't make our deadline of May 18th, we will continue this campaign for the full 60 days in order to give the maximum charity to these deserving therapists and patients.
While any amount you contribute automatically makes you a humanitarian and that should feel good enough, here's what you are actually doing with as little as $10 or as much as $1000.
*  Making the job easier for the most selfless people I know.
*  Enhancing and speeding recovery for discouraged and at times hopeless patients.

*  Literally helping people gain back any amount of their independence. From brushing their teeth or feeding themselves, to walking or driving again.  As mundane as brushing their hair to as private as using the bathroom, this is what you are helping to accomplish.

Had we had more forethought & permission we would have filmed this whole journey.  But we will video our walk and donation to the people at Rancho on May 18th and will let everyone know when it is posted so that you can see the joy and feel the gratification of helping these people.
Some people just can’t contribute money, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

*  The power of word of mouth is more effective than we give credit to.  Word of mouth is exactly what reaches the masses.  You never know who has had an experience similar or who this will touch.  Please share this with everyone you know. Don't be shy.
*  Use the Indiegogo Share tool, Facebook, your regular email, Twitter or just flat out talk about it.  Like all day, just go around talking about it.  That helps.  :)
Tom Ayers, Nicole Rayburn, & on behalf of all the therapists and patients and their family members at Rancho Los Amigos Medical Center.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>Head over to http://www.jibo.com for the latest on Jibo.

BACKERS:
Stay up-to-date on all things Jibo at our blog: blog.jibo.com

UPDATE: Your interest and outreach has continued to amaze us, so we are going to offer the opportunity to once again pre-order JIBO.  
Pre-Order your JIBO now for $749, inclusive of battery and charging plate, with the SDK available for developers. Orders will begin to be fulfilled starting in the April/May 2016 timeframe on a first-ordered, first-received basis.

Thanks to everyone who contributed to Jibo's campaign being the #1 Most Successful Technology Campaign on Indiegogo in Summer 2014.  There will be 4,800 Jibo social robots making their way to homes across the globe.  Over a quarter of those are going to developers, to build Jibo Skills for their own pleasure as well as the Jibo Store.
 

 

Meet JIBO, the World's First Social Robot for the Home

 

""JIBO's potential extends far beyond engaging in casual conversation and completing daily tasks."" - Katie Couric, Yahoo News

""A Robot with a Little Humanity"" - John Markoff, New York Times

""JIBO isn't an appliance, it's a companion, one that can interact and react with its human owners in ways that delight instead of disturb."" - Lance Ulanoff, Mashable

""Move over, Siri, the JIBO robot is coming"" - Maggie Lake, CNN

""This Friendly Robot Could One Day Be Your Family's Personal Assistant"" - Christina Bonnington, WIRED

 

 

JIBO: Available in White or Black

JIBO is available in White or Black. Pick your JIBO's color when you order. 

Helpful for Everyone

JIBO is the perfect robot for everyone in the family. Because JIBO is an open platform, his skills and applications will grow, helping and entertaining in ways we we haven’t yet imagined. We are so looking forward to seeing what JIBO developers build!

 

How JIBO Works

 

Setup

• Learn what you can ask JIBO to do

The JIBO Store

Chief Scientist

Pioneer of Social Robotics and MIT Professor, JIBO Inc. brings her vision and deep expertise to the world.

Executive Chairman

Highly experienced business executive, formerly with Nuance and Polycom. Brought innovative, high-experience consumer technologies to global markets.

VP Engineering

Experienced technical executive, formerly with Apple, Netflix, and Danger/Microsoft. Has delivered new hardware-software platform experiences and ecosystems in consumer technology.

Adam Craft
VP Manufacturing and Operations

Extensive experience leading China-based manufacturing initiatives and global supply chain coordination. Formerly with Hasbro, iRobot, and Dragon Innovation.

Jeri Asher 
EVP Business Development

Serial entrepreneur and business executive. Deep expertise in bringing health-based technologies to the home.

Blade Kotelly
VP Design

Leading product designer. On MIT's design-thinking faculty. Has created the user-experience for a wide variety of technologies from pagers to speech recognition to search.

Matt Revis
VP Product Management

Nearly fifteen years at Nuance working on speech technology and artificial intelligence, creating human-machine interfaces for the worlds' leading devices.

column1:

VP Marketing and Developer Network

Marketing leader. Most recently CMO at Twilio with a focus on developers. On faculty at Stanford teaching entrepreneurship.

Measuring at about 11 inches tall and weighing approximately 6 pounds, JIBO is the perfect size to have an attention-worthy presence in a room, but easy enough to move about your house. 

JIBO's striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.

2 color stereo cameras
360° sound localization
upper body touch sensors

Developer Tools

The JIBO Developer Edition comes with a full SDK. If you are interested in developing new skills (robot applications) for the JIBO Store, the SDK is your route there.  The SDK will be available in advance of your robot shipping, so start jotting those ideas down.

JIBO Developer Support
With the purchase of the JIBO Developer Edition, you will be enrolled in the JIBO Developer Program and have direct access to support and advice from our team. With the purchase of any JIBO, anyone can have access to the JIBO Forum, where you will receive additional information, support, and updates from the JIBO community.

The JIBO SDK includes:

  • - Animation Tools that give developers control over JIBO's movements and displays
    - Timeline Tools that give developers the ability to sequence and combine animations
    - Behavior Tools that give developers the ability to control how JIBO engages and responds to people
    - A Visual Simulator that gives developers the ability to create and observe more basic animations, timelines and behaviors without an actual robot.

For further information on the JIBO SDK, visit the FAQ or see our blog at: blog.jibo.com
 

Shipping

Where do we ship?
At this time Jibo is available in the US &
column2:
Canada. All Jibos use US American-accented English. Support of other languages and accents will come in the future.

 

When we start shipping*
JIBO InDemand pre- orders will begin to be fulfilled in 2017 timeframe on a first-ordered, first- received basis. JIBO, Inc. will keep you notified of your JIBO ship date.

 

FAQ

 

It looks too good to be true. Is this for real?
We have an amazing team to make Jibo a reality! While not everything in the video will necessarily be there at launch, the JIBO skills described above are part of the core skill set. And, because of the rich platform and ecosystem we're building, everything in the video beyond the core skills will be possible -- and more! With our developer community, we will continue to improve the product and add new and exciting features over time.

I preordered a JIBO, but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?
Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact us at support@jibo.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

When will my JIBO ship?
JIBO InDemand pre-orders will begin to be fulfilled in the late October 2016 timeframe on a first-ordered, first-received basis. JIBO, Inc. will keep you notified of your JIBO ship date.

Where Does JIBO Ship?
We currently ship to the US &
column3:
Canada, EU (all 28 countries). All JIBO's use US American-accented English. Support of other languages and accents will come in the future. 

What can I do with the JIBO Network?
Through the devices in your JIBO Network, you can send fun voice messages and texts brought to life with expression packs, share photos and videos, set reminders, interact with others via telepresence, visit the store, or add new skills or content to JIBO -- wherever you are!

Does JIBO walk or have wheels? Where should I place him?
No. The best spot to place him is where most of your household activities happen (like in your kitchen or the family room), or where you expect you'll want JIBO's companionship and assistance the most.  He's a member of the family and is at his best when he is with you.

Is JIBO a male or a female?
JIBO is gendered male.

Can I name him something other than JIBO?
​Not yet. In the current release you have to use the name JIBO to address him. Future updates may allow for the possibility to give your JIBO a new name of your choice.

What languages does JIBO support? When will he speak other languages?
JIBO will understand US American-accented English when he comes to your home. Over time, JIBO will be able to communicate in other languages in the future.  We will keep the community posted.

Do I need a WiFi network?
Yes. You must have Jibo connected to a WiFi network for JIBO to work.

How do I charge JIBO?
JIBO comes with an AC charging supply that works with 110/220V.  Jibo ships with a user-replaceable battery, and you will be able to order additional batteries as accessories. JIBO is designed to run for 30 minutes on battery power.

What kind of batteries does JIBO take?
It will be a battery pack available as an accessory.

How tall is JIBO? How heavy?
JIBO will be about 11"" tall, with a 6"" base. We estimate JIBO will be about 5 lbs, without the battery accessory.

Does it work with iOS and Android Devices or my computer?
Yes. JIBO will have his own mobile app that is compatible with iOS and Android devices. He also has a web interface so you can interact via computer.

When will accessories be available for JIBO?
You can purchase a number of accessories on the JIBO Store when it launches. This includes functional accessories as well as fun cosmetic items that allow you to customize the appearance of your JIBO.  We will keep you posted on the store's opening.

Will there be apps available for JIBO?
JIBO apps are called Skills. You will be able to purchase these from the JIBO Store, as they become available. JIBO will also come with a number of core skills free of charge. These may include JiboSnap, JiboWatch, JiboMeet, JiboJot, and JiboStory.

When does the JIBO Store open?
We will let you know as soon as the store opens. We are excited about its launch. Developers will be able to submit skills or applications for certification in advance. All skills or applications must be certified by JIBO, Inc.

What programming language to I need to know?
The JIBO SDK requires knowledge of the JavaScript programming language.

How do I get information and support as a developer?
When you pre-order a developer edition JIBO, you will be automatically enrolled in the JIBO Developer Program. There will also be information posted on the JIBO blog. Dedicated members of our team will provide additional support to those enrolled in the JIBO Developer Program. We want to make your JIBO Skills and digital assets come to life and are committed to working with you to make our develper tools and support truly great.

Is the software open source?
The software is built on top of Linux (which is, of course, open source), but the JIBO subsystem will remain closed and proprietary for the time being. This is an area that we'll continue to look at and evaluate.

Can I back-up my JIBO?
There is no need to ""back-up"" JIBO since JIBO is an always-connected device that automatically stores its data in the JIBO cloud. If your JIBO ever needs to be replaced, once you connect your new JIBO to your account, it'll automatically have all the ""knowledge"" and skills that your old JIBO had.

How is my privacy protected?
Guarding our users' privacy is something we take very seriously. We work hard to protect your information from unauthorized access and have designed policies and controls to safeguard the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.

How secure is this?
JIBO uses SSL encryption to secure personal data sent to and from the cloud
column4: JIBO uses 256-bit AES encryption in the cloud
column5:
and digital certificates are used to authenticate devices.

How does JIBO respect my privacy?
A combination of technology and company policies are used to protect users privacy. JIBO complies with FTC Bureau of Consumer Protection guidelines including the Children’s Online Privacy and Protection Act (COPPA).  Company policies ensure that JIBO only collects data it needs, keeps it safe, and retains it only as long as necessary. A company security officer reviews security of all customer data at all phases of use.  JIBO employs industry standard best practices regarding the way data is stored and transferred. Passwords are stored using cryptographic one-way hash functions. This ensures that nobody, even the company security officer, can ever gain access to a users’ password.

How does JIBO respect my privacy?
You can tell JIBO to go to sleep, and in that mode the camera is off. JIBO will only wake up when you ask him to.

Can someone watch or listen to me?
JIBO robots have cameras and microphones that are used to interact with users and to provide the photography and messaging applications. There is no way for a remote user to enable the camera or microphone. JIBO’s user interface makes it very clear to a user when they are engaged in a video or audio chat with others. JIBO will only connect to other devices (including other JIBO robots) that have a digital certificate explicitly allowing that connection.

Where is my data stored?
JIBO automatically uploads your data to the cloud. There’s no explicit backup step required. The data is encrypted while in transit and on the servers. In the event that you break your JIBO you can associate the new JIBO with the account. The data will then be available on the new JIBO.  The above step requires that JIBO’s unique serial number be authorized to access data stored under the previous JIBO’s serial number. This affinity between account and serial number prevents unauthorized access to your information.

What data does JIBO store?
JIBO stores certain information about you and backs it up to the cloud. It is encrypted via SSL when being uploaded or downloaded from the cloud. While stored in the cloud it is encrypted via 256-bit AES. The information stored may include your name, information required to connect to your WiFi network, various preferences, and data that is entered or acquired through one of the JIBO applications. Such data includes photos, videos, lists.

What is the warranty?
All product specifications, illustrations, drawings, particulars, dimensions and other information on the Site or made available by us are intended to represent no more than a general illustration of the Product and its features and do not constitute a warranty or representation by us that the Product will conform with the same.

Who did the industrial design for JIBO?
We worked closely with Huge Design on the industrial design of JIBO, blending our own team's deep expertise in animation and social robotics with Huge Design's stellar talent in sophisticated and cutting-edge industrial design. Bill Webb, Chris Harsacky and team are top notch.

Who did your movie?
Bradley Leong and Kevin Lipnos at Feedback, LLC made our movie, and we recommend them to anyone in a heartbeat! They are terrific!

Is JIBO Inc. hiring?
We are always on the lookout for talented people to join our team. If you think your background and goals are aligned with ours visit www.jibo.com/jobs to see our open positions.  

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?
Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! 
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. 
For all other questions regarding JIBO, contact us at  support@jibo.com.

column2: JIBO uses 256-bit AES encryption in the cloud
column3: and digital certificates are used to authenticate devices.How does JIBO respect my privacy?A combination of technology and company policies are used to protect users privacy. JIBO complies with FTC Bureau of Consumer Protection guidelines including the Children’s Online Privacy and Protection Act (COPPA).  Company policies ensure that JIBO only collects data it needs, keeps it safe, and retains it only as long as necessary. A company security officer reviews security of all customer data at all phases of use.  JIBO employs industry standard best practices regarding the way data is stored and transferred. Passwords are stored using cryptographic one-way hash functions. This ensures that nobody, even the company security officer, can ever gain access to a users’ password.How does JIBO respect my privacy?You can tell JIBO to go to sleep, and in that mode the camera is off. JIBO will only wake up when you ask him to.Can someone watch or listen to me?JIBO robots have cameras and microphones that are used to interact with users and to provide the photography and messaging applications. There is no way for a remote user to enable the camera or microphone. JIBO’s user interface makes it very clear to a user when they are engaged in a video or audio chat with others. JIBO will only connect to other devices (including other JIBO robots) that have a digital certificate explicitly allowing that connection.Where is my data stored?JIBO automatically uploads your data to the cloud. There’s no explicit backup step required. The data is encrypted while in transit and on the servers. In the event that you break your JIBO you can associate the new JIBO with the account. The data will then be available on the new JIBO.  The above step requires that JIBO’s unique serial number be authorized to access data stored under the previous JIBO’s serial number. This affinity between account and serial number prevents unauthorized access to your information.What data does JIBO store?JIBO stores certain information about you and backs it up to the cloud. It is encrypted via SSL when being uploaded or downloaded from the cloud. While stored in the cloud it is encrypted via 256-bit AES. The information stored may include your name, information required to connect to your WiFi network, various preferences, and data that is entered or acquired through one of the JIBO applications. Such data includes photos, videos, lists.What is the warranty?All product specifications, illustrations, drawings, particulars, dimensions and other information on the Site or made available by us are intended to represent no more than a general illustration of the Product and its features and do not constitute a warranty or representation by us that the Product will conform with the same.Who did the industrial design for JIBO?We worked closely with Huge Design on the industrial design of JIBO, blending our own team's deep expertise in animation and social robotics with Huge Design's stellar talent in sophisticated and cutting-edge industrial design. Bill Webb, Chris Harsacky and team are top notch.Who did your movie?Bradley Leong and Kevin Lipnos at Feedback, LLC made our movie, and we recommend them to anyone in a heartbeat! They are terrific!Is JIBO Inc. hiring?We are always on the lookout for talented people to join our team. If you think your background and goals are aligned with ours visit www.jibo.com/jobs to see our open positions.  If I have questions, how can I reach your team?Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. For all other questions regarding JIBO, contact us at  support@jibo.com.",25.0,0,"1 Campaign

We all know the perfection that is Abby and Annette.  Lets make their wedding day a reflection of their awesomeness by helping them create the most epic look with these Chiavari Chairs.  They have had their hearts set on this particular look but sadly the chairs are quite expensive.  Donate now to help fund their perfect wedding look.

Side note - There will also be photographs of you taken and as the ball drops on 2014 who wants to be sitting in some dingy folding chair.  Not me! This is a photo of the best party of your life.

Let us explain the video...

When your cat begins to use the CatMan-Doo system the cat is actually just using a litter box a couple of feet off the ground! To the cat there is no difference other than being higher off the ground (which they like anyway!) Since we use our own patent pending ""washable cat litter"" which you can see in the various clips, clean up becomes much easier. You can see how easy it is as we demonstrate by just pouring water over the top of the litter, all the litter stays in the bowl but the urine is drained through our system right into the toilet!

As the cat progresses in the training cycle a hole opens up and just gets larger and larger until the cat is using the last and final stage of the system. This last stage will stay on the toilet for the life of the cat. We DO NOT EVER expect the cat to use a human toilet seat!

There are many home made devices (and a couple of commercially available as well) that want your cat to eventually use the human seat, THIS SIMPLY DOSENT WORK WELL. Yes, it can be done but your chances of successfully training your cat decrease greatly when using these devices.

You will also notice that when your cat has reached the last stage that the human seat fits over the cat seat without any interference for human use, this is especially helpful in a single toilet household.

Finally, you can see that we have developed the seat with a ""quick connect"" design. This allows for the ease of removal during the first few stages of training for human use of the toilet and for easy cleaning of the toilet bowl.

**Please note** that in the video there is only a quick glance demonstrating how the ""quick connect*/dis-connect feature works. Please watch the clip a few times so you can understand just how easy the CatMan-Doo system is to use. The only part of the system that stays connected semi-permanently (just like the human seat is semi-permanent) is the small strip that connects to the very same bolts that connect your existing human toilet seat. All that needs to be done to conduct your normal cleaning and use of the toilet is ""un-snap"" the CatMan-Doo seat from the strip.

Well the first reason should be enough, A CLEANER HOME! But there are so many more! You help keep over 9 million tons of used “Toxic” cat litter from landfills. Help avoid urinary tract infections common with cats. Change the perception that when you get a cat you need to get a litter box and thus do away with the #1 reason cats are returned to shelters or just thrown out to the streets. YES! The #1 reason cats are homeless is because people become tired of cleaning litter boxes! As I said there are many more reasons, the least of which is you will SAVE MONEY BY NEVER BUYING CAT LITTER AGAIN!

Simply put CatMan-Doo is a litter box that sits on top of your toilet. Through a series of trays that start with a small hole in the center and gradually becomes larger as the cat becomes accustomed to the larger hole. We also designed CatMan-Doo with small drainage holes for when, during the training cycle, the cat urinates you will only need to pour some hot water over the washable litter thereby making it easier to keep kitty’s place clean. The cat also has a comfortable area to rest itself on as opposed to trying to balance its self on a seat made only for human use. Other training aids would try to have your cat balance on a very narrow toilet seat. Since we have allowed for multiple stages in the training process, you can rest assured that your cat will not become stressed out by all of a sudden going from a small opening to a huge one. In addition if kitty does not like going from one stage to the next, we created CatMan-Doo with the ability to go back one stage thereby allowing more time for kitty to become comfortable with the size of the hole. Once your cat has gone through all 4 stages of the system they will always have a place for them to comfortably do their business. It is also very important to note that we have the homeowners comfort in mind as well. CatMan-Doo does NOT interfere with the human toilet seat, you simply install (very easy) CatMan-Doo under the human seat. Now whenever a person needs to use the toilet you just place the seat down over CatMan-Doo. When done raise the seat to allow the cat its toilet seat this is great for all the men out there because there can never be a complaint about closing the toilet! Finally for cleaning purposes, we made CatMan-Doo easy to remove from the toilet bowl with “quick release snaps”
Wait... can't I just train my cat to use the toilet myself?

Why do I need CatMan-Doo? As a child my wife had a cat that actually trained himself! With no reinforcement from anyone. Cats are very clean animals. Given the choice between a litter box and toilet the cat will always choose the toilet if properly trained. So, if you want to try to do this on your own more power to you! There have been many success stories out there (just check out YouTube). Unfortunately, many times the hassle just isn’t worth it. We have seen people using duck tape together with cardboard and while its works a few times inevitably kitty falls in the toilet! We know how much cats LOVE water right? Needless to say, that if kitty gets wet even just once you can forget about them even going into the restroom at all and much less to toilet train them.
There are already products on the market that train a cat to use the toilet.

Why this one? True. There are a couple of products that can help your cat learn to use the toilet, but none offer a lifelong solution. Also, each of these systems expects your cat to use a toilet seat designed for people! The home built ideas, while novel, just don’t make it easy for a cat to use. We have taken all the problems and issues associated with toilet training and built the CatMan-Doo system. Once you try it you will see that CatMan-Doo is the right product for toilet training your cat!

column3: >'I have been yearning for my artwork to serve a more meaningful purpose. The Portraits of Family House is a perfect match.'

column1: The Portraits of Family House project is a series of portraits of the courageous people involved with
column4: >Family House. This non profit organization provides free housing for the families of children being treated at
column7: >UCSF Benioff Children's Hospital. Over the next two years, fine art portrait painter Seamus Berkeley will create 24 oil portraits of the people connected to Family House: the families, children, care givers, organizers, and health care professionals. The portraits will create a visual legacy of the faces and spirit of the people who transform Family House into a family's temporary home. Berkeley will gift the final collection of portraits to Family House that will benefit their mission and enhance the walls of the new Family House home.

column1: Founded in 1981,
column4: >Family House is a 501(c)(3) non profit organization providing temporary housing to families of seriously ill children receiving treatment at the University of California San Francisco (UCSF) Benioff Children's Hospital. Family House operates two residential buildings with a total of 34 rooms located in the vicinity of the hospital. UCSF is currently building a new Benioff Children's Hospital at the Mission Bay facility in south Mission Bay, San Francisco, and Family House is planning to parallel the hospital's expansion by constructing an additional 80 room residence adjacent to the new hospital.

>Seamus Berkeley has painted hundreds of people, from life, while living in Taos, New Mexico where he founded the Taos Society of Portrait Artists. Since moving to the Bay Area, he has continued to create commissioned portraits and other works while also offering art instruction. For this project, Berkeley has put together a team to assist with the portraits, writing and administration of all technical and financial logistics.

column1: Your tax deductible contribution will help launch this two year art project benefitting Family House by covering such items as paint, canvas, gesso, travel expenses and overhead for the first set of portraits.
While this campaign has ended on Indiegogo, you may still help support it by making your tex deductible contribution at Fractured Atlas, the project's fiscal sponsor.
'I have been yearning for my artwork to serve a more meaningful purpose. The Portraits of Family House is a perfect match.'~ Seamus Berkeley

The Portraits of Family House project is a series of portraits of the courageous people involved with Family House. This non profit organization provides free housing for the families of children being treated at UCSF Benioff Children's Hospital. Over the next two years, fine art portrait painter Seamus Berkeley will create 24 oil portraits of the people connected to Family House: the families, children, care givers, organizers, and health care professionals. The portraits will create a visual legacy of the faces and spirit of the people who transform Family House into a family's temporary home. Berkeley will gift the final collection of portraits to Family House that will benefit their mission and enhance the walls of the new Family House home.

Founded in 1981, Family House is a 501(c)(3) non profit organization providing temporary housing to families of seriously ill children receiving treatment at the University of California San Francisco (UCSF) Benioff Children's Hospital. Family House operates two residential buildings with a total of 34 rooms located in the vicinity of the hospital. UCSF is currently building a new Benioff Children's Hospital at the Mission Bay facility in south Mission Bay, San Francisco, and Family House is planning to parallel the hospital's expansion by constructing an additional 80 room residence adjacent to the new hospital.

Seamus Berkeley has painted hundreds of people, from life, while living in Taos, New Mexico where he founded the Taos Society of Portrait Artists. Since moving to the Bay Area, he has continued to create commissioned portraits and other works while also offering art instruction. For this project, Berkeley has put together a team to assist with the portraits, writing and administration of all technical and financial logistics.

Your tax deductible contribution will help launch this two year art project benefitting Family House by covering such items as paint, canvas, gesso, travel expenses and overhead for the first set of portraits.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column15: >
column42:
> 

Hey there. Matt here.

I've been a professional furniture maker, designer, and craftsman for over 20 years. I'm very fortunate that I get to design and make cool things for a living.

Sprocks have been spinning around my brain for a long time now. If I told you how many hours I've thought about gears and magnets in my 40 years on this planet, you would probably worry about me
column43:
-)

I'm extremely fortunate to have some serious professionals as friends that have helped bring this project to life. I could not of done any of it without them, and my community of amazing friends and family who have supported me for years.

I'm so happy that you're now along for the ride with the rest of us :)

column1: Shipping is not included in the price of the rewards.
Once the campaign is over, you'll receive a ""backer survey"" that will verify your mailing information and include the cost for shipping.
We're continuously looking for more cost effective ways to get Sprocks into the hands of more people around the world, at a lower cost.
There's always risks and challenges, especially during these crazy times. That's why my team and I have decided to keep manufacturing and supplies as local as possible.
This means we don't have to worry about any overseas delays due to the pandemic.
We're doing the bulk of the manufacturing in house, right here at the Idea Foundry.
We've already made hundreds of Sprocks, so we know exactly what it takes to get them in your hands.
